shopUnlockTips: The Trading Post can sell {0} now

CONTROL.name: Control Center
CONTROL.description: The control center of Rhodes Island's ship system, it is the foundation of all areas' construction.

POWER.name: Power Plant
POWER.description: A facility that produces electricity at Rhodes Island. It produces and transfer power through utilizing the Originium engine.

MANUFACTURE.name: Factory
MANUFACTURE.description: A facility that produces resources at Rhodes Island, it turns raw materials into industrial materials and produces all kinds of items.

TRADING.name: Trading Post
TRADING.description: A facility that deals with Rhodes Island's commercial contracts and agreements with all other parties. It acquires the funds needed to fuel the research and operation of Rhodes Island.

DORMITORY.name: Dormitory
DORMITORY.description: A facility that provides standard accommodation for Rhodes Island's Operators. It has everything needed for relaxation and entertainment.

WORKSHOP.name: Workshop
WORKSHOP.description: A facility that processes resources at Rhodes Island, it uses all kinds of equipment to turn industrial materials into useful items or decompose them into other materials.

HIRE.name: Office
HIRE.description: A facility that deals with all of Rhodes Island's official matters.

TRAINING.name: Training Room
TRAINING.description: A facility where Rhodes Island Operators can train themselves using the wide variety of equipment available.

MEETING.name: Reception Room
MEETING.description: A facility that deals with reception. Most visits and greetings take place here.

hire_spd&clue2[250].description: When this Operator is assigned to the HR Office, increases HR contacting speed by <@cc.vup>+20%</>, and for every <@cc.vup>1</> contacts made, increases the likelihood of obtaining <@cc.kw>Ursus Student Self-Governing Group</> clues (working time and recruitment slots improves the likelihood)

hire_spd_bd_n1_n1[100].description: When this Operator is assigned to the HR Office, HR contacting speed <@cc.vup>+20%</>. Additionally, for every Recruit slot (Default slots do not count), <$cc.bd_a1_a1><@cc.rem>Memory Fragments</></> <@cc.vup>+10</>

hire_spd_bd_n1[000].description: When this Operator is assigned to the HR Office, every <@cc.vup>1</> <$cc.bd_a1_a1><@cc.rem>Memory Fragment</></> is converted into <@cc.vup>1</> <$cc.bd_a1><@cc.rem>Perception Information</></>. When Morale is fully consumed, remove all <$cc.bd_a1_a1><@cc.rem>Memory Fragments</></> and accumulated <$cc.bd_a1><@cc.rem>Perception Information</></>

hire_spd_bd_n1_n1[200].description: When this Operator is assigned to the HR Office, for every Recruit slot (Default slots do not count), <<$cc.bd_b1><@cc.rem>Worldly Plight</></> <@cc.vup>+10</>

hire_spd_blitz[000].description: When this Operator is assigned to the HR Office, HR contacting speed<@cc.vup>+20%</>; every <@cc.vup>1</> points of <$cc.bd_ash><@cc.rem>Intelligence Reserve</></> adds extra contacting speed <@cc.vup>+5%</>; every <@cc.vup>1</> bottles of <$cc.bd_tachanka><@cc.rem>Ursus Specialty Beverage</></>, adds extra contacting speed <@cc.vup>+5%</>

furni_cabin_desk_01.name: DIY Workbench
furni_cabin_desk_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cabin_desk_01.description: A special workbench designed for the cabin. Equipped with various office appliances, it provides all kinds of support at work for Operators.

furni_cabin_chair_01.name: DIY Swivel Chair
furni_cabin_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cabin_chair_01.description: A common four-wheel chair. Sit on it and you can move quickly to any place of the cabin.

furni_cabin_trash_01.name: Anti-Explosion Trash Can
furni_cabin_trash_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cabin_trash_01.description: A seemingly normal trash can. It can effectively prevent accidents caused by experimental errors.

furni_cabin_bed_01.name: Bunk Bed In Cabin
furni_cabin_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cabin_bed_01.description: A facility that provides places for two Operators to sleep. Operator who sleeps at the top, please sleep against the wall.

furni_cabin_control_01.name: General Console
furni_cabin_control_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cabin_control_01.description: A control terminal for all equipment in the entire cabin. From light adjusting to remote experimenting, you can do whatever you can think of.

furni_cabin_display_01.name: Control Display
furni_cabin_display_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cabin_display_01.description: A display connected to the experimental equipment. You can conduct remote experiments if you couple it to the console, letting you switch to cameras in the common areas with a single click.

furni_cabin_note_01.name: Note Board In Cabin
furni_cabin_note_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cabin_note_01.description: A convenient note board. Pick up a pen and start writing. As long as you keep writing, the inspiration will eventually come.

furni_cabin_cabinet_01.name: Built-In File Cabinet
furni_cabin_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cabin_cabinet_01.description: The built-in design is safe and reliable, and suits the cabin where space utilization needs to be maximized.

furni_cabin_fireExtinguisher_01.name: Cabin Fire Extinguisher Kit
furni_cabin_fireExtinguisher_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cabin_fireExtinguisher_01.description: As a research facility, things will inevitably go up in flames every now and then. This handy fire extinguisher kit keeps you prepared.

furni_cabin_constructionMember_01.name: Cabin Flush Mount Pipe
furni_cabin_constructionMember_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cabin_constructionMember_01.description: A piping system that maintains basic operations for the entire cabin. It's obscure, indispensable, and ubiquitous.

furni_cabin_carpet_01.name: Black Fiber Carpet
furni_cabin_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cabin_carpet_01.description: Furniture that should never have appeared in the cabin. But still it was put there after vocal support from Operators.

furni_cabin_wallpaper_01.name: Light Green Wallpaper
furni_cabin_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cabin_wallpaper_01.description: The test shows that the wallpaper's color can protect Operators' vision to some extent. But... nobody likes it.

furni_cabin_floor_01.name: Cabin Floor
furni_cabin_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cabin_floor_01.description: A floor laid with the latest materials. The manufacturer claims that it has a stronger self-cleaning capability than the human body does.

furni_specimen_wallpaper_01.name: Metallic Wallpaper
furni_specimen_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_wallpaper_01.description: A wallpaper with a reflective, metallic luster. Its only mission is to be the background for other things.

furni_specimen_floor_01.name: Copper Floor
furni_specimen_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_floor_01.description: A floor reflecting a little bit of light. It won't get dirty easily and is convenient to clean up.

furni_specimen_coffeetable_01.name: Wire Side Table
furni_specimen_coffeetable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_coffeetable_01.description: A coffee table that looks like a reverse bamboo basket. It can be used for storage if turned over... assuming you're strong enough to turn it over.

furni_specimen_bed_01.name: Metallic Bed
furni_specimen_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_bed_01.description: A simple but solid bed. Operators can fully enjoy the view of the ceiling.

furni_specimen_nightstand_01.name: Small Square Nightstand
furni_specimen_nightstand_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_nightstand_01.description: A black-and-white nightstand. Be careful putting dark objects on it, or you might not be able to find it.

furni_specimen_lazysofa_L_01.name: Brown Bean Bag Sofa (Left)
furni_specimen_lazysofa_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_lazysofa_L_01.description: A strange but popular sofa. The last occupant has just left, leaving a big dent on it.

furni_specimen_lazysofa_R_01.name: Brown Bean Bag Sofa (Right)
furni_specimen_lazysofa_R_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_lazysofa_R_01.description: A strange but popular sofa. It seems new. Someone must have tried hard to restore it.

furni_specimen_pottedplant_02.name: Potted Conifer Plant
furni_specimen_pottedplant_02.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_pottedplant_02.description: An incomprehensible houseplant. Don't touch it, or you'll get your hands pricked.

furni_specimen_pottedplant_01.name: Potted Broadleaf Plant
furni_specimen_pottedplant_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_pottedplant_01.description: An incomprehensible houseplant. The leaves that fall naturally can be made into bookmarks.

furni_specimen_seedling_01.name: Potted Succulent Plant
furni_specimen_seedling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_seedling_01.description: An incomprehensible houseplant. The leaves are thick and water-storing. Don't let some Operators get close to it.

furni_specimen_showcase_01.name: Eco-Exhibition Cabinet
furni_specimen_showcase_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_showcase_01.description: An eco-exhibition cabinet built with various strange plants. Can they really survive in such an environment?

furni_specimen_carpet_01.name: Wide Gray Carpet
furni_specimen_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_carpet_01.description: A simple gray carpet. You can put everything on it, even yourself.

furni_specimen_specimenframed_01.name: Unknown Bones
furni_specimen_specimenframed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_specimenframed_01.description: The bones of an incomprehensible creature. Nobody could have ever imagined that something like this exists.

furni_specimen_specimenframedkit_01.name: Unknown Specimens
furni_specimen_specimenframedkit_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_specimenframedkit_01.description: Incomprehensible specimens whose structures seem difficult to describe.

furni_specimen_bulletinboard_01.name: Specimen Data Board
furni_specimen_bulletinboard_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_bulletinboard_01.description: A board full of data. They accurately describe the exhibits in the room with complex terminology. You will not understand them without checking the meanings of the words.

furni_specimen_downlight_01.name: Flush Mount Rectangle Ceiling Light
furni_specimen_downlight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_downlight_01.description: A rectangular ceiling light. The lighting is soft and will not cause any damage to the exhibits.

furni_specimen_downlight_02.name: Flush Mount Square Ceiling Light
furni_specimen_downlight_02.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_specimen_downlight_02.description: A square ceiling light. The lighting is soft and looks better if there is also a rectangle ceiling light.

furni_cafe_bar_01.name: Red-Brick Caf Bar
furni_cafe_bar_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cafe_bar_01.description: A bar commonly used in the Columbian caf. There are all the tools needed to make coffee.

furni_cafe_barstool_01.name: Barstool With Curved Legs
furni_cafe_barstool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cafe_barstool_01.description: A quintessential barstool. Allows you to have that afternoon chat with the popular barista.

furni_cafe_shelf_01.name: Brown Bookshelf
furni_cafe_shelf_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cafe_shelf_01.description: A tall bookshelf filled with many interesting reads. Take your pick, and have a seat.

furni_cafe_cupboard_01.name: Red-Brown Cabinet
furni_cafe_cupboard_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_cafe_cupboard_01.description: A cabinet of the same color as the bar. Generally, it's used to store raw materials, but the caf owner's private collection is also in it.

furni_cafe_pottedplant_01.name: Potted Long-Leaf Plant
furni_cafe_pottedplant_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.

furni_penguin_ceiling_01.name: Fluorescent Ceiling Lamp

furni_penguin_ceiling_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_penguin_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_penguin_wallpaper_01.description: Special wallpaper made for Penguin Logistics. Using modern projection technology, the scenery outside the window is set to the best time of the day to make a delivery - nighttime.
furni_penguin_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_penguin_floor_01.name: Safehouse Floor Tiles
furni_penguin_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_penguin_floor_01.description: Special foor tiles made for Penguin Logistics. 'Oi, Croissant, didn't we already reserve the garage for you? Get your junk outta here!'
furni_penguin_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_elite_ceiling_01.name: Ceiling Floodlights
furni_elite_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_elite_ceiling_01.description: Built in ceiling floodlights. Since Ace left, only Logos's lamp still remains lit at midnight.
furni_elite_ceiling_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_elite_board_01.name: Workstation Blackboard
furni_elite_board_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_elite_board_01.description: A blackboard for sharing information and inspiration in the workplace. Mechanist, who designed Blaze's weapon, spent many long hours working here, and every sketch and blueprint preserves his wisdom and dedication.
furni_elite_board_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_elite_sawingMachine_01.name: Industrial Cutting Station
furni_elite_sawingMachine_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_elite_sawingMachine_01.description: A cutting-edge workshop table. When it was used for pyrotechnics, Blaze could spend an entire day sitting nearby in a trance, but today, nobody's occupying it.
furni_elite_sawingMachine_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_elite_cabinet_01.name: Material Crates
furni_elite_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_elite_cabinet_01.description: Neatly stacked supply crates that can double as storage cabinets. The boxes containing sensitive documents could only be opened using Ace's and Outcast's keys, but both keys have long been destroyed, leaving no trace.
furni_elite_cabinet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_elite_desk_01.name: Workbench
furni_elite_desk_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_elite_desk_01.description: A simple workbench, with some experiment supplies strewn across it messily. Mechanist's workbench also doubles as his bed. He once said that sleep and death are one and the same.
furni_elite_desk_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_elite_stool_01.name: White Round Stool
furni_elite_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_elite_stool_01.description: A round workstation stool. Before Scout, the runner up in the stool racing competition, had a chance to issue another challenge, Logos would never participate in the competition again.
furni_elite_stool_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_elite_roboticArm_01.name: Robotic Arm
furni_elite_roboticArm_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_elite_roboticArm_01.description: A robotic arm installed inside the workstation. Whitesmith used to dance with it, her steps so fast that even death could not catch her. In the end, she did finally slow down.
furni_elite_roboticArm_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_elite_weaponCabinet_01.name: Weapon Storage Cabinet
furni_elite_weaponCabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_elite_weaponCabinet_01.description: A closet filled with weapons. The weapons are waiting for calibration, Logos is waiting for spare parts, and Whitesmith is waiting for raw materials. All the waiting is meaningless now.
furni_elite_weaponCabinet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_elite_cleaningBucket_01.name: Cleanser
furni_elite_cleaningBucket_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_elite_cleaningBucket_01.description: A cleaner with a spray nozzle. Scout used to graffiti the walls with this, since water would leave no trace.
furni_elite_cleaningBucket_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_elite_suspensionCrane_01.name: Dual-Beamed Crane
furni_elite_suspensionCrane_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_elite_suspensionCrane_01.description: A crane used to carry heavy objects. However, Ace and Blaze could manually lift pretty much anything, which saved time and effort.
furni_elite_suspensionCrane_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_elite_shadingBoard_01.name: Transparent Partition
furni_elite_shadingBoard_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_elite_shadingBoard_01.description: A transparent partition used to isolate dangerous work areas. Made from new materials designed by Whitesmith, these doors witnessed the birth of many industries.
furni_elite_shadingBoard_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_elite_wallpaper_01.name: Workstation Wallpaper
furni_elite_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_elite_wallpaper_01.description: The workstation's wallpaper has a logo imprinted upon it. Everyone secretly vowed to dedicate their lives to their work, and some of them made good on that vow.
furni_elite_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_elite_floor_01.name: Workstation Floorboards
furni_elite_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_elite_floor_01.description: Floorboards made for workstation use. Outcast used to always stand guard outside the office with her weapon drawn, saying that even at her age, she'd shine just as brightly as when she was younger. Nobody who saw her could deny it.
furni_elite_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_ceiling1_01.name: Inscribed Ceiling Plaque (Dumpling House)
furni_restaurant_ceiling1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_ceiling1_01.description: A sign commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. The dough is thin and the stuffing is fragrant, and you'll lose track of how many bowls you've ordered in no time.
furni_restaurant_ceiling1_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_curtain_01.name: Bamboo Screen
furni_restaurant_curtain_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_curtain_01.description: A screen commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. Don't need to see or hear it. The rich aroma already has me hooked.
furni_restaurant_curtain_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_fryingTable_01.name: Electric Frying Table
furni_restaurant_fryingTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_fryingTable_01.description: An electric frying table commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. How good is this stuff? I can't explain in just a few words. You're going to be here for a while.
furni_restaurant_fryingTable_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_stockPotTable_01.name: Boiling Station
furni_restaurant_stockPotTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_stockPotTable_01.description: A boiling station commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. And so when that lid was lifted...! If you want to hear more, you'll have to wait until next time.
furni_restaurant_stockPotTable_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_barTable_01.name: Wooden Corner Table
furni_restaurant_barTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_barTable_01.description: A large wooden table common found in the food courts of Lungmen. It's not a meal without the guests.
furni_restaurant_barTable_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_chair_01.name: Eatery Round Stool
furni_restaurant_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_chair_01.description: A round wooden stool commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. New friends and old friends come together, and perhaps leave with a few more friends.
furni_restaurant_chair_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_diningTable_01.name: Eatery Dining Table
furni_restaurant_diningTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_diningTable_01.description: A dining table commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. Your hometown may be thousands of miles away, but a taste of home is right here in your bowl.
furni_restaurant_diningTable_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_longBench_01.name: Rectangular Bench
furni_restaurant_longBench_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_longBench_01.description: A long bench commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. If a friend raises their glass, even pure water is intoxicating with the fine flavors of friendship.
furni_restaurant_longBench_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_screen_01.name: Half-Shut Screen
furni_restaurant_screen_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_screen_01.description: One of the screens commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. A bowl of soup, a plate of food, and an evening of conversation as the sun dips beneath the western mountains.
furni_restaurant_screen_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_bonsai_01.name: Ornamental Bonsai
furni_restaurant_bonsai_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_bonsai_01.description: A bonsai tree planted in a celadon vase. The tree's emerald leaves and thick boughs ward off evil, while the white jade pottery holds in good fortune.
furni_restaurant_bonsai_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_pottedPlant_01.name: Ornamental Plant
furni_restaurant_pottedPlant_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_pottedPlant_01.description: An ornamental plant commonly seen throughout Lungmen. The plant resembles a pagoda, its canopy spreading out from the middle.
furni_restaurant_pottedPlant_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_priceList1_01.name: Menu (Dumpling House)
furni_restaurant_priceList1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_priceList1_01.description: A menu commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. All the prices are clearly listed - no surprises or shenanigans here.
furni_restaurant_priceList1_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_trottingHorseLamp_01.name: Hexagonal Lantern
furni_restaurant_trottingHorseLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_trottingHorseLamp_01.description: A hexagonal lantern commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. Formerly hung up in a temple, it now adorns the area high above the door.
furni_restaurant_trottingHorseLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_spotlight_01.name: Small Spotlight
furni_restaurant_spotlight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_spotlight_01.description: Spotlights with the right amount of luminescence. When the air begins to warm again, merriment grows and families gather.
furni_restaurant_spotlight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_downlight_01.name: Ceiling-Mounted Lights
furni_restaurant_downlight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_downlight_01.description: Ceiling lights commonly found throughout Lungmen neighborhoods.
furni_restaurant_downlight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_carpet_01.name: Eatery Carpet
furni_restaurant_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_carpet_01.description: A carpet commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. Even when we say goodbye, we will surely meet again in the future.
furni_restaurant_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_wallpaper_01.name: Eatery Wallpaper
furni_restaurant_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_wallpaper_01.description: Festive wallpaper commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. Between these lively walls, good fortune swirls and congregates.
furni_restaurant_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_restaurant_floor_01.name: Eatery Floor Tiles
furni_restaurant_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_restaurant_floor_01.description: Floor tiles commonly found in the food courts of Lungmen. Thousands of travelers come and go, leaving behind memories of joy and good fortune.
furni_restaurant_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightFood_priceList_01.name: Healthy Menu
furni_lightFood_priceList_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_priceList_01.description: A menu found in a Healthy Diner. 'Trust me, any price is worth it for your health. Your body will thank you later.'

furni_lightFood_sign_01.name: Healthy Decorative Plate
furni_lightFood_sign_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_sign_01.description: A decorated panel found in a Healthy Diner. 'I'm supposed to entertain myself by watching the colors cycle? I'm tired of waiting already...'

furni_lightFood_cashierDesk_01.name: Healthy Service Counter
furni_lightFood_cashierDesk_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_cashierDesk_01.description: The main counter found in a Healthy Diner. 'Get it while it's hot! Everything's prepared right in front of you, so you don't have to worry about what's on your plate!'

furni_lightFood_spotlight_01.name: Healthy Spotlight
furni_lightFood_spotlight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_spotlight_01.description: A spotlight used in a Healthy Diner. 'Research shows that proper lighting can promote a healthy appetite.'

furni_lightFood_foodCabinet_01.name: Fresh Food Cabinet
furni_lightFood_foodCabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_foodCabinet_01.description: A hot foods cabinet used in a Healthy Diner. 'Everything prepared fresh this morning.'

furni_lightFood_juicer_01.name: Icey Juicer
furni_lightFood_juicer_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_juicer_01.description: A juice dispensary used in a Healthy Diner. 'Hibiscus gave me a satchel of powder and told me to mix it all in for good health.'

furni_lightFood_orderingMachine_01.name: Self-Service Kiosk
furni_lightFood_orderingMachine_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_orderingMachine_01.description: An ordering kiosk used in a Healthy Diner. 'Even idiots know how to use one of these, right... I might just be an idiot then...'

furni_lightFood_vendingMachine_01.name: Vending Machine
furni_lightFood_vendingMachine_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_vendingMachine_01.description: A to-go machine used in a Healthy Diner. 'Stop looking at me like that... I know how to use it!'

furni_lightFood_board_01.name: Today's Recommendations
furni_lightFood_board_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_board_01.description: Only the best-sellers are printed here. 'The healthiest stuff sells the best, after all.'

furni_lightFood_partitionGate_01.name: Healthy Diner Doorway
furni_lightFood_partitionGate_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_partitionGate_01.description: Doors for separating areas in a Healthy Diner. 'This is a great way to control the flow of customers! You really are a genius!'

furni_lightFood_wallSticker_01.name: 'Fruity Adventure'
furni_lightFood_wallSticker_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_wallSticker_01.description: A poster that promotes good health. 'Don Lemon? Petey Green? What the heck is our mascot supposed to be...?'

furni_lightFood_table_01.name: Healthy Dining Table
furni_lightFood_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_table_01.description: A table with seats for two but food for just one. 'No, just one is fine. I'm good, seriously.'

furni_lightFood_chair_01.name: Green Two-Seat Sofa
furni_lightFood_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_chair_01.description: A seat for two at a Healthy Diner. 'Comfort is our top priority. Besides, if someone gets it dirty, it's not like I'm the one who has to clean up.'

furni_lightFood_ceiling_01.name: Garden-Style Ceiling Fixture
furni_lightFood_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_ceiling_01.description: Way too many things are precariously hanging on this fixture. 'Will they fall yet? Why haven't they fallen yet? Hurry up and fall already!'

furni_lightFood_carpet_01.name: Divider Line Carpet
furni_lightFood_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_carpet_01.description: A washable carpet with a dividing line drawn. 'I want everything to be beautiful and practical!'

furni_lightFood_downlight_01.name: Healthy Ceiling Light
furni_lightFood_downlight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_downlight_01.description: A standard ceiling light found in a Healthy Diner. 'I dunno what it's called, just buy the cheapest one in the aisle.'

furni_lightFood_wallpaper_01.name: Healthy Wallpaper
furni_lightFood_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_wallpaper_01.description: A new green wallpaper used in a Healthy Diner. 'I couldn't decide on how many shades of green I wanted to use, so I just rolled a dice.'

furni_lightFood_floor_01.name: Healthy Floor Tiles
furni_lightFood_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightFood_floor_01.description: Dirt-resistant floor tiles used in a Healthy Diner. 'Look, just give it a wipe and it's as good as new!'

furni_beerhouse_priceList_01.name: Upscale Menu Display
furni_beerhouse_priceList_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_priceList_01.description: A detachable hanging price list. A Seven Cities-style restaurant opened by Victorians, in Columbia? How strange...
furni_beerhouse_priceList_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_beerhouse_cashierDesk_01.name: Pristine Service Counter
furni_beerhouse_cashierDesk_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_cashierDesk_01.description: Remember to leave a generous tip at the front desk when given thoughtful service. Only the most exquisite glory deserves to be known far and wide.
furni_beerhouse_cashierDesk_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_beerhouse_foodCabinet_01.name: Gourmet Food Warmer
furni_beerhouse_foodCabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_foodCabinet_01.description: A food display counter that houses the store's signature foods. You can still hear the sizzling of the food within.
furni_beerhouse_foodCabinet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_beerhouse_wineRack_01.name: Liquor Storage Rack
furni_beerhouse_wineRack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_wineRack_01.description: A cabinet that houses the restaurant's signature beverages. These crowd-pleasing favorites glow with a soft golden light.
furni_beerhouse_wineRack_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_beerhouse_banner1_01.name: Restaurant Notice Board
furni_beerhouse_banner1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_banner1_01.description: A promotional board that displays in-store offers. Customers' eyes are quickly drawn to words such as, 'Deals,' 'Recommendations,' and 'Rewards.'

furni_beerhouse_wallSticker_01.name: Real Wooden Accent Wall
furni_beerhouse_wallSticker_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_wallSticker_01.description: Decorate wall laminate to be placed on the wall behind the front desk. After all, the soul of the Seven Cities resides in its wood.

furni_beerhouse_diningTable1_01.name: Double-Row Seating (Occupied)
furni_beerhouse_diningTable1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_diningTable1_01.description: The double-row sofa seats in the restaurant are already awaiting guests. A 'Janssen Brothers Meal for Two' is already on the table, so how about enjoying it with a friend?

furni_beerhouse_diningTable2_01.name: Double-Row Seating (Vacant)
furni_beerhouse_diningTable2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_diningTable2_01.description: This double-row sofa seat still has a vacancy. Treat yourself well with a delicious 'De Jong Deluxe Meal.'

furni_beerhouse_framedArt1_01.name: Famous Painting Replica
furni_beerhouse_framedArt1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_framedArt1_01.description: A reproduced reddish oil painting. The painting seems to depict the origin of the meal's ingredients.

furni_beerhouse_framedArt2_01.name: Famous Painting Copy
furni_beerhouse_framedArt2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_framedArt2_01.description: An imitation yellowish oil painting. The painting seems to depict the origin of the beverage's ingredients.

furni_beerhouse_banner2_01.name: Large Notice Board
furni_beerhouse_banner2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_banner2_01.description: A promotional board with the mascot of the restaurant. The slogan reads: 'Golden Experience.'

furni_beerhouse_slopedCeiling1_01.name: Faux Wood Upper Ceiling
furni_beerhouse_slopedCeiling1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_slopedCeiling1_01.description: The upper dome decoration in the restaurant. Eat your food while it's still crispy and piping hot!

furni_beerhouse_slopedCeiling2_01.name: Faux Wood Lower Ceiling
furni_beerhouse_slopedCeiling2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_slopedCeiling2_01.description: The lower dome decoration in the restaurant. Let the beverage moisten your throat and refresh your heart.

furni_beerhouse_ceilingLight_01.name: Seven Cities Warm Light Chandelier
furni_beerhouse_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_ceilingLight_01.description: A chandelier style commonly seen in the Seven Cities area. 'Warm lighting can pique the appetite,' seems to be a saying all across the world.

furni_beerhouse_wallpaper_01.name: Seven Cities Patterned Wallpaper
furni_beerhouse_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_wallpaper_01.description: Restaurant wallpaper with a customized floral pattern. As apropos as cutting through the oiliness of meat with aromatic vegetables.

furni_beerhouse_floor_01.name: Seven Cities Patterned Floorboards
furni_beerhouse_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_beerhouse_floor_01.description: A commonly used floor style from the Seven Cities? The natives might disagree with that.

furni_dormW_weaponRack_01.name: Bounty Display Rack
furni_dormW_weaponRack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_weaponRack_01.description: A display rack full of Sankta guns. Some Sarkazians have a habit of showing off their spoils of war to their clansmen.
furni_dormW_weaponRack_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_wallDecor_01.name: Slate Wall Decoration
furni_dormW_wallDecor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_wallDecor_01.description: A decorative wall slate in the mercenary lounge. Personal belongings are hidden behind it.
furni_dormW_wallDecor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_partition_01.name: Bulletproof Glass Door
furni_dormW_partition_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_partition_01.description: A door sealed with military-grade bulletproof glass, with a communal guitar between the partition. Even if you plan to have a heart-to-heart, keeping your distance is still a necessary safety measure.
furni_dormW_partition_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_barrel_01.name: High-Output Explosives Material
furni_dormW_barrel_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_barrel_01.description: A barrel W uses to store raw explosive material. 'It's good there. At least we know what'll blow up.'
furni_dormW_barrel_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_toolbox_01.name: Ignition Tool
furni_dormW_toolbox_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_toolbox_01.description: A toolbox W uses to make detonators. 'From production to detonation, she has a hand in the entire process.'
furni_dormW_toolbox_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_table_01.name: Upscale Dining Table
furni_dormW_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_table_01.description: Upon this high table specially covered with a white tablecloth sits a cornucopia of fresh fruits and drinks. One of the few things capable of taking away W's smile.
furni_dormW_table_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_mirror_01.name: Red-Framed Floor Mirror
furni_dormW_mirror_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_mirror_01.description: A mirror used to check worn equipment. While completely incompatible with the habits of mercenaries, W still insisted on having it here.
furni_dormW_mirror_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_snookerTable_01.name: Sarkaz Pool Table
furni_dormW_snookerTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_snookerTable_01.description: An ordinary billiards table, but the tabletop has been replaced with colors preferred by Sarkazians. Work leisurely, and play dutifully.
furni_dormW_snookerTable_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_triangle_01.name: Sarkaz Ball Rack
furni_dormW_triangle_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_triangle_01.description: A customized ball rack with a unique shape. The Sarkaz rarely like to follow the rules, so it is no surprise that they'd make their own rules for billiards.
furni_dormW_triangle_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_dartboard_01.name: Hanging Dartboard
furni_dormW_dartboard_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_dartboard_01.description: A dartboard with mission targets attached. Between scoring hits and leisurely chatting, inspiration flashes.
furni_dormW_dartboard_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_shelf_01.name: Hanging Shelves
furni_dormW_shelf_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_shelf_01.description: A simple, easily assembled and disassembled rack. There are always people who like to test the load-bearing limits of these things, 'forcing' them to be replaced regularly.
furni_dormW_shelf_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_bulletinboard_01.name: Lounge Bulletin Board
furni_dormW_bulletinboard_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_bulletinboard_01.description: A brightly colored noticeboard. Every mercenary knows how to adapt to changes, but it's always good to have a general game plan.
furni_dormW_bulletinboard_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_carpet_01.name: Fur Carpet
furni_dormW_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_carpet_01.description: Nobody knows what kind of animal fur was used to make this carpet. Some mercenaries are adept at setting traps in the most common places to extremely deadly effect.
furni_dormW_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_wallSticker_01.name: Wood Plank Walls
furni_dormW_wallSticker_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_wallSticker_01.description: A wooden wall decorating the mercenary lounge. Communal goods are hidden behind it.
furni_dormW_wallSticker_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_walllamp_01.name: Small Lounge Wall Light
furni_dormW_walllamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_walllamp_01.description: A small wall lamp in the mercenary lounge. Remove the lamp and rotate the bulb three times to the right to use it as a makeshift grenade.
furni_dormW_walllamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_ceiling_01.name: Lounge Ceiling Light Fixture
furni_dormW_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_ceiling_01.description: The ceiling of the mercenary lounge. In almost every mercenary lounge, there will be some not-so-discreet secrets to be found on the ceiling. Sarkaz mercenaries are particularly good at this.
furni_dormW_ceiling_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_fluorescentLamp_01.name: Lounge Tube Light
furni_dormW_fluorescentLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_fluorescentLamp_01.description: A tube light in the mercenary lounge. No matter hunter or prey, both will eventually be stained with blood.
furni_dormW_fluorescentLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_ceilingLight_01.name: Lounge Chandelier
furni_dormW_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_ceilingLight_01.description: A chandelier in the mercenary lounge. All details can be used to either complete the contract - or be shared.
furni_dormW_ceilingLight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_wallpaper_01.name: Lounge Wallpaper
furni_dormW_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_wallpaper_01.description: One side of the wall has been damaged extensively, and efforts to repair it have been abandoned. Wounds may heal, but scars last forever.
furni_dormW_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_dormW_floor_01.name: Lounge Floor Tiles
furni_dormW_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dormW_floor_01.description: Tidy and unassuming floor tiles. However, one of these floor tiles contains explosives that could detonate the entire lounge.
furni_dormW_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_bookshelf_01.name: Low Bookshelves
furni_community_bookshelf_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_bookshelf_01.description: A large bookshelf filled with various notices and posters. To correct people's misconceptions, some popular books were placed behind the signs.
furni_community_bookshelf_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_floorLamp_01.name: Low Floor Lamp
furni_community_floorLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_floorLamp_01.description: A low floor lamp that emphasizes decoration over anything else. Only Rosa and Istina can understand why such an out-of-place lamp is in this room.
furni_community_floorLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_bulletinboard_01.name: Squad Bulletin Board
furni_community_bulletinboard_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_bulletinboard_01.description: A student club notice board to be hung on the wall. Most of the stuff that people can see is pretty meaningless.
furni_community_bulletinboard_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_cabinet_01.name: Low Storage Cabinet
furni_community_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_cabinet_01.description: Low storage cabinets that can hold a lot of personal belongings. Each drawer is locked to preserve the secrecy of its contents.
furni_community_cabinet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_table1_01.name: Long Wooden Table (Misc)
furni_community_table1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_table1_01.description: A wooden table filled with a lot of junk. Records what you don't want recorded, and hides what you don't want hidden.
furni_community_table1_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_table2_01.name: Long Wooden Table (Lamp)
furni_community_table2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_table2_01.description: A wooden table with the lamp left on. A diary entry is left unfinished, erase mark after erase mark visible on its page.'
furni_community_table2_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_table3_01.name: Long Wooden Table (Police Hat)
furni_community_table3_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_table3_01.description: A wooden table with a police cap sitting on it. Light as a hat, heavy as a rock.
furni_community_table3_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_table4_01.name: Long Wooden Table (Tea Set)
furni_community_table4_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_table4_01.description: A wooden table with multiple cups resting on it. The tea has already gone cold without anyone to finish it.
furni_community_table4_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_chair_L_01.name: Simple Low Chair (Left)
furni_community_chair_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_chair_L_01.description: An easily-damaged chair made from cheap materials. Nobody knows why Rosa has a soft spot for these chairs.
furni_community_chair_L_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_chair_R_01.name: Simple Low Chair (Right)
furni_community_chair_R_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_chair_R_01.description: An easily-replaceable chair made from cheap materials. Zima prefers to kick back on a large sofa if possible.
furni_community_chair_R_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_trailStove_01.name: Portable Picnic Stove
furni_community_trailStove_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_trailStove_01.description: A picnic stove that can be used at any time. Be careful when using indoors. Exclusively for Gummy's cooking use, not to be lent out.
furni_community_trailStove_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_ceilingLamp_01.name: Ceiling Disk Light
furni_community_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_ceilingLamp_01.description: Miniature imitations of expensive ceiling lights. Rosa said that this was a miniature version of the same fixtures used in the lobby of her house. As for how miniature, she did not say.
furni_community_ceilingLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_ceilingLight_01.name: Hanging Lamp
furni_community_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_ceilingLight_01.description: An imitation of an expensive pendant lamp. To this day, Leto still hasn't figured out why it will shake around.
furni_community_ceilingLight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_wallpaper_01.name: Ursus Clubroom Wallpaper
furni_community_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_wallpaper_01.description: An Ursus-style wallpaper used in the clubroom. Same color, but different environment.
furni_community_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_community_floor_01.name: Ursus Clubroom Tiles
furni_community_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_community_floor_01.description: Ceramic floor tiles used in the clubroom. One floor tile evokes a series of nightmares.
furni_community_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_nightView_recordPlayer_01.name: Antique Phonograph
furni_nightView_recordPlayer_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_recordPlayer_01.description: A record player placed upon a tall, Leithanian-style table. Every soul in Leithanien is nourished by this unmatched melody.

furni_nightView_sofa_01.name: Extra-Long White Sofa
furni_nightView_sofa_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_sofa_01.description: A comfortable, extra-long sofa. The use of colors that directly clash with that of the instruments inadvertently distinguishes the musicians from the audience.
furni_nightView_sofa_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_nightView_carpet_01.name: Handmade Leithanian Carpet
furni_nightView_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_carpet_01.description: An expensive handmade carpet, but probably only costs a fraction of what the instruments do.

furni_nightView_cello_01.name: Monochromatic Cello
furni_nightView_cello_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_cello_01.description: A cello hand-crafted by a Leithanian luthier. A truly excellent cello can conquer the musician the instant the bow touches the strings.
furni_nightView_cello_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_nightView_celloChair_01.name: Accompanist's Chair
furni_nightView_celloChair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_celloChair_01.description: A chair for cello players. An effective chair can greatly prolong the career of a musician and make them suffer less from chronic pain - or so the advertisement says.
furni_nightView_celloChair_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_nightView_framed_01.name: 'Love and Sunflowers'
furni_nightView_framed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_framed_01.description: A famous painting of Leithanien, though this particular one is a reproduction. True beauty lies in the imagination.

furni_nightView_bottles_01.name: Leithanian Beverage
furni_nightView_bottles_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_bottles_01.description: A refreshing drink popular among Leithanians. Though the primary purpose of these drinks is to refresh and reinvigorate, imbibing too much is said to cause certain side effects...

furni_nightView_books_01.name: Pile of Miscellaneous Books
furni_nightView_books_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_books_01.description: A pile of Leithanian books that haven't yet been sorted out. Leithanians gladly absorb whatever is written within books, even if not all of it is necessarily knowledge.

furni_nightView_studyTable_01.name: All-in-One Bookshelf
furni_nightView_studyTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_studyTable_01.description: A desk integrated with a closet. The satisfaction that one gets from gazing up at the pristine collection is almost indescribable.

furni_nightView_globe_01.name: 'Globe of Balance'
furni_nightView_globe_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_globe_01.description: A medium-sized occult object placed in the home of those who believe in shamanism. Through endless rotation, inner peace is achieved.
furni_nightView_globe_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_nightView_bed_01.name: Four-Poster Bed
furni_nightView_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_bed_01.description: A four-poster bed unique to Leithanien. Incense burners can be placed upon it during ceremonies, or just for aromatherapy.
furni_nightView_bed_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_nightView_curtain_L_01.name: Thick Curtains (Left)
furni_nightView_curtain_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_curtain_L_01.description: Heavy curtains thick enough to have a sound-cancellation effect. When pulled back, the city at night is fully visible beneath you.

furni_nightView_curtain_R_01.name: Thick Curtains (Right)
furni_nightView_curtain_R_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_curtain_R_01.description: Heavy curtains that can block the light. When pulled down, they ensure that your privacy remains undisturbed.

furni_nightView_ceilingLight1_01.name: Grand Six-Candle Chandelier
furni_nightView_ceilingLight1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_ceilingLight1_01.description: Luxurious chandeliers capable of illuminating the entire room. This complex Leithanian furniture requires specific gestures or voice activation.

furni_nightView_ceilingLight2_01.name: Four-Candle Chandelier
furni_nightView_ceilingLight2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_ceilingLight2_01.description: A simple chandelier inserted with special Originium candles. Easy to control, and can be turned on or off by clapping your hands.

furni_nightView_wallpaper_01.name: Panoramic Display (Leithanian Nights)
furni_nightView_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_wallpaper_01.description: A display showing the night view overlooking Leithanien. The window frame portion cannot be removed, and the panoramic projection of the night scenery makes it difficult to tell where you are.

furni_nightView_floor_01.name: Leithanian Wood Floorboards
furni_nightView_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_nightView_floor_01.description: Floorboards made from local Leithanian lumber. Fine arts, music, and Originium Arts are the immutable gems of Leithanien.

furni_office_table_01.name: Standard-Issue Workdesk
furni_office_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_table_01.description: Standard-issue Rhodes Island desks with dual displays, mechanical keyboards, and a file storage rack. We encourage a 'relaxed and comfortable' environment at the office, but be mindful of the deadlines!

furni_office_chair_01.name: Standard-Issue Office Chair
furni_office_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_chair_01.description: A standard-issue Rhodes Island office chair. Put your head down gently as you fade in and out of consciousness, and the day will soon be over.

furni_office_storageBox_01.name: Wheeled Storage Cabinet
furni_office_storageBox_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_storageBox_01.description: A movable storage cabinet with wheels. Can be used to store documents or snacks, but the latter is vastly preferred.

furni_office_carpet_01.name: Black Office Carpet
furni_office_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_carpet_01.description: Mass-produced black carpets found just about everywhere in Rhodes Island. According to our data, 80% of carpet cleaning causes are related to beverage spills (not including damage).

furni_office_waterDispenser_01.name: Water Dispenser
furni_office_waterDispenser_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_waterDispenser_01.description: A water dispenser found in just about every office. Resupplying and changing these heavy water containers for your colleagues can garner a lot of favor, but be mindful of your limits.

furni_office_column_01.name: Support Column
furni_office_column_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_column_01.description: A load-bearing supporting structure that can sometimes be used as a partition. Some operators like to use these pillars for stress release, so please make sure you choose the right ones for your usage!

furni_office_directionSign_01.name: Cubicle Floorplan
furni_office_directionSign_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_directionSign_01.description: Horizontal panel representing the offices of the personnel in the office. The design expert in the HR Department came up with an ingenious solution, but it's a pity that nobody ever reads it.

furni_office_sign_01.name: Floor Indicator
furni_office_sign_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_sign_01.description: A sign indicating which floor you're on. It says turn left here for elevators, escalators, and stairs, but this may not be accurate relative to your room.

furni_office_spotlight_01.name: HR Office Lighting
furni_office_spotlight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_spotlight_01.description: An auxiliary light source for the office. A consistently well-lit office can benefit motivation and stave off sleepiness.

furni_office_downlight_01.name: Cubicle Lightning
furni_office_downlight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_downlight_01.description: Overhead office ceiling lights. Since there have been incidents of certain operators making things catch on fire, please avoid direct exposure to flammable objects, especially fluffy tails.

furni_office_screen_01.name: Transparent Dividing Partition
furni_office_screen_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_screen_01.description: A partition used to split off two areas. Often accompanied by heavy-duty office supplies, to spectacular effect.

furni_office_printer_01.name: Overloaded Printer
furni_office_printer_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_printer_01.description: A printer that frequently requires repair. Because it's always running at full capacity, it's bound to explode sooner or later.

furni_office_sofaStool_01.name: Square Sofa Stool
furni_office_sofaStool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_sofaStool_01.description: A low sofa stool that is almost ubiquitous across the offices. Offers a nice place to stay when waiting for massive documents to finish printing, and sometimes even lets you catch some pieces of gossip.

furni_office_houseplant_01.name: Prickly Ornamental Plant
furni_office_houseplant_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_houseplant_01.description: A green plant that makes for excellent ornamentation. Due to the sharp leaves that can prick anyone who touches it, this potted plant has survived both sticky and slippery fingers alike.

furni_office_wallpaper_01.name: HR Office Wallpaper
furni_office_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_wallpaper_01.description: Special wallpaper for the Rhodes Island HR Office. Pieces of relevant information, including location, division, and surroundings, have been clearly marked.

furni_office_floor_01.name: HR Office Floorboards
furni_office_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_office_floor_01.description: Flooring commonly used throughout Rhodes Island. A nave operator might follow the yellow road and bump into something not too far away.

furni_bolivar_sofa_01.name: Tribal Sofa
furni_bolivar_sofa_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_sofa_01.description: A rainforest tribe-style sofa. Quite uncomfortable because it's just a piece of wood.

furni_bolivar_carpet_01.name: Tribal Carpet
furni_bolivar_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_carpet_01.description: A rainforest tribe-style carpet. Nobody has the patience to make carpets there, leading to a continuous increase in the price of carpets.

furni_bolivar_pot_01.name: Totem Pot
furni_bolivar_pot_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_pot_01.description: A rainforest tribe-style clay pot. Those who can't work with clay have no right to call themselves a local.

furni_bolivar_soundSystem_01.name: Totem Speakers
furni_bolivar_soundSystem_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_soundSystem_01.description: A rainforest tribe-style speaker system. These obsolete sacrificial supplies have been repurposed to something much better.

furni_bolivar_fireplace_01.name: Interior Heater
furni_bolivar_fireplace_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_fireplace_01.description: A rainforest tribe-style heater. It's actually an oven for grilling food.
furni_bolivar_fireplace_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_bolivar_pottedplant_01.name: Tropical Potted Plant
furni_bolivar_pottedplant_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_pottedplant_01.description: Rainforest tribe-style potted plants. These fast-growing tropical plants will quickly fill the room if left unattended.
furni_bolivar_pottedplant_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_bolivar_coffeeTable_01.name: Tribal Stone Stand
furni_bolivar_coffeeTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_coffeeTable_01.description: A rainforest tribe-style stone stand with miscellaneous artifacts on top. Things to eat, things to drink, things to use. Just toss everything over there.
furni_bolivar_coffeeTable_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_bolivar_bed_01.name: Tribal Loft Bed
furni_bolivar_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_bed_01.description: A rainforest tribe-style bed, with a decorated frame. All the plants are alive and will entangle sleeping occupants if not pruned back regularly.
furni_bolivar_bed_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_bolivar_ceilinglamp_01.name: Tribal Decorative Chandelier
furni_bolivar_ceilinglamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_ceilinglamp_01.description: Rainforest tribe-style chandeliers. There are always people who try to swing on the dangly bits. Turns out, the frequency of replacement is proportional to the density of children.

furni_bolivar_curtain_01.name: Tribal Decorative Curtains
furni_bolivar_curtain_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_curtain_01.description: Rainforest tribe-style curtains. You'll get chewed out for pulling them off. Children who boldly take this risk will be dubbed 'Small Chieftains' and then be scolded half to death.

furni_bolivar_column_01.name: Tribal Stone Pillar
furni_bolivar_column_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_column_01.description: A rainforest tribe-style stone pillar. The importance of pillars in the rainforest is clearly self-evident.

furni_bolivar_wall_01.name: Tribal Stone Wall
furni_bolivar_wall_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_wall_01.description: A rainforest tribe-style stone wall. In the rainforest, walls are mere decorations.

furni_bolivar_wallpaper_01.name: Panoramic Display (Rainforest)
furni_bolivar_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_wallpaper_01.description: A panoramic display showing the splendor of the rainforest. It fully simulates the environment surrounding a rainforest tribe, and even the call of wild beasts can be heard.

furni_bolivar_floor_01.name: Tribal Floor Tiles
furni_bolivar_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bolivar_floor_01.description: Sturdy and durable floor tiles made using tribal techniques. Guests sit in the mud. Friends get to lie on the tiles.

furni_midAutumn_screen_01.name: Carved Wooden Partition
furni_midAutumn_screen_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_screen_01.description: Wooden partitions imported from Yan. Blocks out the autumn wind, but receives all your guests with a warm welcome.
furni_midAutumn_screen_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_cabinet_01.name: Cubic Storage Chest
furni_midAutumn_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_cabinet_01.description: A traditional chest imported from Yan with endless uses. Where could all the treasures be?
furni_midAutumn_cabinet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_pottedplant_01.name: Potted Tree
furni_midAutumn_pottedplant_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_pottedplant_01.description: A potted plant seemingly brought in from elsewhere. The plant is still budding and not suitable for outdoors.
furni_midAutumn_pottedplant_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_floorLamp_01.name: Tall Candlestand
furni_midAutumn_floorLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_floorLamp_01.description: A candlelight commonly found in Yan households. Bright and luminous, symbolizing a family's harmony.
furni_midAutumn_floorLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_table_01.name: Low Height Table
furni_midAutumn_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_table_01.description: A long table with all kinds of festive delights laid out on top. Invite all your friends and family, and gather around the table as you enjoy the beauties of the seasons.
furni_midAutumn_table_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_stool_01.name: Round Wooden Stool
furni_midAutumn_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_stool_01.description: A wooden stool found in all Yan households. With all the fine treats on the table, who wouldn't want to get seated and chow in right away?
furni_midAutumn_stool_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_stove_01.name: Originium Water Boiler
furni_midAutumn_stove_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_stove_01.description: A water boiler that uses Originium as its heat source. Brings your water to a turbulent boil, and brews up a storm in your teacups.
furni_midAutumn_stove_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_sofa_01.name: Modern Yan Chaise Lounge
furni_midAutumn_sofa_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_sofa_01.description: A traditional chaise lounge improved with western sensibilities. Why not take a quick nap before participating in the festivities again?
furni_midAutumn_sofa_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_stool2_01.name: Extended Footstool
furni_midAutumn_stool2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_stool2_01.description: A footstool for resting your feet. Raises your poems and songs to a whole new level along with your feet.
furni_midAutumn_stool2_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_carpet_01.name: Vermillion Carpet
furni_midAutumn_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_carpet_01.description: A carpet commonly found in Yan househounds. Travel broadens yours horizons, but there is no better place to be than home when it comes time to celebrate.
furni_midAutumn_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_handLamp_01.name: Basket Lantern
furni_midAutumn_handLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_handLamp_01.description: A candle-lit lantern. Its shadow twitches to the candlelight's flicker, as another year has come and pass.
furni_midAutumn_handLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_ornaments_01.name: Framed Calligraphy
furni_midAutumn_ornaments_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_ornaments_01.description: A framed calligraphy artwork. Even a few strokes scrawled on the spur of the moment can be a display for the ages.
furni_midAutumn_ornaments_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_ceilingLight_01.name: Red Silken Decorative Lamp
furni_midAutumn_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_ceilingLight_01.description: A red silken decorative hanging lamp. Its frabic hangs solemnly above the hall, swaying serenely as the breeze blows past.
furni_midAutumn_ceilingLight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_ceilingLamp_01.name: Pagoda Light
furni_midAutumn_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_ceilingLamp_01.description: A hanging light shaped like a pagoda. The view of these lamps alit can jubilate masses from far and wide.
furni_midAutumn_ceilingLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_window_01.name: Panoramic Display (Moonlight)
furni_midAutumn_window_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_window_01.description: A display panel showcasing the full moon. Stay after moonrise tonight, for the heavenly body is a sight to be marveled at.
furni_midAutumn_window_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_wallpaper_01.name: Yan Hall Wallpaper
furni_midAutumn_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_wallpaper_01.description: A style of wallpaper used during Yan festivities. Its vermillion patterns rejuvenates drab walls, as lanterns light up the moon up above.
furni_midAutumn_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_midAutumn_floor_01.name: Yan Wooden Flooring
furni_midAutumn_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_midAutumn_floor_01.description: Traditional wooden flooring used in Yan. Set foot on stable ground, and the confidence can carry you to new heights.
furni_midAutumn_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_cabinet_H_01.name: Weapon Armoire
furni_fNearl_cabinet_H_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_cabinet_H_01.description: An armoire containing the Nearls' battle armor, the family heirloom. The armor's current user is Maria.

furni_fNearl_calendar_01.name: Training Calendar
furni_fNearl_calendar_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_calendar_01.description: A calendar for recording training results and competition dates. Several pages full of red checkmarks have been torn away.

furni_fNearl_sofaStool_R_01.name: Sofa Stool (Round)
furni_fNearl_sofaStool_R_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_sofaStool_R_01.description: A round, black sofa stool. When she's not standing atop the chessboard, the queen is but a meaningless carving.

furni_fNearl_sofa_M_01.name: Extended Sofa (White)
furni_fNearl_sofa_M_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_sofa_M_01.description: A soft, milk-white sofa of extended length. Just the perfect size for an exhausted knight to lie down and get some rest.
furni_fNearl_sofa_M_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_sofa_S_01.name: Sofa for One (White)
furni_fNearl_sofa_S_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_sofa_S_01.description: A sofa, milk-white sofa. Just the perfect size for a worrywart knight to sit down and relax their mind.
furni_fNearl_sofa_S_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_sofaStool_S_01.name: Sofa Stool (Square)
furni_fNearl_sofaStool_S_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_sofaStool_S_01.description: A large, rectangular sofa with Zofia's cape flung on top. Though it came with a cushion, a certain knight has stubbornly been placing it on other sofas.
furni_fNearl_sofaStool_S_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_coffeeTable_01.name: Simple Coffee Table
furni_fNearl_coffeeTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_coffeeTable_01.description: A low coffee table with a glass top. You can't get checkmated if there isn't a king in the chess set. *Taps forehead*
furni_fNearl_coffeeTable_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_potted_01.name: Sunflower Pot
furni_fNearl_potted_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_potted_01.description: A pot of sunflowers purchased at the florist. Judging by how it's started to wither, that was also the last time anyone has taken care of the flowers.
furni_fNearl_potted_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_carpet_01.name: Plush Carpet (White)
furni_fNearl_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_carpet_01.description: A plush carpet that looks brand new, which either means it was recently given a deep clean, or it's actually brand new.
furni_fNearl_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_fNearl_wallDecor_01.name: Sanctified Kuranta Statue
furni_fNearl_wallDecor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_wallDecor_01.description: An art piece from the old mansion. Mounted on the wall, just like before. 'Fear neither hardship nor darkness'.

furni_fNearl_banner_01.name: Decorative Banner
furni_fNearl_banner_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_banner_01.description: A banner for decorating the statue. 'Darkness shan't overshadow light'.

furni_fNearl_shelf_01.name: Marble Table
furni_fNearl_shelf_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_shelf_01.description: A table with an assortment of odds and ends on top: things that haven't been mailed, haven't been read, or haven't been completed.

furni_fNearl_branchDecor_01.name: 'Ashen White Twig Tree'
furni_fNearl_branchDecor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_branchDecor_01.description: A twig tree used as decoration. The best parts of the tree were used to make carbines, and the knights took home the leftovers to decorate the place.

furni_fNearl_cabinet_L_01.name: Classic Showcase
furni_fNearl_cabinet_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_cabinet_L_01.description: A showcase displaying all sorts of honors and trophies. A certain training maniac seems to have forgotten to put their shield back.

furni_fNearl_sink_01.name: Wash Basin
furni_fNearl_sink_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_sink_01.description: An expensive wash basin placed next to the door. Knights are to wash their hands after returning from duty, and it's often used to wash up, both hands and faces.

furni_fNearl_wateringCan_01.name: Watering Can
furni_fNearl_wateringCan_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_wateringCan_01.description: A watering can with a narrow spout used to water indoor plants. It's so seldom used that you could probably plant something inside.

furni_fNearl_ceilingLight_01.name: Jade Ceiling Light (Large)
furni_fNearl_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_ceilingLight_01.description: A large jade ceiling light with multiple lamps. Cheap and affordable. Casts lots of shadows on wherever it illuminates.

furni_fNearl_ceilingLight2_01.name: Jade Ceiling Lamp (Small)
furni_fNearl_ceilingLight2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_ceilingLight2_01.description: A small jade ceiling light. Cheap and affordable. Never lights up a place enough.

furni_fNearl_wallpaper_01.name: Chivalrous Wallpaper
furni_fNearl_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_wallpaper_01.description: Wallpaper commonly used by knights and nobility. Instead of a room that could be described as knightly, Maria would rather have her own workshop.

furni_fNearl_floor_01.name: Courtly Floor Tiles
furni_fNearl_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_fNearl_floor_01.description: Floor tiles commonly used by knights and nobility. Zofia doesn't mull over the details, and just lets her designers do their job unattended.

furni_activity_ceiling_01.name: Hanging Wooden Pallet
furni_activity_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_ceiling_01.description: A handmade decorative pallet hung on the ceiling with lights installed. Don't jump on top of it, don't hang yourself upside down from it, and definitely don't fall asleep while doing that!
furni_activity_ceiling_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_hangingChair_01.name: Swingy Sofa
furni_activity_hangingChair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_hangingChair_01.description: An extra comfy hammock sofa. Can be used as a bed. Suzuran can sometimes be seen lounging on the sofa with her tails stretched.
furni_activity_hangingChair_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_fence_V_01.name: Wooden Stakes (Vertical)
furni_activity_fence_V_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_fence_V_01.description: A set of wooden stakes installed vertically. Kids frequently get their hands stuck between the gaps.
furni_activity_fence_V_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_column_01.name: Palisade Pillar
furni_activity_column_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_column_01.description: A pillar used with the stakes. Very sturdy. Not even Popukar can break it... probably.
furni_activity_column_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_fence_S_01.name: Wooden Stakes (Horizontal)
