furni_activity_fence_S_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_fence_S_01.description: A set of wooden stakes installed horizontally. Kids like to grind their nails with it.
furni_activity_fence_S_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_rod_01.name: Wooden Hanging Rod
furni_activity_rod_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_rod_01.description: A rod used to decorate the playroom. The rod was installed by renovation operators, while the rope and the flags were added by the young operators.
furni_activity_rod_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_carpet_01.name: Puzzle Carpet
furni_activity_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_carpet_01.description: A carpet woven by the kid operators with the help of a weaver. You could probably make a felt cloth about the size of a cup with all that fur (or perhaps hair) that gets vacuumed out each day.
furni_activity_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_showcase_01.name: Water-filled Showcase
furni_activity_showcase_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_showcase_01.description: A wall-mounted showcase simulating an underwater environment. This is how a lot of our little buddies learn about life underwater.
furni_activity_showcase_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_cabinet_01.name: Toy Cabinet
furni_activity_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_cabinet_01.description: A modified sliding door kitchen cabinet. This is where our little buddies store their favorite toys.
furni_activity_cabinet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_potted_01.name: Leafy Green Plant
furni_activity_potted_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_potted_01.description: A fast-growing potted plant. Doesn't seem to have been overwatered. If Bubble is in the room, be sure to keep her away from the plant!
furni_activity_potted_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_refrigerator_01.name: Big Tumbly Fridge
furni_activity_refrigerator_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_refrigerator_01.description: A washing machine modified into a refrigerator. The fridge has been filled up with snacks. Having lots of candy and desserts is good for both your body and mind. All the little ones know that.
furni_activity_refrigerator_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_downlight_01.name: Rectangular Brass Ceiling Light
furni_activity_downlight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_downlight_01.description: A rectangular brass ceiling light, bathing the room in light all while warmly overwatching the children during their playtime.
furni_activity_downlight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_stool_01.name: Little Yellow Stool
furni_activity_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_stool_01.description: The youngsters' favorite round little stool. For safety reasons, the seat is not rotatable.
furni_activity_stool_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_artSet_01.name: Watercolor Painting Set
furni_activity_artSet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_artSet_01.description: A set of watercolors for children. Everyone who has taken a painting class knows that you'd get kicked out by the art teacher if you dared to put paper underneath the easel. Thankfully, this is just a toy set.
furni_activity_artSet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_calendar_01.name: Funtimes Calendar
furni_activity_calendar_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_calendar_01.description: A calendar that marks all the game room activities. As the young operators look forward to each coming day, they are also growing day by day.
furni_activity_calendar_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_tent_01.name: Happy Breaktime Tent
furni_activity_tent_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_tent_01.description: A comfy little tent. Big enough for a little operator to fall asleep inside.
furni_activity_tent_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_handLamp_01.name: Bamboo Originium Lantern
furni_activity_handLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_handLamp_01.description: An Originium lamp placed inside a bamboo basket. Very safe. There is actually a glass shield inside the lantern, keeping the more curious kids from hurting themselves.
furni_activity_handLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_lowPartition_01.name: Stubby Low Wall
furni_activity_lowPartition_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_lowPartition_01.description: A low wall made specifically based on how tall the young operators are. There is a can of ball-shaped candy on the wall. Don't eat too many of them at once.
furni_activity_lowPartition_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_halfColumn_01.name: Low Wall Pillar
furni_activity_halfColumn_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_halfColumn_01.description: A pillar that goes with the low wall. It really puts your mind at ease knowing that you're enveloped.
furni_activity_halfColumn_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_wallpaper_01.name: Cartoon Wallpaper
furni_activity_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_wallpaper_01.description: A wallpaper designed by the children themselves. They had never been happier, seeing their own doodles turn into reality. On the wall, at least.
furni_activity_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_activity_floor_01.name: Sparkling Clean Flooring
furni_activity_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_activity_floor_01.description: Floorboards that the kids helped install. It's so much fun to do your part putting the room together while learning about responsibility.
furni_activity_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_kitchen_bed_01.name: Simple Bed
furni_kitchen_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_bed_01.description: An undecorated bed. Simple and clean.
furni_kitchen_bed_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_framed_01.name: Photoless Frames
furni_kitchen_framed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_framed_01.description: A set of photo frames of different sizes. Let your imaginations run wild.
furni_kitchen_framed_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_airPurifier_01.name: Air Purifier
furni_kitchen_airPurifier_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_airPurifier_01.description: A must-have machine for maintaining the room's air quality. Like a breath of fresh air.
furni_kitchen_airPurifier_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_partition_01.name: Area Separation Decoration
furni_kitchen_partition_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_partition_01.description: A designer decoration used to partition an open space. Like a clean cut.
furni_kitchen_partition_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_ceilingLight_01.name: Round Decorative Lighting
furni_kitchen_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_ceilingLight_01.description: A small decorative light source that helps enhance the room's appearance. A bright idea.
furni_kitchen_ceilingLight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_wallSticker_01.name: Rock Wallpaper
furni_kitchen_wallSticker_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_wallSticker_01.description: A set of black stone peels made using the highest quality materia. Naturally hard as a rock yet mismatched.
furni_kitchen_wallSticker_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_carpet_01.name: Thin Rug
furni_kitchen_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_carpet_01.description: A rug added out of practicality. Snug as a bug in a rug.
furni_kitchen_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_downlight_01.name: Ceiling Panel Lighting
furni_kitchen_downlight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_downlight_01.description: A large light panel that illuminates the whole room. Fluorescent and lustrous.
furni_kitchen_downlight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_ceiling_01.name: Ceiling Light Fixture
furni_kitchen_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_ceiling_01.description: A suspended light fixture that brightens up the area underneath. This unique light is bound to not leave you hanging.
furni_kitchen_ceiling_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_lamp_01.name: Tripod Lamp
furni_kitchen_lamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_lamp_01.description: A tripod floor lamp that adds a warm glow to your decor, yet can stand on its own.
furni_kitchen_lamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_wallArt_01.name: Modern Artpiece
furni_kitchen_wallArt_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_wallArt_01.description: A piece of wall art that can only be understood by its creator. A design of perfection.
furni_kitchen_wallArt_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_ceilingLamps_01.name: Hanging Lights
furni_kitchen_ceilingLamps_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_ceilingLamps_01.description: A set of ceiling lights arranged specifically for the perfect balance, all in harmony with one another.
furni_kitchen_ceilingLamps_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_worktop_01.name: Embedded Kitchen Unit
furni_kitchen_worktop_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_worktop_01.description: A complete kitchen unit built into the wall. Perfect for cooking and include everything but the kitchen sink.
furni_kitchen_worktop_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_islandWorktop_01.name: Multipurpose Counter Space
furni_kitchen_islandWorktop_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_islandWorktop_01.description: A counter space designed for many different purposes. The possibilities are endless.
furni_kitchen_islandWorktop_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_oven_01.name: Upright Kitchen Set
furni_kitchen_oven_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_oven_01.description: A vertical kitchen set with built-in storage. Keeps your kitchen in apple-pie order.
furni_kitchen_oven_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_stool_01.name: Simple Kitchen Stool
furni_kitchen_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_stool_01.description: A stool made using the minimum amount of materials. Practical and understated, just the bare necessities.
furni_kitchen_stool_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_pottedPlant_01.name: Tall Potted Plant
furni_kitchen_pottedPlant_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_pottedPlant_01.description: A unique, different, yet indispensable potted plant. Adds a touch of nature.
furni_kitchen_pottedPlant_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_wallpaper_01.name: Minimalist Wallpaper
furni_kitchen_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_wallpaper_01.description: A minimalistic wallpaper design. Its uniform design helps you see what sticks on the wall.
furni_kitchen_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_kitchen_floor_01.name: Minimalist Flooring
furni_kitchen_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kitchen_floor_01.description: A minimally-processed flooring design. Helps you break new ground.
furni_kitchen_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from Furniture Store or dropped from some stages

furni_prison_device_01.name: Safety Inspection Device
furni_prison_device_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_device_01.description: A large device used to check for carried items when inmates move about the prison. The circulation of goods amongst inmates must be strictly controlled.

furni_prison_waitingArea_01.name: Security Equipment
furni_prison_waitingArea_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_waitingArea_01.description: Electronic equipment that will sound an alarm and alert the guards when it detects inmates carrying out prohibited actions. It is often out of service due to 'unknown reasons'.
furni_prison_waitingArea_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_prison_partition1_01.name: Barrier
furni_prison_partition1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_partition1_01.description: A measure to block off areas and limit the inmates' freedom of movement. 'You, over here. New guy, that side.'

furni_prison_ceilingLight_01.name: Prison Cell Ceiling Light
furni_prison_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_ceilingLight_01.description: Lighting fixtures specially developed and produced in Columbia, with an extremely low rate of failure. Because of that, the prison guards can easily attribute any damage to the lighting to the inmates' misbehavior.

furni_prison_vent_01.name: Prison Cell Vent
furni_prison_vent_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_vent_01.description: An indispensable piece of ventilation equipment for confined spaces. Fresh air is one of the few mercies granted to the inmates, and they regard it as a beloved treasure.
furni_prison_vent_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_prison_chair_01.name: Prison Chair with Handcuffs
furni_prison_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_chair_01.description: A folding chair equipped with restricting handcuffs. The prison administration had no choice but to add that function to avoid inmates using it as a weapon.

furni_prison_washbasin_01.name: Water Containers
furni_prison_washbasin_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_washbasin_01.description: Just a regular basin and bucket. Prisoners are people too, and people need to live.

furni_prison_mirror_01.name: Embedded Glass Mirror
furni_prison_mirror_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_mirror_01.description: A glass mirror produced and installed according to the designated specifications. Not a single part of it can be used to create weapons or escape tools.

furni_prison_sink_01.name: Personal Wash Basin
furni_prison_sink_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_sink_01.description: Basic washing equipment. The amount of water inmates can use is strictly rationed. This allows the inmates to take care of their hygiene and maintain a basic level of decency.

furni_prison_toilet_01.name: Individual Toilet Bowl
furni_prison_toilet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_toilet_01.description: A standard toilet bowl recently installed across the entire prison. Many of the inmates have never used a toilet bowl before, so they often engage in all sorts of shenanigans when taking care of basic needs.

furni_prison_pipeline_01.name: Exposed Piping
furni_prison_pipeline_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_pipeline_01.description: Exposed water pipes, for ease of maintenance. Rumors say that unruly inmates will be intentionally assigned to cells with broken water pipes.

furni_prison_ceiling_01.name: Metal Suspended Ceiling with Fans
furni_prison_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_ceiling_01.description: A metal suspended ceiling with two fans attached. Since they cannot control the fans, the inmates believe that the administration are just installing the fans for show.

furni_prison_bed_01.name: Double Decker Metal Bed
furni_prison_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_bed_01.description: A metal bed that can be used by two inmates. Special considerations aside, the weaker inmate is often forced to sleep on the upper layer.

furni_prison_partition2_01.name: Half-open Long Bench
furni_prison_partition2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_partition2_01.description: A long bench with a partition, it can be used for both storage and rest. It's not wrong to say that it's the only recreational facility in the prison cell.

furni_prison_thermos_01.name: High-capacity Hot Water Kettle
furni_prison_thermos_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_thermos_01.description: A hot water kettle used to store drinking water. Water is hope, and hot water is greater than hope.

furni_prison_wallpaper_01.name: Prison Wall
furni_prison_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_wallpaper_01.description: Mansfield Prison standard concrete wall. The administration will never allow any inmate the chance to escape.
furni_prison_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_prison_floor_01.name: Prison Tiles
furni_prison_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_prison_floor_01.description: Mansfield Prison standard floor tiles. There are often all sorts of excuses for inmates to cast their gazes at further places instead.
furni_prison_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_partition_01.name: 'Harmony'
furni_village_partition_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_partition_01.description: A partition that consists of two glass panes, forever in harmony together.
furni_village_partition_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_sculpture_01.name: 'Selfhood'
furni_village_sculpture_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_sculpture_01.description: An art piece made of rocks collected by Miss Fumizuki. Many obstinate men have argued over their interpretations before this immovable pile of rocks.
furni_village_sculpture_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_hangingLamp_01.name: 'Suspension'
furni_village_hangingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_hangingLamp_01.description: A set of fluorescent tubes imported from Victoria. Hanging solemnly from the ceiling up above, it won't fall on your head, only provide warmth and light.
furni_village_hangingLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_ceilingDecal_01.name: 'Tenebrosity'
furni_village_ceilingDecal_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_ceilingDecal_01.description: A ceiling decal placed in the room out of design considerations. Shading the light only turns one blind.
furni_village_ceilingDecal_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_fluorescentLamp_01.name: 'Clarity'
furni_village_fluorescentLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_fluorescentLamp_01.description: A long fluorescent light tube designed to blind into its surrounding environment. Brightens up the room and sheds light on everything.
furni_village_fluorescentLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_showcase_01.name: 'Frostbite'
furni_village_showcase_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_showcase_01.description: A slab of rock brought here from Kjerag. The ice crystals will make their way up the rock until they eventually melt away, before freezing and making their way up again. Truly a vicious cycle.
furni_village_showcase_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_whiteColumn_01.name: 'Purity'
furni_village_whiteColumn_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_whiteColumn_01.description: A simple Columbian decoration that comes with a built-in air purifier. Helps freshen up both the air in the room and the hearts of the occupants.
furni_village_whiteColumn_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_poster_01.name: 'Frost'
furni_village_poster_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_poster_01.description: A calligraphy piece penned by Ms. Fumizuki on a whim. The bamboo is from Higashi, the paint is from Dan, and the calligraphy is written in the Yan manner.
furni_village_poster_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_hangingArt_01.name: 'Evergreen'
furni_village_hangingArt_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_hangingArt_01.description: A hand-made hanging wall art depicting a lone pine tree standing in the freezing cold.
furni_village_hangingArt_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_coffeetable_01.name: 'Horizons'
furni_village_coffeetable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_coffeetable_01.description: A low, polygonal desk with unique design sensibilities. Enjoy laughter, tea, and friendly words.
furni_village_coffeetable_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_stool_01.name: 'Whitestone'
furni_village_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_stool_01.description: A mass-produced square white stool. Even if white plays second, white can still reach victory first.
furni_village_stool_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_carpet_01.name: 'Facets'
furni_village_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_carpet_01.description: A bamboo mat imported from Higashi. The lifestyle habits you form as a child will stick with you for the rest of your life.
furni_village_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_screen_01.name: 'Timekeeper'
furni_village_screen_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_screen_01.description: A transparent glass screen capable of displaying time. Order in all things.
furni_village_screen_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_branchDecor_01.name: 'Fabricated Nature'
furni_village_branchDecor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_branchDecor_01.description: An aesthetically pleasing ornament set. Always an object of beauty no matter the sensibilities of the times.
furni_village_branchDecor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_wallpaper_01.name: 'Mountain Snow'
furni_village_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_wallpaper_01.description: A set of display panels displaying a wintry forest. With the harsh realities out of the picture, only the purest emotions remain.
furni_village_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_village_floor_01.name: 'White Sands'
furni_village_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_village_floor_01.description: A set of floor tiles designed to look like white sand. Stillness in dry landscape.
furni_village_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_inkArt_tube_01.name: Inefficacious Brush Container
furni_inkArt_tube_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_tube_01.description: Just a long tube for discarding scrolls. 'When one stops one's brush and loses interest, it is only natural that one would not look to the scroll again.'

furni_inkArt_vase_01.name: Evanescent Plant Vase
furni_inkArt_vase_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_vase_01.description: Just a crockpot with some old lotuses. 'Such is life, and such is the painting.'

furni_inkArt_rack_01.name: 'Unpolished Jade Intertwined'
furni_inkArt_rack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_rack_01.description: Just an iron rack with a few scrolls tied to it. 'Even when colored, unpolished jade is yet unpolished.'
furni_inkArt_rack_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_inkArt_screen1_01.name: Scenic Silken Screens
furni_inkArt_screen1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_screen1_01.description: Just a paper-thin folding screen. 'The beauty of a landscape is fleeting and brief.'
furni_inkArt_screen1_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_inkArt_bonsai_01.name: Unclouded Landscapes
furni_inkArt_bonsai_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_bonsai_01.description: Just a miniature that has lost its vividness. 'It is not yet time to give it a fresh coat of paint.'

furni_inkArt_table_01.name: Imaginative Worktable
furni_inkArt_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_table_01.description: Just a worktable for scrawling down whatever ideas that come to mind. 'The artist is merely a slave to the pen and ink.'
furni_inkArt_table_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_inkArt_incenseStand_01.name: Incensed Pedestal
furni_inkArt_incenseStand_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_incenseStand_01.description: Just your normal incense pot. 'Those are merely wastepapers. Just the perfect thing to throw in the burner.'
furni_inkArt_incenseStand_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_inkArt_bambooInkArt_01.name: Grounded Fabrics
furni_inkArt_bambooInkArt_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_bambooInkArt_01.description: Just a long painting scroll that was installed in the wrong position. 'It's printed? Garbage. Get rid of it.'
furni_inkArt_bambooInkArt_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_inkArt_carpet_01.name: 'Stepping Scrolls'
furni_inkArt_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_carpet_01.description: Just an undyed carpet. 'Think it through before you pick up your brush.'
furni_inkArt_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_inkArt_aquarium_01.name: Stillwater Lotus
furni_inkArt_aquarium_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_aquarium_01.description: Just a water tank with some water lotuses. 'With no roots put down, life and death are up to fate.'

furni_inkArt_bed_01.name: Jaded Daybed
furni_inkArt_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_bed_01.description: Just a daybed for some quick snoozing. 'The night is long as a dream, and the dream is long as the night.'

furni_inkArt_floorLamp_01.name: Fundamental Incandescence
furni_inkArt_floorLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_floorLamp_01.description: Just a slightly modern candlestand. 'Nian would go for even this? Don't want it, then. Take it away.'

furni_inkArt_carpet2_01.name: 'Stepping Water'
furni_inkArt_carpet2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_carpet2_01.description: Just a dyed rectangular rug. 'After the next stroke, just leave it be.'

furni_inkArt_rollerBlind1_01.name: Incisive Drapery (Wide)
furni_inkArt_rollerBlind1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_rollerBlind1_01.description: Just some fabrics rejected as art material. 'The silk is too coarse to be painted on.'

furni_inkArt_rollerBlind2_01.name: Incisive Drapery (Narrow)
furni_inkArt_rollerBlind2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_rollerBlind2_01.description: Just some fabrics that went unused as art material. 'The silk is too fragile. Trying to paint on it would only ruin it, but, as curtains, this is just perfect.'

furni_inkArt_screen2_01.name: Whimsical Projections
furni_inkArt_screen2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_screen2_01.description: Just your regular projection screen. 'Just hang it there. I'll use it test out ideas once something comes to mind.'

furni_inkArt_fluorescentLamp_01.name: Conventional Incandescence
furni_inkArt_fluorescentLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_fluorescentLamp_01.description: Just the room's light source. 'It's so bright that it hurts my eyesYou want me to turn this knob? OhMuch better.'

furni_inkArt_ceilingLight_01.name: Suspended Incandescence
furni_inkArt_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_ceilingLight_01.description: Just a modern lantern. 'Stop installing lanterns! Out, all of you! I'll paint them myself!'

furni_inkArt_wallpaper_01.name: 'Picturesque Landscapes'
furni_inkArt_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_wallpaper_01.description: Just a wallpaper that can be painted on at will. 'What do you see in these few hollow strokes?'

furni_inkArt_floor_01.name: Water-like Vitrified Tiles
furni_inkArt_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_inkArt_floor_01.description: Just a set of flooring from Yan. 'A paintbrush can bring all there is to their conclusions, yet...'

furni_R6_dirtyBomb_01.name: Defense Target
furni_R6_dirtyBomb_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_dirtyBomb_01.description: Defense target used by Team Rainbow during training. Tear gas is automatically released once the training is over and a victor is determined.
furni_R6_dirtyBomb_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_R6_ADS_01.name: Projectile Interception System
furni_R6_ADS_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_ADS_01.description: Loadout equipment of a Team Rainbow operator. Capable of shooting down explosive projectiles in its surroundings, Rhodes Island operators included.

furni_R6_rtilaElectroclaw_01.name: Throwable Discharge Device
furni_R6_rtilaElectroclaw_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_rtilaElectroclaw_01.description: Loadout equipment of a Team Rainbow operator. When thrown, can attach and continuously discharge electricity. Certain Originium Arts can achieve similar effects.

furni_R6_CCEShield_01.name: Light Electro Shield
furni_R6_CCEShield_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_CCEShield_01.description: Loadout equipment of a Team Rainbow operator. Capable of blocking enemy fire as well as slowing down enemies with its high voltage electric discharge. Unlikely to be useful against Liskarm.

furni_R6_desk_01.name: Conference Table
furni_R6_desk_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_desk_01.description: A long table commonly found in Team Rainbow's training grounds. Often used by the defense team during briefing, and equally as likely to be shot up to pieces during combat training.
furni_R6_desk_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_R6_seat_L_01.name: Comfy Chair (Left)
furni_R6_seat_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_seat_L_01.description: A comfortable sofa chair. It is often used by defenders as a hiding spot and can also be used to catch a breather when under suppressive fire.
furni_R6_seat_L_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_R6_seat_R_01.name: Comfy Chair (Right)
furni_R6_seat_R_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_seat_R_01.description: A comfortable sofa chair. Frequently used by attackers to stay out of the enemies' line of sight, a perfect opportunity to get the upper hand on resting, unsuspecting members of the defense team.
furni_R6_seat_R_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_R6_carpet_01.name: Welcome Mat
furni_R6_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_carpet_01.description: A standard, red carpet rolled out to welcome distinguished guests; it also means that you cannot destroy the floor underneath.
furni_R6_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_R6_blackMirrors_01.name: Removable One-Way Mirror
furni_R6_blackMirrors_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_blackMirrors_01.description: Loadout equipment of a Team Rainbow operator. Comes already installed on a reinforced wall. Would be nice if there were no traces of its installation on the other side.

furni_R6_reinforceWall_01.name: Portable Reinforcement Device
furni_R6_reinforceWall_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_reinforceWall_01.description: A reinforcement device frequently used by Team Rainbow to fortify fragile, breachable walls. The odds that these reinforcement devices get destroyed are supposedly higher than that of normal walls.

furni_R6_shockWire_01.name: Portable Generator
furni_R6_shockWire_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_shockWire_01.description: Loadout equipment of a Team Rainbow operator. Can be used to electrify reinforcements to prevent its destruction. Can nonetheless be disabled by its nemesis, the EMP.

furni_R6_wood_01.name: Reinforcement Debris
furni_R6_wood_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_wood_01.description: Debris from the wall's reinforcement. Though nothing more than bits and pieces of regular shards and rubble, they can provide considerable tactical advantage in great numbers.

furni_R6_deployableShield_01.name: Portable Shield
furni_R6_deployableShield_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_deployableShield_01.description: A tactical shield that can be quickly deployed to provide defensive cover and fortification. They are bulletproof, but they don't stand a chance against any explosives.

furni_R6_shumikhaLauncher_01.name: Portable Turret
furni_R6_shumikhaLauncher_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_shumikhaLauncher_01.description: The Loadout equipment previously used by Tachanka. It can be used to provide defensive functions and continuous firepower. These days, he carries it around himself to rain fire on his enemies.

furni_R6_grzmotMine_01.name: Adhesive Stun Grenade
furni_R6_grzmotMine_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_grzmotMine_01.description: Loadout equipment of a Team Rainbow operator. Can be stuck to walls and detonated when enemies are nearby. Very few people know how it's able to tell friendlies and hostiles apart.

furni_R6_signalDisruptor_01.name: Signal Disruptor
furni_R6_signalDisruptor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_signalDisruptor_01.description: Loadout equipment of a Team Rainbow operator. Very versatile as it can be used to jam all signals, and most famously known for its ability to reduce cell phone reception to nil.

furni_R6_downlight_R_01.name: Exhibition Room Main Ceiling Light
furni_R6_downlight_R_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.

furni_R6_downlight_C_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.

furni_R6_downlight2_C_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_downlight2_C_01.description: Lights that have been turned off in the training grounds. To conserve energy, some lights are turned off during training.

furni_R6_newspaperRack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.

furni_R6_emergencyLight_01.name: Emergency Light
furni_R6_emergencyLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_emergencyLight_01.description: An emergency light source that only lights up during a power outage. This equipment tells us how people of all races are aware of the importance of safety and emergency contingencies.
furni_R6_emergencyLight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_R6_camera_01.name: Surveillance Camera
furni_R6_camera_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_camera_01.description: A surveillance camera used to monitor the training area. Very easily hackable. The Team Rainbow operators have explained that this is implemented to ensure the fairness between the training's two teams.

furni_R6_wallpaper_01.name: Destructible Walls
furni_R6_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_wallpaper_01.description: The wallpaper used in the special equipment exhibition room. All signs of damage are merely for demonstrative purposes. Please refrain from causing any actual damage.

furni_R6_floor_01.name: Indestructible Floor Tiles
furni_R6_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_R6_floor_01.description: The floor tiles used in the special equipment exhibition room. In theory, their detonation devices should be more than capable of blasting through these tiles, but Operator Ash insisted it was an impossible task. Why would that be?

furni_bauhaus_sofa_01.name: Simple Modular Sofa
furni_bauhaus_sofa_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_sofa_01.description: A modular sofa designed with practicality in mind. It can be rearranged according to the user's needs. By discarding all unnecessary embellishments, it is possible to spend more of the budget on improving the product itself.

furni_bauhaus_coffeeTable_01.name: Rectangular Tea Table
furni_bauhaus_coffeeTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_coffeeTable_01.description: A tea table constructed with two different types of materials. Sometimes, the different materials coming together to form a single piece is the very thing that gives it its beauty.

furni_bauhaus_cabinet_01.name: Low Wooden Cabinet
furni_bauhaus_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_cabinet_01.description: A wooden cabinet with a huge capacity built by piecing together commonly used wood materials. Its emphasis on practicality is one of the reasons the Walter styles are such a sensation.

furni_bauhaus_framedWallArt_01.name: Modern Photo Frame
furni_bauhaus_framedWallArt_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_framedWallArt_01.description: A few framed prints of trendy photographs. A revolution takes time to settle in.

furni_bauhaus_floorLamp_01.name: Pedestal Spotlight
furni_bauhaus_floorLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_floorLamp_01.description: A floor lamp resembling industrial equipment. Its light is concentrated on one spot. Less is more.

furni_bauhaus_window_01.name: Windows With Closed Curtains
furni_bauhaus_window_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_window_01.description: A closely shut double window decorated with curtains made with the newest materials. It lets in just enough light to stoke consumers' purchase desires.

furni_bauhaus_decoration_01.name: Moonshadow Decoration
furni_bauhaus_decoration_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_decoration_01.description: An avant-garde decoration based on moonlight and moon shadow motifs. This particular piece is a prime example of the Leithanians' penchant for integrating the two moons into their art pieces.

furni_bauhaus_branchDecor_01.name: Light Tube Tree
furni_bauhaus_branchDecor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_branchDecor_01.description: A tree branch made of light tubes pieced together in a showcase. The minimalist materials allow one to imagine it blossoming.

furni_bauhaus_tableLamp_01.name: Cherry Red Cabinet
furni_bauhaus_tableLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_tableLamp_01.description: A compact cabinet with just enough room for a lamp on top. Its precise, vibrant colors helps give everything a breath of fresh air.

furni_bauhaus_ceilingLight_01.name: Quiescent Hanging Light
furni_bauhaus_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_ceilingLight_01.description: A rectangular-shaped ceiling light fabricated with special craftsmanship techniques, creating a perfect, symmetrical end product. The Leithanians' stubbornness does sometimes bring some colorful results.

furni_bauhaus_geometryLight_01.name: Polygonal Ceiling Light
furni_bauhaus_geometryLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_geometryLight_01.description: A ceiling light enveloped by a polygonal fixture. Just the perfect combination of art and technology.

furni_bauhaus_carpet_01.name: Synthetic Fiber Woven Rug
furni_bauhaus_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_carpet_01.description: A carpet made with a new kind of material, which gave it its unparalleled color vibrancy, weight, and quality. The most simple differences introduced in the design's conceptual stages ended up producing a result never before seen.

furni_bauhaus_downlight_01.name: Pair Spotlights
furni_bauhaus_downlight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_downlight_01.description: A set of ceiling spotlights that always comes in pairs. Light itself can also be a kind of design.

furni_bauhaus_wallpaper_01.name: Walter Wallpaper
furni_bauhaus_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_wallpaper_01.description: A tricolor wallpaper that reflects all that the Walter design sensation stands for: The industrial feeling at the expense of that homey feel unique to Leithanian homes.

furni_bauhaus_floor_01.name: Walter Floor Tiles
furni_bauhaus_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bauhaus_floor_01.description: A simple floor tile design that reflects what the Walter style stands for. Its simplicity is a kind of personality. Some like it, while others hate it.

furni_icu_shadowlessLamp_01.name: Multifunctional Imaging System
furni_icu_shadowlessLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_shadowlessLamp_01.description: Basic body scanning and shadowless imaging functions have been integrated. Any and all beneath the illumination of the shadowless array scanning terminal have but a single identity - patient.
furni_icu_shadowlessLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_icu_bed_01.name: Electro-hydraulic Operating Table
furni_icu_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_bed_01.description: The controller facilitates the smooth rise and fall of each moving part. The electro-hydraulic transmission system, supplemented by various control systems, actually does little to alleviate the patient's pain.
furni_icu_bed_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_icu_ventilator_01.name: Mechanical Ventilator
furni_icu_ventilator_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_ventilator_01.description: A patient's lifeline during major medical operations. Having critical life-saving equipment that can continuously operate even during a single point of failure or electrical outage is decisive for the recovery of patients.
furni_icu_ventilator_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_icu_trolley_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_trolley_01.description: Provides medical tools to surgeons on-demand. From bone fragments to stainless steel, the actual utility of medical equipment has never changed.
furni_icu_trolley_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_icu_projector_01.name: Medical Projector
furni_icu_projector_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_projector_01.description: Projects various images as needed. The medium for transmitting information is constantly evolving.

furni_icu_screen_01.name: Roll-Up Projection Screen
furni_icu_screen_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_screen_01.description: This image receptor can be stowed away when necessary. Both the screening and restriction of information have been in place since ancient times.

furni_icu_curtain_01.name: Surgical Cubicle Curtain
furni_icu_curtain_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_curtain_01.description: Partitions the area to avoid contamination. Physical isolation is easily lifted, but internal fear is harder to get rid of.

furni_icu_desk_01.name: Extended Independent Workbench
furni_icu_desk_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_desk_01.description: Management, experimentation, confidentiality. The company's multi-tiered management structure is obviously far too dependent on decision-makers at the top, but at least it beats feudalism.

furni_icu_chair_01.name: Head Physician's Work Chair
furni_icu_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_chair_01.description: The seat belonging to the head of the critical response medic team. Wood has been replaced by polyester fiber and stainless steel, but the person sitting upon it has never been replaced.

furni_icu_stool_01.name: Round Work Stool
furni_icu_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_stool_01.description: A seat for visitors. These round stools produced by industrial assembly lines are guaranteed to be equal in height, but not in quality.

furni_icu_blackboard_01.name: Info Organization Board
furni_icu_blackboard_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_blackboard_01.description: Of the many forms of information synthesis devices, this is the most primitive. Decision-makers are keen to place the most important information before their eyes.

furni_icu_sampleStorage_01.name: Thermostatic Vacuum Storage Box
furni_icu_sampleStorage_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_sampleStorage_01.description: Only used to preserve high-risk Originium medical equipment. Modern storage solutions can extend the shelf life of substances well into the future, but users will still have to follow some natural rules.

furni_icu_downlight1_01.name: Integrated Lighting
furni_icu_downlight1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_downlight1_01.description: A fairly negligible part of Rhodes Island's lighting solutions. Reliable and continuous wide-area lighting was once the privilege of nobles, but now even civilians can enjoy it.

furni_icu_downlight2_01.name: Small Integrated Lighting
furni_icu_downlight2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_downlight2_01.description: A negligible consumption in Rhodes Island's power generation plan. Regardless of class, life has not changed for any beneath the glow of these lights.

furni_icu_wallpaper_01.name: Standard-Issue Medical Department Wallpaper
furni_icu_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_wallpaper_01.description: The style of wallpaper adopted across the Medical Department after all factors were taken into consideration. The standardized environment subtly contributes to a sense of collective comfort.

furni_icu_floor_01.name: Standard-Issue Medical Department Flooring
furni_icu_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_icu_floor_01.description: The style of flooring adopted across the Medical Department after all factors were taken into consideration. Consensus gradually solidifies thought, which in turn leads to prejudice.

furni_abyssal_showcase_01.name: Tourist Storage Cabinet
furni_abyssal_showcase_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_showcase_01.description: Waterproof storage cabinets for use by tourists. For the gir, the Iberians' considerations are dispensable.
furni_abyssal_showcase_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_abyssal_drum_01.name: Relaxation Drum
furni_abyssal_drum_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_drum_01.description: A few beats from these drums prepared especially for tourists can provide both tactile and emotional satisfaction. The three guests all agreed that this should be treated as a piece of fragile furnishing rather than as a musical instrument.
furni_abyssal_drum_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_abyssal_coffeeTable_01.name: Leisure Tea Table
furni_abyssal_coffeeTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_coffeeTable_01.description: A solid wooden tea table with some random things scattered across its surface. A certain guest seems to have left her important pendant in the room.
furni_abyssal_coffeeTable_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_abyssal_sofa_01.name: Comfortable Sofa
furni_abyssal_sofa_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_sofa_01.description: A comfortable sofa prepared for any who might want to spend an afternoon in this room. Unfortunately, nobody fits that bill.
furni_abyssal_sofa_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_abyssal_carpet_01.name: Themed Rug
furni_abyssal_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_carpet_01.description: A rug especially made for the three tourists. Hopefully they will be able to appreciate the resort's sincerity. Nobody notices, nobody cares.
furni_abyssal_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_abyssal_table_01.name: Portable Folding Table
furni_abyssal_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_table_01.description: A laid-out folding table with meals placed on top. Will the food suit the tastes of the guests?

furni_abyssal_chair_01.name: Upholstered Wooden Chair
furni_abyssal_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_chair_01.description: A wooden chair that matches the folding table. For some reason, one guest left in a hurry, forgetting a coat behind.

furni_abyssal_handLamp_01.name: Retro Lantern
furni_abyssal_handLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_handLamp_01.description: The candles in the lantern can burn all day, and there is special personnel who will come replace the candles daily. All the guests have fairly good night vision though, and don't need this.

furni_abyssal_screen_01.name: Folding Screen
furni_abyssal_screen_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_screen_01.description: A folding screen that can quickly establish a private space for guests at any time. We believe that mutual trust and the preservation of privacy should not be confused.

furni_abyssal_equipment_01.name: Tourists' Personal Effects
furni_abyssal_equipment_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_equipment_01.description: Personal effects of the three tourists. There's a musical instrument, a weapon, and a private collection that was moved in from who-knows-where.

furni_abyssal_ceiling_01.name: Wooden-Framed Hanging Light
furni_abyssal_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_ceiling_01.description: A large suspended ceiling inspired by a ship's beams, accompanied by hanging lights. Guests will surely feel a sense of cordiality. Oh, the attendant mistook familiarity for cordiality. What are we going to do?

furni_abyssal_ceilingLamp_01.name: Ocean Tide Chandelier
furni_abyssal_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_ceilingLamp_01.description: A chandelier made to capture an impression of the ocean's tides. Of course, it was based on the Iberians' superficial understanding of the ocean, and we hope that our guests will not be offended.

furni_abyssal_decal_01.name: Wooden Ceiling Frames
furni_abyssal_decal_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_decal_01.description: The ceiling is decorated with uniform wooden frames made by the resort. A warning? A restriction...? Or simply decoration?

furni_abyssal_wallpaper_01.name: Resort Wallpaper
furni_abyssal_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_wallpaper_01.description: The wallpaper of the resort's standard suites. The murals depict sunny Iberian shores and unknown creatures leaping into the air  of course, we know that these are mere conjecture.

furni_abyssal_floor_01.name: Resort Flooring
furni_abyssal_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_abyssal_floor_01.description: The floor tiles of the resort's standard suites. The hotel was never opened, and the tourists were never checked in. The only thing that remains is the hope that there is a warm place within each person's heart.

furni_perfumer_pegboard_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.

furni_perfumer_pegboard_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_perfumer_incenseMachine_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.

furni_perfumer_bar_01.description: The perfuming table in Lena's bedroom. Great for both work and everyday purposes. With all the green and white colors filling up her bedroom, this is her way to add some flashy brightness to the space.

furni_perfumer_flowerPot_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_perfumer_flowerPot_01.description: A flowerbed for plants that need special care. Flowers need doctors, too.

furni_perfumer_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_perfumer_ceilingLight_01.description: A cubic chandelier made of connected six light tubes. Both economical and practical.

furni_perfumer_shelf_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.

furni_perfumer_petHouse_01.description: A little alcove for pets. The pets that rest here include Beanstalk's Metal Crabs, small tuskbeasts, tiny fowlbeasts, and tame burdenbeast babies.
furni_perfumer_petHouse_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_perfumer_shelf2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.

furni_perfumer_vase_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.

furni_perfumer_vase_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_perfumer_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_perfumer_carpet_01.description: A rug with a flowery pattern. Personal preferences often have an effect on how one decorates their rooms.

furni_perfumer_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_perfumer_ceilingLamp_01.description: A designer flower petal chandelier. It doesn't matter whether it's an actual flower; it's just what she likes.

furni_perfumer_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.

furni_perfumer_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_perfumer_floor_01.description: Floor tiles that have been imbued with the aroma of flowers. Always clean and fragrant.

furni_photoStudio_mirror_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_mirror_01.description: A dressing mirror for models. This is how you look at yourself after you finish changing.

furni_photoStudio_abstractArt_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_abstractArt_01.description: An oil painting painted by a certain operator. Since the said operator is not a professional, most spectators aren't as harsh on it as the photos that are taken here.

furni_photoStudio_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_table_01.description: A vanity table for models. If you need any makeup done, this is where you do it.

furni_photoStudio_stool_01.name: Cubic Stool
furni_photoStudio_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_stool_01.description: A short stool for models. You gotta sit down to get your makeup done. Wait up, where'd the makeup artist go?

furni_photoStudio_curtain_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_curtain_01.description: A translucent scroll that acts as a partition. This is Scene trying to tell the other photography hobbyists: Patience is virtue.

furni_photoStudio_desk_01.name: Studio Worktable

furni_photoStudio_desk_01.description: A worktable at the studio. This is where the photographers put all their documents and photos for organization and where they criticize everyone else's work.

furni_photoStudio_chair_01.description: An office chair common to all Rhodes Island offices, just with a different color. Supposedly, if you spin around on it for a while, it'll give you a whole new perspective on things.

furni_photoStudio_rack_01.description: A rack that can be extended and retracted as necessary, used for hanging equipment. You could even hang a whole operator on it. Click's tried it before.

furni_photoStudio_bananaLeaf_01.name: Natural Fanning Leaf
furni_photoStudio_bananaLeaf_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_bananaLeaf_01.description: A banana tree's leaf. Anyone who's ever questioned the winds you can fan with it has all been really blown away.

furni_photoStudio_lighting_01.name: Photoflood Lamp
furni_photoStudio_lighting_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_lighting_01.description: A photoflood lamp that has already been set up. What's that? Click's Drones can light things up too?!

furni_photoStudio_whiteDecor_01.name: Still Photography Teaching Material
furni_photoStudio_whiteDecor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_whiteDecor_01.description: A flower-like art piece used as a teaching material. Though everyone uses the same cameras to take pictures, the results are always wildly different.

furni_photoStudio_posingStool_01.name: Photographer's Chair
furni_photoStudio_posingStool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_posingStool_01.description: A high chair for the photographers. Good for professionals and hobbyists alike.

furni_photoStudio_lightModifier_01.name: Photoshoot Auxiliary Equipment
furni_photoStudio_lightModifier_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_lightModifier_01.description: A set of equipment that no self-respecting photography studio would omit. Supposedly, when Scene needs lighting, she has her whole team of robots roll right up with their lights on. What a high roller!

furni_photoStudio_carpet_01.name: Photo Zone Rug
furni_photoStudio_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_carpet_01.description: A stain-resistant rug used to show which part of the room is for photography use. As Lens would sometimes say for Scene, 'Everything beyond the lens is still picturesque.'

furni_photoStudio_background_01.name: Hanging Screen
furni_photoStudio_background_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_background_01.description: A hanging screen used for decoration. Its primary purpose is to serve as a backdrop for Rhodes Island's photography hobbyists.

furni_photoStudio_ceilingLight_01.name: Sliding Rail Lighting
furni_photoStudio_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_ceilingLight_01.description: A movable light source that illuminates a wide area. Sadly, the wheels got stuck in the rails, so it's not moving anywhere for a while.

furni_photoStudio_wallpaper_01.name: Photo Studio Wallpaper
furni_photoStudio_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_wallpaper_01.description: A wallpaper designed specifically for the photography studio with colors handpicked to resemble nature. All the investors really like it.

furni_photoStudio_floor_01.name: Photo Studio Tiles
furni_photoStudio_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_photoStudio_floor_01.description: Flooring specifically designed for the photography studio with rhombuses that alternate in color. Hardly took the designers any time to come up with this.

furni_westCoast_cabinet_01.name: Treasures Showcase
furni_westCoast_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_cabinet_01.description: A liquor cabinet specially provided by Copa de Oro. 'Enjoy the fine liquors and services we provide. Whatever your wish, we aim to please.'

furni_westCoast_stool_01.name: Seaside-style High Chair
furni_westCoast_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_stool_01.description: A unique seaside-style chair. Thanks to its distinctive design, a lot of patrons like to either take pictures of the chair or get pictures of themselves sitting on the chair taken.

furni_westCoast_palm_01.name: Effervescent Potted Plant
furni_westCoast_palm_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_palm_01.description: A potted tropical plant. Its exuberant growth is a result of science, not natural selection.

furni_westCoast_ceilingLight_01.name: Elegant Wild Chandelier
furni_westCoast_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_ceilingLight_01.description: A chandelier featuring a wild beast surrounded by candle lamps. A prideful animal staring down on its prey. It's about the only thing it can do.
furni_westCoast_ceilingLight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_westCoast_bath_01.name: Temperature-controlled Marble Spa
furni_westCoast_bath_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_bath_01.description: A temperature-controlled hydrotherapy spa adorned with scented candles. Oh, water. If it wasn't for you, how would we ever get a second sun?
furni_westCoast_bath_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_westCoast_bed_01.name: Luxurious Daybed
furni_westCoast_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_bed_01.description: A daybed at the spa with a fur blanket. Most customers most likely don't think about where the blanket came from when they lie down on top to get their treatment.

furni_westCoast_icedPool_01.name: Marble Ice Pool
furni_westCoast_icedPool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_icedPool_01.description: A marble ice pool with lots of ice. Placed inside the break room, it's used to chill fine wine, fresh fruits, and occasionally other weird things.
furni_westCoast_icedPool_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_westCoast_carpet_01.name: Dark Rose Rug
furni_westCoast_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_carpet_01.description: A handcrafted rug with a flower pattern. It's like a hardworking attendant, wiping the customers' feet clean day in and day out.
furni_westCoast_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_westCoast_cactus_01.name: Standing Artificial Landscape
furni_westCoast_cactus_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_cactus_01.description: A standing glass art piece shaped after local plants, comes with lighting. Gaze into the glass decoration, and a broken yet magnificent image of Dossoles will appear before you.
furni_westCoast_cactus_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_westCoast_fireplace_01.name: Metal Fireplace
furni_westCoast_fireplace_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_fireplace_01.description: A metal fireplace. Simple and stylish. In the end, the flames became a mainstay of the home, burning passionately to provide warmth, never to hurt anyone.

furni_westCoast_longBench_01.name: Low Moquette Chair
furni_westCoast_longBench_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_longBench_01.description: A low, red moquette seat for a quick rest. Its soft, springy feel keeps the seat fresh on the customers' mind, and it so happens that the magazines that the attendants give them have order forms.

furni_westCoast_blind_L_01.name: Golden-Lined Drapery (Large)
furni_westCoast_blind_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_blind_L_01.description: Thick, heavy golden-lined drapes. In the designer's mind, each and every piece of furniture is important, and must contribute to the whole room's environment.

furni_westCoast_blind_S_01.name: Golden-Lined Drapery (Small)
furni_westCoast_blind_S_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_blind_S_01.description: Light golden-lined drapes. Some furniture, however, are designed so that they are able to fend off all arrows and explosives that come their way.

furni_westCoast_curtain_01.name: Delicately Woven Drapery
furni_westCoast_curtain_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_curtain_01.description: Delicately woven drapes that both lets enough light pass through and are light as a feather. Customers are bound to understand their value when the sun gleams into the room just before sundown.

furni_westCoast_downlight_01.name: Warm Ceiling Light
furni_westCoast_downlight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_downlight_01.description: A gentle, warm light source. The brightness and color temperature were delicately tuned to stimulate the customers' laziness to add a few more zeroes to their bills.

furni_westCoast_wallpaper_01.name: Panoramic Display (Dossoles)
furni_westCoast_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_wallpaper_01.description: A panoramic display showcasing the beauty of Dossoles's beaches during sunset. Though the competitions will always come to an end, the fun never stops here.

furni_westCoast_floor_01.name: Waterproof Hardwood Flooring
furni_westCoast_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_westCoast_floor_01.description: Firm hardwood flooring with a simple appearance and warm texture. The wood is not from Bolvar, but its water resistance abilities are nonetheless excellent.

furni_college_bed_01.name: Standard-Issue Bunk Bed
furni_college_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_bed_01.description: A standard-issue two-person Academy bunk bed, fastidiously designed to make efficient use of the limited space in the student dorms. The display case is full of awards and accolades for the two residents, but the largest trophy was won thanks to Bagpipe's tractor-driving.
furni_college_bed_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_ceilingLight2_01.name: Soft Ceiling-Mounted Light
furni_college_ceilingLight2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_ceilingLight2_01.description: A secondary light source in the dorms, often used as a night light. It has accompanied Ch'en and Bagpipe through countless all-nighters.
furni_college_ceilingLight2_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_decoration_01.name: Imitation Originium Ice Crystal Sculpture
furni_college_decoration_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_decoration_01.description: A scale model of the Originium Ice Crystal sculpture in the Royal Victorian Museum, carved from a single piece of crystal. Pure, flawless, and adamantine.
furni_college_decoration_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_column_01.name: Chalk Pillar
furni_college_column_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_column_01.description: A decorative pillar made in the Victorian Court style, built with hard mountain rock and brushed over with white chalk. The first lesson at the Royal Guard Academy begins with a straight waist.
furni_college_column_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_ceilingLight1_01.name: Ring-Shaped Pendant Light
furni_college_ceilingLight1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_ceilingLight1_01.description: The main light source in the dormitories, with a design that takes both utility and beauty into consideration. It is said that the designer took inspiration from a Sankta's halo. 'We must learn from the Sankta's solidarity, but shun their frivolity.'
furni_college_ceilingLight1_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_table_01.name: Long Dinner Table
furni_college_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_table_01.description: A standard-issue dining table at the Academy, made to meet both personal and hospitality needs. For the students of the Royal Guard Academy, table manners are as important as military literacy.
furni_college_table_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_chair_L_01.name: Blue Fabric Armchair (Left)
furni_college_chair_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_chair_L_01.description: A soft and comfortable armchair, sturdily built. Don't slack off during training.
furni_college_chair_L_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_chair_01.name: Blue Fabric Armchair (Front)
furni_college_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_chair_01.description: A soft and comfortable armchair, silky to the touch. Don't overwork yourself during breaks.
furni_college_chair_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_carpet_01.name: Hand-Woven Plush Carpet
furni_college_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_carpet_01.description: A standard-issue high-quality plush carpet selected by the Academy, representing the highest levels of Victoria's textile industry. After her training, Bagpipe would fall asleep directly on the carpet. Ch'en would scold her over this, and even giving her the lower bunk was not of any use.
furni_college_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_walldeco_01.name: Wall-Mounted Display Stands
furni_college_walldeco_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_walldeco_01.description: Host to impenetrable technical books and photos of assumed sentimental value. Upon closer inspection, that landscape photo seems to be of the view from the dorm window.
furni_college_walldeco_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_rack_01.name: Standard-Issue Multipurpose Rack
furni_college_rack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_rack_01.description: Standard-issue multi-functional racks issued by the Academy for dorm usage, shared by two students. Though the two obviously had many differences in their lifestyles, this did not prevent them from trying to understand each other.
furni_college_rack_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_growBox_01.name: Grow Box
furni_college_growBox_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_growBox_01.description: A multifunctional grow box brought in by Bagpipe. The temperature and humidity can be adjusted freely to simulate the planting environments suitable for different crops. The crops planted at the beginning of each year are ripe by the end of the semester, and can be harvested to make a delicious meal for her roommate.
furni_college_growBox_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_pottedPlant_01.name: Elegant Decorative Plant
furni_college_pottedPlant_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_pottedPlant_01.description: A petite and exquisite potted plant, with a transparent design at the bottom of the flowerpot. As much as she hates to admit it, Ch'en's sense of aesthetics has been influenced by Wei Yenwu in many respects.
furni_college_pottedPlant_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_baggage_01.name: Ch'en's Luggage
furni_college_baggage_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_baggage_01.description: Ch'en's belongings. Ch'en traveled back and forth between Victoria and Lungmen repeatedly during her studies, and the two things that always accompanied her were Chi Xiao, and this suitcase.
furni_college_baggage_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_wallpaper_01.name: Panoramic Display (Academy)
furni_college_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_wallpaper_01.description: A panoramic display showing the campus of the Royal Guard Academy. Where there are people, there must both be camaraderie and conflict, even in a place where discipline is prized above all else.
furni_college_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_college_floor_01.name: Fir Wood Floorboards
furni_college_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_college_floor_01.description: Made from the finest materials from Leithanien's redwood forest. Victoria's prosperity attracts the influx of resources from neighboring countries, and Victoria is more than glad to accept them.
furni_college_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_ceiling_01.name: Pinus Sylvestris-Style Ceiling
furni_knights_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_ceiling_01.description: The Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub's ceiling has been repainted many times over. Iwona nearly lost her mind when she handed Sona a bucket of paint. With a flick of the wrist, Flametail turned into Snowtail.
furni_knights_ceiling_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_ceilingLight_01.name: Plain Hanging Tube Light
furni_knights_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_ceilingLight_01.description: An unassuming standpipe hanging light. The strength of the lampshade is comparable to that of some knights' weapons, but only Greynuty knows this.
furni_knights_ceilingLight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_weaving_01.name: Pinus Sylvestris Emblem Hanging Banner
furni_knights_weaving_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_weaving_01.description: A banner bearing the emblem of the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub, somewhat worn. It has witnessed the establishment of the knightclub, and continues to fly to this day.
furni_knights_weaving_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_table_01.name: 'Handshake'
furni_knights_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_table_01.description: Two tables joined together to make a single table are much like two people putting their palms together. Cooperation, friendship, and trust all begin with a handshake.
furni_knights_table_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_sofa_01.name: Steel-Armed Sofa Chair
furni_knights_sofa_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_sofa_01.description: A somewhat narrow single sofa chair. Only a light and petite Liberi can comfortably curl up and find rest on a chair shaped like this.
furni_knights_sofa_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_cabinet_01.name: Miscellany Showcase
furni_knights_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_cabinet_01.description: A display case with much more than just trophies and medals. If the award has no deeper meaning to it, it's just a pretty piece of metal that serves to complement the other randomly-placed miscellaneous things.
furni_knights_cabinet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_carpet1_01.name: Knightclub Rug
furni_knights_carpet1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_carpet1_01.description: A carpet stacked on top of each other in crosses. The red velvet mat spread underneath was given to the Flametail Knight by her enthusiastic fans, but nowadays, there are few gifts from fans that stay in the hands of the knights.
furni_knights_carpet1_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_walllamp_01.name: Candelabra-Style Wall Sconce
furni_knights_walllamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_walllamp_01.description: A wall lamp made by inserting tube lights into a candlestick. The traditional knights may be no more, but their form is still favored by their successors.
furni_knights_walllamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_brazier_01.name: Open-Fire Brazier
furni_knights_brazier_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_brazier_01.description: A brazier that has been in use for a while. In the eyes of most people born in the nomadic cities of Kazimierz, using an open fire for warmth is a rare act indeed.
furni_knights_brazier_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_column_01.name: Decorative Pillar With Pine
furni_knights_column_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_column_01.description: A hollow pillar with a dwarf pine tree inside that is in need of regular pruning. The fragrance is refreshing, and makes you feel like you're in a pine forest in the Kaliska region.
furni_knights_column_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_floorLamp_01.name: Lance-Shaped Floor Lamp
furni_knights_floorLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_floorLamp_01.description: A floor lamp in the shape of a lance. 'Iwona, your lance is over here. Could you put the lamp down?'
furni_knights_floorLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_carpet2_01.name: Printed Bathroom Rug
furni_knights_carpet2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_carpet2_01.description: A carpet with a traditional Kazimierz pattern. From knights to commoners, there is a unifying thread that runs through the collective consciousness of Kazimierz.
furni_knights_carpet2_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_sink_01.name: Long Narrow Sink
furni_knights_sink_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
