furni_knights_sink_01.description: Iwona's custom-made sink. Following the objections of the other three, its size was reduced by half.
furni_knights_sink_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_pottedPlant_01.name: Fresh Potted Plant
furni_knights_pottedPlant_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_pottedPlant_01.description: A nicely-growing plant placed on a metal flower stand. Justyna has been looking after it with care, and it has just taken root.
furni_knights_pottedPlant_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_wallpaper_01.name: Pinus Sylvestris Patterned Wallpaper
furni_knights_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_wallpaper_01.description: Re-cut, light-colored striped wallpaper. Greynuty unconsciously chose the colors and patterns she is familiar with.
furni_knights_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_knights_floor_01.name: Pinus Sylvestris Rejoined Floorboards
furni_knights_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_knights_floor_01.description: Rejoined black pine wood flooring. The faint smell of wood oozes from the seams, mingling with the melodies of Justyna's whistle-flute.
furni_knights_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_kazimierz_downlight_01.name: Broadcast Room Special Ceiling Light
furni_kazimierz_downlight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_downlight_01.description: An expensive ceiling light sponsored by the advertising company. Pure white in its entirety, it represents the knights' elegance and solemnity.

furni_kazimierz_LED_C_01.name: Columnar Broadcast Display
furni_kazimierz_LED_C_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_LED_C_01.description: A cylindrical vertical display used to list sponsors and advertisers. Malls may rise and fall, but big company branding lasts forever.
furni_kazimierz_LED_C_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_kazimierz_camera_01.name: Sliding Video Camera
furni_kazimierz_camera_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_camera_01.description: A video camera mounted on a sliding rail that accurately captures the subject's demeanor. When you sit in front of this camera, you lose the luxury of making mistakes.
furni_kazimierz_camera_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_kazimierz_desk_01.name: Rhombic Modern Broadcast Desk
furni_kazimierz_desk_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_desk_01.description: A table made specifically for broadcasting that chases all the latest trends. Thanks to a carefully-planned system, Kazimierz knightsports broadcasts, as far as the viewers know, never go wrong.
furni_kazimierz_desk_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_kazimierz_chair_W_01.name: White Leather Broadcast Chair
furni_kazimierz_chair_W_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_chair_W_01.description: A soft and comfortable broadcast chair. It has no armrests so the host stays on his toes. He casts the match for a captive audience, meticulously delivering promotions for the manufacturer.
furni_kazimierz_chair_W_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_kazimierz_stool_01.name: White Leather Broadcast Stool
furni_kazimierz_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_stool_01.description: A soft and comfortable broadcast stool. Guests sometimes appear on the show, bringing an iota of spiritual support to an otherwise lonely host.

furni_kazimierz_screen_01.name: Dual-Color Gradient Display
furni_kazimierz_screen_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_screen_01.description: A hanging display screen. It shows the rankings of the knight tournament in real time; fair and impartial, with no fraud!
furni_kazimierz_screen_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_kazimierz_LIVE_01.name: Simple Transparent Display
furni_kazimierz_LIVE_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_LIVE_01.description: A small display screen with the word LIVE. This display only conveys one message - the live broadcast of the knight tournament is in progress, in real-time, with absolutely no filler.

furni_kazimierz_decoration_01.name: 'Sculpted Flames'
furni_kazimierz_decoration_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_decoration_01.description: A decorative sculpture. If crystals can be carved into flames, then perhaps it might not be so difficult to influence the outcome of a match.

furni_kazimierz_partition_01.name: Vertical Translucent Partition
furni_kazimierz_partition_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_partition_01.description: An obliquely-placed transparent partition that separates the broadcast room from the interview room. Through it, the audience thinks they can see all the secrets of the broadcast room.

furni_kazimierz_table_01.name: Trapezoidal Interview Low Table
furni_kazimierz_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_table_01.description: An interview table with a small white plushie. The most influential competition knight of the latest tournament will advertently decide the appearance of the doll occupying this table.

furni_kazimierz_chair_R_01.name: Red and White Interview Chair Set
furni_kazimierz_chair_R_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_chair_R_01.description: Multiple interview chairs placed next to each other. The guests in these chairs scramble to express their opinions.

furni_kazimierz_chair2_R_01.name: Red and White Interview Chair (Right)
furni_kazimierz_chair2_R_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_chair2_R_01.description: A single interview chair. The host occupying this seat throws out the hot topics that have captured public attention.

furni_kazimierz_partition2_01.name: Interview Room Two-Color Movable Barrier
furni_kazimierz_partition2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_partition2_01.description: A movable barrier to partition the space, with the latest advertisements printed on the transparent panels. The barrier cordons off certain areas and creates unpredictable psychological pressure.

furni_kazimierz_LED_F_01.name: Banner-Style Displays
furni_kazimierz_LED_F_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_LED_F_01.description: Screens displaying several knight factions, their emblems magnified. The Kazimierz General Chamber of Commerce controls most business activities, but not all.

furni_kazimierz_ceilingLamp_01.name: Ring-Shaped Pendant Light Display
furni_kazimierz_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_ceilingLamp_01.description: A pendant light that can also be used as a display. In order to bring more profits, commodities often undergo rather extreme evolutions.

furni_kazimierz_wallpaper_01.name: Broadcast Room Wallpaper
furni_kazimierz_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_wallpaper_01.description: A display screen that shows the situation in the arena in real time. Coordinated with interlaced rectangular patterns of various shades it symbolizes the fairness and justice of the knight competitions.

furni_kazimierz_floor_01.name: Broadcast Room Matte-Finish Tiles
furni_kazimierz_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_kazimierz_floor_01.description: Dark grey floor tiles with a matte finish. The heavy tones represent the long and weighty historical heritage of the knight competition.

furni_arcadeHall_ceiling_01.name: Electric Neon Ceiling
furni_arcadeHall_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_ceiling_01.description: A promotional pendant light with a rather unreliable supply of power. Dark rooms with weak lighting provide a scant sense of privacy or security.

furni_arcadeHall_fpsArcade_01.name: Shooter Arcade Machine
furni_arcadeHall_fpsArcade_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_fpsArcade_01.description: A shooting game arcade console equipped with Laterano guns. It makes for a pretty good game, since ordinary people can't use guns.

furni_arcadeHall_stool_01.name: Avant-Garde Long-Leg Stool
furni_arcadeHall_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_stool_01.description: A long-legged stool with synthetic stuffing, comfortable and suitable for long-term sitting. However, people who play shooting games generally prefer to stand...

furni_arcadeHall_board_01.name: Casual Doodle Board
furni_arcadeHall_board_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_board_01.description: A large doodle board for messages from the arcade manager, the latest news, and game tips. Everyone can add information to it, but just remember to let the manager know when you're done.

furni_arcadeHall_partition_01.name: Clear Glass Mirror
furni_arcadeHall_partition_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_partition_01.description: A transparent glass mirror that matches the atmosphere of the place, somewhat capable of directing the flow of people. After the new fluorescent stickers arrive, the mirror should be better equipped to perform its duties.

furni_arcadeHall_danceArcade_01.name: Dancing Rhythm Game Machine
furni_arcadeHall_danceArcade_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_danceArcade_01.description: A dancing rhythm game machine purchased for a vast sum of money. People play rhythm games for a lot of different reasons, but the joy they get out of it is surprisingly consistent.

furni_arcadeHall_railing_01.name: Rhythm Game Handrail
furni_arcadeHall_railing_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_railing_01.description: A handrail to protect players on the dance machine. Ordinary players hold the handrails for their own safety, while the most skilled players hold the handrails for fancier footwork.

furni_arcadeHall_danceHug_01.name: Rhythm Game Dance Mat
furni_arcadeHall_danceHug_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_danceHug_01.description: A dance mat that players use with the dance machine. Note: Dance mats are for use with the two legs only. Usage of hands or other auxiliary equipment is strictly prohibited.

furni_arcadeHall_banner_01.name: Arcade Hall Advertising Board
furni_arcadeHall_banner_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_banner_01.description: A small board that displays the arcade's newest attractions and promotions. New games will always attract players, but after the initial interest has died off, most will prefer to watch the masters tearing up the dance machines.

furni_arcadeHall_pachinko_01.name: Pachinko Machine
furni_arcadeHall_pachinko_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_pachinko_01.description: A pachinko machine frequently seen in arcade halls. A box of coins, a glass of water, and a machine to whittle away the day.

furni_arcadeHall_decoration_01.name: Cactus Fluorescent Light
furni_arcadeHall_decoration_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_decoration_01.description: Neon tubes shaped like a cactus. Stare at it a bit more; it's good for the eyes.

furni_arcadeHall_ceiling2_01.name: Hanging Arcade Display
furni_arcadeHall_ceiling2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_ceiling2_01.description: A new style of display from Columbia, able to show more complex images.

furni_arcadeHall_desk_01.name: Basic Front Desk
furni_arcadeHall_desk_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_desk_01.description: A front desk made of bricks, with little in the way of decorations added. On normal days, the rotund owner sits at the front desk, playing with Originium products.

furni_arcadeHall_stool2_01.name: Avant-Garde High Chair
furni_arcadeHall_stool2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_stool2_01.description: A high chair that the owner bought from the mall, thinking it to be really cool. Nobody knows why the seat's surface is higher than the tabletop at the front desk, but it might be the only way for guests to sit at an even level with the owner.

furni_arcadeHall_vendingMachine01.name: Avant-Garde Vending Machine
furni_arcadeHall_vendingMachine01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_vendingMachine01.description: A vending machine that the owner purchased from a flea market and then personally refitted, thinking it to be really cool. Ice-cold drinks, 24 hours a day without interruption - one of this arcade hall's key competitive edges.

furni_arcadeHall_trolley_01.name: Refreshment Cart
furni_arcadeHall_trolley_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_trolley_01.description: A small cart used to hold goods, currently carrying drinks around. If you're not in the mood for cold beverages, you can directly contact the front desk to have them cart out what you want - but don't even try to avoid the fee. You're not getting away.

furni_arcadeHall_carpet_01.name: Arcade Hall Carpet
furni_arcadeHall_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_carpet_01.description: A checkered rug for use in the arcade hall, often confused for actual floor tiles until stepped on. The shop owner made a bad investment in the carpet business, and had no choice but to find some use for the unsellable wares.

furni_arcadeHall_wallpaper_01.name: Arcade Hall Wallpaper
furni_arcadeHall_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_wallpaper_01.description: An avant-garde style wallpaper for use in the arcade hall. In order to reduce overhead, the owner personally built this arcade on top of the roof of a commercial building in Columbia.

furni_arcadeHall_floor_01.name: Arcade Hall Floor Tiles
furni_arcadeHall_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_arcadeHall_floor_01.description: Easy-to-clean floor tiles for use in the arcade hall. Has anyone stopped to wonder how the owner was able to erect a building in Columbia's bustling heart, on top of a commercial high-rise? Was it really to save money?

furni_stage_nestHouse_01.name: 'Feeding Station'
furni_stage_nestHouse_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_nestHouse_01.description:
A wooden hut that the people of Kjerag put in front of their dwellings to feed fowlbeasts. But, tourists seem accustomed to stowing their keys here. 
In the tradition of the Kjerag people, when the wild fowlbeasts are fed, they will utter a few words of kindness into Kjeragandr's ear as they fly over Mount Karlan.

furni_stage_boots_01.name: Kjerag Leather Snow Boots
furni_stage_boots_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_boots_01.description:
Must-have snow boots for every family in Kjerag, slip-resistant and warm.
When the weather is clear, one can occasionally see two rows of footprints in the snow, extending into the horizon.

furni_stage_stool_01.name: Exotic Round Stool
furni_stage_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_stool_01.description:
Furniture imported from Victoria after Kjerag opened its trade channels.
This modern product seems to have little sense of conflict in Kjerag, which is another powerful proof of the change SilverAsh brought to his homeland.
furni_stage_stool_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_stage_cabinet_01.name: Pointed-Top Cabinet
furni_stage_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_cabinet_01.description:
Iconic Kjerag design - huge capacity, resistant to wind and dust. 
But, it would be a huge shame to just let this pair of skis sit here. Let's go skiing.

furni_stage_table_01.name: Traditional Fire Pit Table
furni_stage_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_table_01.description:
A condensation of the Kjerag peoples' wisdom against the biting cold wind and snow, made of rocks from the snowy mountains and birch wood.
Simple in construction but multi-faceted in functionality.
furni_stage_table_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_stage_barrel_01.name: Fine Kjerag Liquor
furni_stage_barrel_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_barrel_01.description:
A fermented concoction made by the people of Kjerag when food is abundant. One sip, and the biting chill disappears.
Watered-down versions can occasionally be purchased outside of Kjerag.
furni_stage_barrel_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_stage_textileMachine_01.name: Handloom
furni_stage_textileMachine_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_textileMachine_01.description:
A classic Kjerag loom that some inns will put out for tourists to try. Finished products can be taken home, but you still have to pay for the materials.
The history of the loom goes back too far for us to know who invented it, but the Kjerag people have come to regard it as a gift from Kjeragandr.

furni_stage_bed_01.name: One-Piece Solid Wood Bed
furni_stage_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_bed_01.description:
A piece of iconic Kjerag furniture, pairing the sturdiest wood with the softest fabrics - a place you can't wait to return to every night. 
The sun passes over the snow and sprinkles down over the headboard. The elder rings the bell there, signaling the start of a new day.

furni_stage_bedsideTable_01.name: Solid Wood Nightstand
furni_stage_bedsideTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_bedsideTable_01.description:
A nightstand carved from a single piece of wood, with an oil lamp on top that is convenient for guests to use at will.
Before modern lighting was fully popularized throughout Kjerag, a small lantern could serve many needs.

furni_stage_ceilingLamp_01.name: Windproof Pendant Light
furni_stage_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_ceilingLamp_01.description:
A modern lamp, specifically reinforced to make it into the style of a chandelier. 
It may take a long time for Kjerag to develop into Victoria, but there will always be someone working on it.

furni_stage_Irori_01.name: Fire Pit Pendant Light
furni_stage_Irori_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_Irori_01.description:
A suspended stove to be used with a fire pit table, from which the sound of boiling soup can be heard all day long.
No matter how cold it is outside, the stomach is always filled with the warmth of joy.
furni_stage_Irori_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_stage_walldeco_01.name: Household Herb Rack
furni_stage_walldeco_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_walldeco_01.description:
Wooden herb racks seen in homes around Kjerag. The people keep dried herbs on hand, in case of emergency. 
A faint scent lingers by the window. Before the advent of modern medicine throughout the region, these herbs were the most effective cures.

furni_stage_ceiling_01.name: Storage-Use Ceiling
furni_stage_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_ceiling_01.description:
Thick blankets hang from wooden racks to keep the cold from seeping through the roof. If the temperature drops, the blanket can be removed to provide warmth.
Civilization continues to move forward, but some wisdom persists through the ages.

furni_stage_carpet_01.name: Thick Fur Rug
furni_stage_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_carpet_01.description:
Fur rugs, thick and soft, made with Kjerag's traditional craftsmanship. 
How would you sum up life in Kjerag in only a few words? A warm rug, a lit hearth, drifting snow, and hot tea.

furni_stage_wallpaper_01.name: Panoramic Display (Snowy Mountains)
furni_stage_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_wallpaper_01.description:
A screen displaying the scenery of Kjerag's snowy mountains, the view at the foot of the holy Mount Karlan. 
Snow drifts upon the mountain wind, the lake glistens like a mirror. The water and the sky stand still before Mount Karlan's might.

furni_stage_floor_01.name: Kjerag Inn Floorboards
furni_stage_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_stage_floor_01.description:
Post station-style floorboards, adapted with Kjerag themes more familiar to the locals. 
From these places, the outside world came to know of the region known as Kjerag.

furni_teaHouse_rack_01.name: New Tea Drying Rack
furni_teaHouse_rack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_rack_01.description:
A four-layered holder used to dry fresh tea leaves. After a period of time, the shopkeeper will instruct the staff to move things to the back for processing. 
Shancheng is hot and humid, and thus the Shangshuites love tea. Dawn to dusk it serves as their liquor, the spring river itself boiled into earthen bottles.
furni_teaHouse_rack_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_teaHouse_basket_01.name: Tea-Harvesting Basket
furni_teaHouse_basket_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_basket_01.description:
A tea-picking basket found in every Shangshu household, its bottom still stained with the red mud of the Mengding tea mountains.
In the spring and winter, diligently sow the mountainside in one season, and carefully reap the rewards of your efforts in the next.
furni_teaHouse_basket_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_teaHouse_cabinet_01.name: Two-Layered Cabinet
furni_teaHouse_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_cabinet_01.description:
On the counter next to the shopkeeper can occasionally be found a few jars of opened Husong or Yunliao liquor. 
Into the case go the thousand sorrows that come with passing years, yet with enough time all things shall be uncorked.
furni_teaHouse_cabinet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_teaHouse_carpet_01.name: Green Bamboo Mat
furni_teaHouse_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_carpet_01.description:
A floor mat woven together from the fresh bamboo strips of Shancheng. Cool and flexible, perfect for those with little time to rest. 
Leave the troubles of the world behind at the door, sink into a restful dream of boundless prosperity.
furni_teaHouse_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_teaHouse_teaCooktop_01.name: Verdant Stone Tea Set
furni_teaHouse_teaCooktop_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_teaCooktop_01.description:
Made from a polished slab of verdant stone from the peak of Qujiang, it seems to become even more radiant after being exposed to worldly struggles. 
During the season is rain and snow, a charcoal flame dances, water boils and tea simmers, the yellow vessel fills the cup, and the harsh cold seems less daunting.
furni_teaHouse_teaCooktop_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_teaHouse_pottedplant_01.name: Cloudhaze Bonsai
furni_teaHouse_pottedplant_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_pottedplant_01.description:
A potted plant resting in a marble vase, vaguely reminiscent of Shangshu's 'Three Mountains and Seventeen Peaks.' 
The corridors stretch not into the mountain range, yet the mountains reside within a single room. The people of Shu enjoy the mountains, nothing more.

furni_teaHouse_tableTea_01.name: Huangli Wooden Tea Table
furni_teaHouse_tableTea_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_tableTea_01.description:
Good Huangli wood takes over forty years to grow. The old carpenter of Shancheng passed down his ancestral craft, and the shopkeeper traveled all over Yan in search of matching porcelain. 
Passersby may well hate unexpected change, the old tree yet laughs in the distance.

furni_teaHouse_tableWeiqi_01.name: Huangli Wooden Go Set
furni_teaHouse_tableWeiqi_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_tableWeiqi_01.description:
Carved from the same piece of Huangli wood as the tea table. For the carpenter, if the difficulty of the tea table was a five, then this set is an eight. 
 The long day disappears into black and white pieces, no two matches ever identical.

furni_teaHouse_stool_01.name: Huangli Wooden Square Stool
furni_teaHouse_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_stool_01.description:
The remaining bits of wood were used to make four square stools as a gift to the shopkeeper. 
Play your pieces carefully, rise slowly. Sit down with friends, enjoy another cup and song.

furni_teaHouse_birdcage_01.name: 'Delicage'
furni_teaHouse_birdcage_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_birdcage_01.description:
Made in the likeness of a primitive fowlbeast cage, but bearing the fragrance of incense. 
Hundreds of ephemeral buds, golden threads forming dreamlike flowers, yet less meaningful than dead branches in a forest.

furni_teaHouse_rubbings_01.name: Poetry Scroll
furni_teaHouse_rubbings_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_rubbings_01.description:
A meticulously-framed hanging poetry scroll, bearing the text: 'The spring river runs towards the distant autumn; the old crane returns for a cup of tea.' 
The calligraphy is nearly illegible, it must have been produced by someone seasoned. Should it actually be the product of a master, that would instead make it commonplace.

furni_teaHouse_column_01.name: Elegant Shu Embroidery
furni_teaHouse_column_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_column_01.description:
A decoration made from the embroidery of one's own house. Old customers know that this was originally a present from daughter to father, from the shopkeeper's beloved pearl. 
Shangshu girls have a tradition of weaving and embroidery. Seventy miles along the clear river turn into three feet of yarn around her fingertips.

furni_teaHouse_rollerBlind_01.name: Lakelight Curtain
furni_teaHouse_rollerBlind_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_rollerBlind_01.description:
Roller shutters made from cotton and linen, able to block dust and wind to allow people behind the counter to work with peace of mind. 
Skirting clouds cast playful shadows across the serene river, the sky shall remain clear for a month.

furni_teaHouse_venetianBlind_01.name: Open Bamboo Blinds
furni_teaHouse_venetianBlind_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_venetianBlind_01.description:
Those who hate it do so because it's intermittent, because it blocks the view and chops up the scenery; Those who favor it do so because it is calming, partitioning off the noise beyond the window, allowing those inside to focus on their next move of weiqi. 
The weight of the world is wearisome indeed. Instead count the number of victories and defeats.

furni_teaHouse_ceilingLamp_01.name: Cordial Sojourner's Invitation
furni_teaHouse_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_ceilingLamp_01.description:
A large teahouse lantern. The shopkeeper's regulars boast that this lantern is a superb piece made by a royal craftsman. 
Invite in the moonlight, let the dawn flow in. How deep the night; usher in the morn with a song.

furni_teaHouse_ceilingLight_01.name: Wall-Mounted Lights
furni_teaHouse_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_ceilingLight_01.description:
The teahouse's ceiling lamp. Hang the lights out of reach, and there is no worry of guests smashing them in a fit of anger. 
The cold night knows has no conscience; there is clarity between people.

furni_teaHouse_wallpaper_01.name: Panoramic Display (Mountain City)
furni_teaHouse_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_wallpaper_01.description:
Captures the poetic moment in which the spring breeze ushers in the rain to moisten the verdant crags outside the teahouse in Shancheng of Shangshu using holographic projection technology. 
Decoct green leaves into silver pieces, face the westward river. The white snow scowls, spring wakens anew. Spreads unto the world like petals in flight.

furni_teaHouse_floor_01.name: White Jade Floor Tiles
furni_teaHouse_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_teaHouse_floor_01.description:
Floor tiles fired through modern technology. But like the white jade tiles from hundreds of years ago, they are non-slip and dirt resistant, beloved by the people of Shancheng. 
Visitors in a hurry would sit; the doorway is swept of neither grass nor tea.

furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_01.name: Merchandise: 'Summer Bounties'
furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_01.description:
A half-dome hanging light depicting cascading layers of leaves, from which a warm light filters down. 
Visually appealing and affordable, this product is a best-seller in the lighting shop, and several can still be found in the warehouse.
furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_birdcage_01.name: Merchandise: 'Fowlbeast Amid Forests'
furni_lightArt_birdcage_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_birdcage_01.description:
A floor lamp designed with a cage and tree branches as its main body, with the lightbulb hidden in the caged fowlbeast's body. Often used as a coat hanger. 
The sight of Quercus using Originium Arts to produce these dead branches left Goldenglow convinced she was hallucinating.
furni_lightArt_birdcage_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_baggage_01.name: Shopkeeper's Suitcase
furni_lightArt_baggage_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_baggage_01.description:
An opened suitcase. The leftover fruit wine bottle is a plastic fake, but the flowers inside are fresh, with someone replacing them every day. 
The guests eagerly await the return of the lighting shop's master, as every time she returns from the wastes with a suitcase, it contains a special treat..
furni_lightArt_baggage_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_cabinet_01.name: Sylvan Storage Rack
furni_lightArt_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_cabinet_01.description:
Storage racks filled with all kinds of green potted plants, as well as watering cans and small bags of fertilizer. After watering the plants, operators need to write down the time on the corresponding form posted next to them. 
Goldenglow once secretly stashed a box of hairdressing supplies on the bottom shelf, but Quercus never exposed her even after finding out.
furni_lightArt_cabinet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_candle_01.name: Merchandise: 'Flickering Candlelight'
furni_lightArt_candle_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_candle_01.description:
A decorative lamp that imitates candles, contributing a similar atmosphere but without the fire hazard.
 Goldenglow hates fires.
furni_lightArt_candle_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_carpet_01.name: Sylvan Carpet
furni_lightArt_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_carpet_01.description:
A carpet with very vivid colors. The designer is said to have been inspired by the coat of a certain fowlbeast. 
Quercus can also imitate the call of that fowlbeast.
furni_lightArt_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_A_01.name: Merchandise: 'Obscured Light'
furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_A_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_A_01.description:
An arc-shaped ceiling lamp that matches the drapes. It emits a soft glow, like the morning sun breaking through the forest's canopy. 
 Though it is for sale, customers of the lighting shop have never asked its price.
furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_A_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_ceiling_L_01.name: Long Veil Curtains
furni_lightArt_ceiling_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_ceiling_L_01.description:
Decorative veil drapes that can soften interior lighting. 
A drunk customer once ripped the drapes from the ceiling of the lighting shop by accident.
furni_lightArt_ceiling_L_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_ceiling_S_01.name: Short Veil Curtains
furni_lightArt_ceiling_S_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_ceiling_S_01.description:
Decorative veil drapes that can soften interior lighting. 
Because it was too soft, Goldenglow, who works very late into the night at the lighting shop, sometimess fall asleep.
furni_lightArt_ceiling_S_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_T_01.name: Merchandise: 'Crystal Flower Cluster'
furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_T_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_T_01.description:
A large crystal chandelier in the form of flower buds. Rhodes Island's glass replica has been smashed twice already, so the newest replacement is made of plastic. 
Cleaning it is a huge hassle, so Quercus and Goldenglow hope to pawn it off as quickly as possible.
furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_T_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_O_01.name: Merchandise: 'Crystal Flower Bud'
furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_O_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_O_01.description:
A small crystal chandelier in the form of a flower bud. It has managed to avoid being broken so far because it's out of reach for most operators.
Even though cleaning it is a huge hassle, Goldenglow secretly hopes that when she manages to buy the store, this light will also come with it.
furni_lightArt_ceilingLight_O_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_table_01.name: Round Arboreal Table
furni_lightArt_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_table_01.description:
An elegantly decorated round tea table with a tablecloth spread over it. Some operators have placed several varieties of fragrant tea here. 
Skyfire used to enjoy sitting at this table while sipping afternoon tea, while workers from the Infected community sat nearby swigging booze to numb their worries.
furni_lightArt_table_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_platform_01.name: Arboreal Countertop
furni_lightArt_platform_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_platform_01.description:
An old-fashioned but thick high counter, with the day's freshly picked flowers adorning it. 
Bitter Root from Rhodes Island enjoys sitting next to these flowers while flipping through documents.
furni_lightArt_platform_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_chair_01.name: Round Golden Chair
furni_lightArt_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_chair_01.description:
A chair painted over with golden paint. It can't swivel around, but at least the cushion is soft. 
When several people sit down at the table together, this seat is reserved for the guest. But even if you're broke, nobody will give you a hard time.
furni_lightArt_chair_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_floorlamp_01.name: Merchandise: 'Blooming Flowers'
furni_lightArt_floorlamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_floorlamp_01.description:
A small floor lamp, designed in a candy-patterned theme that has been all the rage this year. 
When Goldenglow helps people cut their hair, this lamp can also play the role of multi-angle auxiliary lighting.
furni_lightArt_floorlamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_books_01.name: Old Pile of Donated Books
furni_lightArt_books_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_books_01.description:
Several old books stacked together. The ones present now were all donated by Rhodes Island operators, and cover a variety of topics ranging from Originium Engineering to how to operate a small tractor. 
Previously, there weren't many Infected who would read in the lighting shop, but the gentleman wearing a mask and scarf was one of them.
furni_lightArt_books_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_curtain_01.name: Overhanging Drapes
furni_lightArt_curtain_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_curtain_01.description:
Decorative drapes that stretch from the ceiling to the floor. Nobody is allowed to play hide-and-seek here, no matter how old they are. 
A Caladonian worker who claims to be the head of the household often hides here when his wife passes by.
furni_lightArt_curtain_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_ladder_01.name: Movable Ladder
furni_lightArt_ladder_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_ladder_01.description:
A ladder that can be freely pushed around the room. Standing on it will allow you to easily remove most decorations from the ceiling. 
Most of the time, it's used as a small stage of sorts for customers to perform their tricks.
furni_lightArt_ladder_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_wallpaper_01.name: Floral Illumination Wallpaper
furni_lightArt_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_wallpaper_01.description:
A wallpaper that seems straight out of a fairytale. 
It is said that this was left by the store's previous manager. In the past, this shop was a mom-and-pop dining establishment, though it didn't seem to have done very well.
furni_lightArt_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_lightArt_floor_01.name: Deep Green Floor Tiles
furni_lightArt_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_lightArt_floor_01.description:
Dark green tiles that are so shiny that you can see your reflection, completely unlike the feeling of a rainforest floor they are trying to evoke.
Goldenglow has to sweep these tiles back and forth several times a day, but she doesn't mind her dust and oil-covered friends stepping all over them in the slightest.
furni_lightArt_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_castle_partition_01.name: Dilapidated Partition
furni_castle_partition_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_partition_01.description: Sharp, broken railings can tell many stories. Many people have long been eyeing the abandoned castle in the wilderness. The first and last thing they did was destroy the railing outside the castle.

furni_castle_candlestick_01.name: Candle-Holder Pillar
furni_castle_candlestick_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_candlestick_01.description: A ruined stone pillar with candles attached makes for an ideal candelabra. Withered vines slowly creep around the stone, and the candle begins to give off an altogether different glow.

furni_castle_jug_01.name: Pot with Silver Tongs
furni_castle_jug_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_jug_01.description: A knocking sound echoes from within the pot, but when you go to inspect it, there's nothing going on. The flames in the fireplace seem to flare up without warning, rendering the tongs rather useless and in need of another purpose.

furni_castle_fountainStand_01.name: Fountain of Youth
furni_castle_fountainStand_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_fountainStand_01.description: A liquid continues to pour forth, yet never overflows. It's not even water, but rather some sort of sweet, aromatic tree sap. Just one sip... Wait, what was I about to do?

furni_castle_fireplace_01.name: Quaint Fireplace
furni_castle_fireplace_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_fireplace_01.description: Ignites by itself, extinguishes by itself. Like a reliable housekeeper, it manages itself down to each second, never letting a single spark leap from the fireplace.

furni_castle_curtain_01.name: Sanguine Red Curtain
furni_castle_curtain_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_curtain_01.description: A curtain held up by buckles and belts. What are they so worried about though? When these curtains brought from the Troupe fall, only one thing happens - the end.

furni_castle_carpet_01.name: Damaged Rug
furni_castle_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_carpet_01.description: Two scars have turned the rug into a one-of-a-kind work of art. One by an Originium slug, the other by a Feline. As a result of this red rug, their fates became intertwined.

furni_castle_ceilingLight_01.name: Caged Pendant Light
furni_castle_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_ceilingLight_01.description: Under the golden splendor, the candles in the prison burn out one by one. By the second night, the candle that should've burnt out was as good as new. The flame leapt out as promised, continuing to immolate its prey.

furni_castle_chair_01.name: Gaulish Aristocrat's Chair
furni_castle_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_chair_01.description: If you don't sing or write, then you don't deserve to sit in this chair. The first sensation you feel upon sitting down is mockery, but after a while, that sensation turns to comfort.

furni_castle_bayWindow_01.name: Window-side Stone Bench
furni_castle_bayWindow_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_bayWindow_01.description: No aristocrat's fabric can alleviate the insensate stone's coldness and hardness. Perhaps sleep itself is true torment. Wake up, and revel.

furni_castle_table_01.name: Gold-patterned Wooden Table
furni_castle_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_table_01.description: Used to write, to record, to store. Scripts, official documents, musical scores. Simply by writing different symbols, paper can also be endowed with a deeper meaning.

furni_castle_column_01.name: Vine-Tangled Stone Pillar
furni_castle_column_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_column_01.description: The withered vines tightly wrap around the stone pillar, ever reluctant to part. Yet this is no display of affection, for the dying creature will eventually strangle the prey within its embrace.

furni_castle_longBench_01.name: Castle Footstool
furni_castle_longBench_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_longBench_01.description: One step before entering bed, one final step before the cessation of dreams. Its existence inherently is cumbersome, one that chisels into the ravine of the human world.

furni_castle_bed_01.name: Aristocrat's Bed
furni_castle_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_bed_01.description: Sweet dreams? Ah yes, sweet dreams. The bed is no sanctuary. Should the nightmare come, a soft bed may be the last straw that snatches away your sanity.

furni_castle_floorlamp_01.name: Self-Lighting Candle Lamp
furni_castle_floorlamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_floorlamp_01.description: As the flame burns, the candle slowly sheds its tears. When it burns to the end, its existence also ceases, leaving only tears strewn over the ground.

furni_castle_mirror_01.name: Broken Mirror
furni_castle_mirror_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_mirror_01.description: Through the cracks, you catch a glimpse of your true self. It seems that the rumor of the broken mirror's curse stems from its completeness. If has long been shattered, it may no longer be able to hurt others.

furni_castle_wallpaper_01.name: Mottled Wall Surface
furni_castle_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_wallpaper_01.description: Time will leave its mark on things manmade, but the forests beyond the windows persist as before. But, nature's timelessness becomes tiresome, and only a ruined castle can suit his tastes.

furni_castle_floor_01.name: Castle Floor Tiles
furni_castle_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_castle_floor_01.description: It has seen. It sees. It will see. When you step across its body, it will see everything of you.

furni_NHL_showcase_01.name: 'Role Model's' Display Case
furni_NHL_showcase_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_showcase_01.description:
A display case, simple yet sturdy in design, housing a patron firearm. The glass is not bulletproof.
The patron firearm displayed within once belonged to someone ranked bottom among 'most distinguished' executors. It isn't clear if this is supposed to serve as a commemoration, or a cautionary story.

furni_NHL_frame_01.name: Practical Photo Frame
furni_NHL_frame_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_frame_01.description:
The wooden frame bundled with the purchase of the display case doesn't hold a photo, but rather standard-issue ammo for use with the patron firearm.
'Break glass in case of emergency.'

furni_NHL_bookstand_01.name: Reading Desk
furni_NHL_bookstand_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_bookstand_01.description:
Designed to make it easier for an executor to read while resting. Simple, compact, and gives off a sense of tradition.
At some point, someone swapped out the copy of the religious classic, 'The Saints' Travels', with a copy of 'The Centameron'.

furni_NHL_shelf_01.name: Racks
furni_NHL_shelf_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_shelf_01.description:
The racks near the entrance are not to be tossed around, especially not the guns!
The senior executors didn't have a habit of bringing umbrellas to work, so Ezell put one of these in place shortly after becoming a trainee executor.

furni_NHL_sofa_01.name: 'Role Model's' Sofa
furni_NHL_sofa_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_sofa_01.description:
A small, green, two-seater sofa issued by the Notarial Hall. It is said to improve the relationship between colleagues.
Strangely, never have two people been seen occupying this sofa at the same time.

furni_NHL_floorlamp_01.name: Brass Floor Lamp
furni_NHL_floorlamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_floorlamp_01.description:
A lamp designed in the likeness of tree branches, its inverted petals effectively converging the light to cast a soft array of light and shadow.
It was originally purchased to serve as a reading lamp, but as the executors were rather disinterested in that pursuit, it ended up not seeing much use.
furni_NHL_floorlamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_NHL_stand_01.name: Ornamental Plaster Table
furni_NHL_stand_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_stand_01.description:
A decorative plaster table, brought back from Leithanien to the Notarial Hall by an Apostolic Nuncio.
While said to be the magnum opus of a Leithanian master, crafted with thoughtful artistry, the executors found little to appreciate in a piece that often blocked their vision.
furni_NHL_stand_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_NHL_coffeeTable_01.name: Marble Coffee Table
furni_NHL_coffeeTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_coffeeTable_01.description:
A coffee table, procured at a high price. It is supported by a brass frame and has a whole slab of polished marble sitting on top.
'Since we're not allowed to stuff everything onto the shelves, let's pile 'em up here. Let's go. Contract certifications, relic transfers. There's still a lot of work to get done today.'

furni_NHL_carpet_01.name: Geometric-Patterned Rug
furni_NHL_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_carpet_01.description:
A geometric-patterned rug that matches the flooring. Simple in design, but soft and stain-resistant.
All seekers will inevitably end up lost. Yet those of faith will find softness under their feet, not thorns.

furni_NHL_ceilingLight_L_01.name: Branch Chandelier
furni_NHL_ceilingLight_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_ceilingLight_L_01.description:
The primary light source of the Notarial Hall, a modern lamp purchased from Karlan Trade.
The Holy City of Laterano, which has ever stood tall amidst the storms of conflict, will remain a beacon of light for all.

furni_NHL_ceilingLight_S_01.name: Diamond Cross Chandelier
furni_NHL_ceilingLight_S_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_ceilingLight_S_01.description:
An auxiliary light source of the Notarial Hall, a group of diamonds arranged in a cross formation. Ingenious in design, yet ultimately not very practical as a form of lighting.
Few laws exist in Laterano, but they have been enough to uphold the Holy City's existence for thousands of years. The mind tends to overthink and overcomplicate, a common affliction in the modern person.

furni_NHL_seat_01.name: Hardwood Ottoman
furni_NHL_seat_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_seat_01.description:
A magnificent piece made from high-quality mahogany, gifted from Yan in commemoration of the successful convening of the Summit of Nations.
When returning to the Notarial Hall to hand in their work, executors sometimes will use it for a bit of respite. 'It's too hard. Can't get any shut-eye,' laments Fiammetta.

furni_NHL_vase_01.name: Glass Vase
furni_NHL_vase_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_vase_01.description:
A piece of glassware purchased on a whim, which some executor decided to use as a vase.
Very few people ever remembered to restock it with fresh flowers, with the exception of a few trainee executors first taking up their post.
furni_NHL_vase_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_NHL_clock_01.name: 'Halo and Timepiece' Grandfather Clock
furni_NHL_clock_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_clock_01.description:
To make this antique-styled grandfather clock, the craftsman brought back an entire slab of mountain rock and meticulously carved it to serve as the base.
Time is above, the halo is below. As long as time continues to tick, the halo will continue to exist.
furni_NHL_clock_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_NHL_statue_01.name: 'My Actions Become Law' Sculpture
furni_NHL_statue_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_statue_01.description: The gun in its hands was said to have been placed there temporarily, as there was no space left in the 'Role Model's' display case. Nobody saw anything wrong with it, and so soon the gun became a part of the sculpture.
furni_NHL_statue_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_NHL_wallpaper_01.name: Panoramic Display (Holy City)
furni_NHL_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_wallpaper_01.description:
With the power of modern projection technology, executors can, at any time, appreciate the splendor of the Holy City they spend their lives in.
Of course, the occasional 'explosive' incidents are never captured on this screen.

furni_NHL_floor_01.name: Notarial Hall Floor Tiles
furni_NHL_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_NHL_floor_01.description:
These dark, geometric-patterned floor tiles seem simple and austere, but provide a sense of softness and are easy to clean.
Upon closer inspection of the way these tiles are tessellated, not even a single gap is visible. The same is true of Lateran principles - simple, yet exacting.

furni_mis_ceilingLight_L_01.name: Hardwood Ceiling Light (Left)
furni_mis_ceilingLight_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_ceilingLight_L_01.description:
An auxiliary light source on the left side of the room with a ceiling-mounted wooden base.
Light can illuminate a house, while music can reach its audience's souls. Which of the two would you say lasts shorter?

furni_mis_ceilingLight_R_01.name: Hardwood Ceiling Light (Right)
furni_mis_ceilingLight_R_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_ceilingLight_R_01.description:
An auxiliary light source on the right side of the room with a ceiling-mounted wooden base.
A cello is crafted from wood as light shines within the house. Which of the two would you say lasts longer?

furni_mis_ceilingLight_01.name: Maintenance Desk Worklamp
furni_mis_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_ceilingLight_01.description:
A work lamp above the instrument maintenance work desk with excellent, concentrated lighting.
Its light may be soft, but it can nonetheless illuminate even the smallest specks of dust on the instrument's strings. Instrument maintenance is very delicate work, and requires no less meticulous effort than scientific experimentation.

furni_mis_ceiling_01.name: Decorative Ceiling Light
furni_mis_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_ceiling_01.description:
A wooden ceiling light with an irregular, geometric shape that forms a strange blend of both modern and classical aesthetics.
Be sure not to argue whether classical or popular music is better, lest you want to anger the boss. Music is in itself an encompassing art.

furni_mis_recordRack_01.name: Legendary Record Shelf
furni_mis_recordRack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_recordRack_01.description:
An extendable shelf for storing vinyl records with many long out-of-print records on display.
Despite the number of people who have sought to buy out this shelf, these records are all part of the boss's personal collection. They are only for display purposes and are not for sale.

furni_mis_cello_01.name: Cello for Sale
furni_mis_cello_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_cello_01.description:
A cello newly available for sale. Written on the hanging sign is the testimonial of a certain famous music critic.
This cello is the fruit of several years worth of its craftsman's painstaking effort, but even the most perfect instrument requires recognition for its worth to be proven. That goes for humans, too.

furni_mis_pyrophone_01.name: 'Raging Sounds'
furni_mis_pyrophone_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_pyrophone_01.description:
A replica of a new kind of instrument designed by a certain Leithanian musician. For display only.
It can only be played with the use of flames, and it is an intricate piece... The boss often tells his guests about this instrument from a faraway country, but no one has ever actually heard its sound.

furni_mis_phonograph_01.name: Antique Gramophone
furni_mis_phonograph_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_phonograph_01.description:
An antique gramophone from Victoria. There are many scratches on its surface.
On sunny days, it is used to play intense sonatas. On rainy ones, slow blues. No matter when a visitor comes, the records are always spinning.

furni_mis_decoration_01.name: Stringed Instrument Sculpture
furni_mis_decoration_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_decoration_01.description:
A custom-made sculpture with a strange design. Ingeniously divided into several visually distinct sections.
According to the boss, the inspiration behind its design was a large, ancient stringed instrument. If you want proof, though, there naturally isn't any.

furni_mis_desk_01.name: Instrument Maintenance Desk
furni_mis_desk_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_desk_01.description:
A semi-enclosed workspace for maintenance work with a glass display panel installed at the front.
All instruments will see damage whether they endure heavy use or no use at all. Likewise, both aloofness and internal strives can cause irreparable damage to interpersonal relationships.

furni_mis_chair_01.name: Simple Sofa Chair
furni_mis_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_chair_01.description:
A hardback sofa chair that was purchased and placed in the shop without much thought. The seat came with the cushion.
When there aren't any customers, the record player's melodies fill the whole room, and the boss slowly drifts away to sleep on the chair.

furni_mis_fluorescentLamp_01.name: Ceiling Fluorescent Light
furni_mis_fluorescentLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_fluorescentLamp_01.description:
The main light source of the room with a warm glow. Very ecofriendly.
In the shop, the instruments are art pieces, and you can never have enough light sources.

furni_mis_rack_01.name: Complimentary Tool Rack
furni_mis_rack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_rack_01.description:
A tool rack that came with the maintenance and repair work desks; has all the tools and machinery you'd need.
Modern technology has made instrument repair a lot easier than before, but the most intricate parts still rely on the craftsmen's hands.

furni_mis_pottedPlant_01.name: Welcoming Potted Plant
furni_mis_pottedPlant_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_pottedPlant_01.description:
A potted plant placed next to the shop's entrance with a suspended base.
Humans may be able to craft art with their hands, but nature in itself is an art.

furni_mis_toolStand_01.name: Instrument Repair Desk
furni_mis_toolStand_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_toolStand_01.description:
A repair work desk that came with the maintenance desk. All the tools were custom-made and definitely not cheap.
It takes more skill and care to repair an instrument than to maintain it. When customers bring in instruments of particular value to them, the boss takes to the work desk himself.

furni_mis_carpet_01.name: Monochrome Rug
furni_mis_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_carpet_01.description:
A regularly replaced rug that's resistant to dirt and anti-slip.
Watch your step and don't trip. It'll be a big problem if you knock any of the instruments over.

furni_mis_wallpaper_01.name: Geometric Wallpaper
furni_mis_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_wallpaper_01.description:
A wallpaper with a simple, uniform design that matches the shop's overall tone.
The workshop has been renovated twice, but the boss never really put in much effort into anything other than the instruments' upkeep.

furni_mis_floor_01.name: Obscure Patterned Floor Tiles
furni_mis_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_mis_floor_01.description:
Patterned floor tiles intricately placed together; very easy to clean.
The shop sees a lot of visitors, and the boss welcomes each of them with great enthusiasm. Status, wealth, and upbringing should never block entry to an instrument shop.

furni_vcWarRoom_bulb_01.name: Steel Framed Fluorescent Lamp
furni_vcWarRoom_bulb_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_bulb_01.description:
An auxiliary light source in front of the classified filing cabinet; very ecofriendly.
The dust on the pages lights up under the warm glow; this sealed history has never been forgotten, nor will it ever be.
furni_vcWarRoom_bulb_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_telephone_01.name: Communications Terminal
furni_vcWarRoom_telephone_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_telephone_01.description:
A communications terminal developed by Tempest Platoon.
No matter what orders we receive, we must remain calm. After all, those who stand in front of the terminal are at the core of the platoon.
furni_vcWarRoom_telephone_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_cabinet_01.name: Classified Filing Cabinet
furni_vcWarRoom_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_cabinet_01.description:
Tempest Platoon's standard filing cabinet.
Every time a document is read, filed away, edited, or destroyed means something has happened somewhere on Victorian soil.
furni_vcWarRoom_cabinet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_screen_01.name: Extendable Display Panel
furni_vcWarRoom_screen_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_screen_01.description:
Tempest Platoon's standard display panel. Normally used to illustrate intelligence.
When this display lights up, everyone in the war room must immediately stop what they are doing and await their deployments.
furni_vcWarRoom_screen_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_chair_01.name: Soft Blue Chair
furni_vcWarRoom_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_chair_01.description:
An ergonomically-designed sofa chair. Good for alleviating fatigue.
Each and every decision made here can influence the tide of the battle and therefore must be carefully thought through and reexamined.
furni_vcWarRoom_chair_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_box_01.name: War Room Coffee Set
furni_vcWarRoom_box_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_box_01.description:
A portable coffee pot and set of drinking utensils manufactured in Columbia.
No matter how alarmed everyone is, someone is bound to make coffee in the war room. It's not a matter of elegance; the warmth just calms us all down.
furni_vcWarRoom_box_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_floorlamp_01.name: Floor Lamp
furni_vcWarRoom_floorlamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_floorlamp_01.description:
A floor lamp next to the war table.
Wherever the light shines on the map, that place either has already become or is about to become a battlefield.
furni_vcWarRoom_floorlamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_tacticalBoard_01.name: Strategic Information Pegboard
furni_vcWarRoom_tacticalBoard_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_tacticalBoard_01.description:
A normal pegboard with much wear and tear.
Discharges, sacrifices... Aside from the unidentifiable traces left on the board, who could remember all those who have come and gone?
furni_vcWarRoom_tacticalBoard_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_ceiling_01.name: Ceiling Lights
furni_vcWarRoom_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_ceiling_01.description:
The main light source of the war room.
When the light strikes the cities on the table, it's as if the sun has finally broken through the clouds that shroud Victoria. It's what all of us believe, at least.
furni_vcWarRoom_ceiling_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_table_01.name: Strategic War Table
furni_vcWarRoom_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_table_01.description:
A tactical war table, features a solid wood base under Columbian glass.
From County Hillock to Londinium, the dark cloud over Victoria grows denser as more and more cities appear on this table.
furni_vcWarRoom_table_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_carpet_01.name: Military-Grade Rug
furni_vcWarRoom_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_carpet_01.description:
A standard rug used by Tempest Platoon that's resistant to dirt and anti-slip.
A storm may be brewing, but it will remain as steady as a rock.
furni_vcWarRoom_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_ceilingLamp_01.name: Warm Night Light
furni_vcWarRoom_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_ceilingLamp_01.description:
An auxiliary light source shining bright on the work that goes on under its glow. 
Horn recalls those long nights on duty with this soft, gentle light accompanying her until dawn.
furni_vcWarRoom_ceilingLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_pushRod_01.name: Strategy Plotting Rods
furni_vcWarRoom_pushRod_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_pushRod_01.description:
The assortment of wooden rods that go with the strategic war table.
Every inch of land depicted on the map is home to Victorian subjects. Would that these rods should not point anywhere.
furni_vcWarRoom_pushRod_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_board_01.name: Freestanding Strategy Board
furni_vcWarRoom_board_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_board_01.description:
Tempest Platoon's standard pegboard.
'When this board is clear, I take leave.' Horn's been saying that for a good long while.
furni_vcWarRoom_board_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_curtain_01.name: War Room Curtains
furni_vcWarRoom_curtain_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_curtain_01.description:
Pleated curtains purchased on a whim.
Buildings crowd the view outside the window, and those who pop over to visit the window are eager for some light to pierce the clouds.
furni_vcWarRoom_curtain_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_flag_01.name: 'Indomitable Banner'
furni_vcWarRoom_flag_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_flag_01.description:
Tempest Platoon's battle standard, fully restored and cleaned regularly such that it's always good as new.
Hope and glory for all time, that is the meaning of this standard.
furni_vcWarRoom_flag_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_wallpaper_01.name: War Room Wallpaper
furni_vcWarRoom_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_wallpaper_01.description:
Generic war room wallpaper.
Keep calm, stay focused, screen out distractions, and make the right call. That's the military way.
furni_vcWarRoom_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_vcWarRoom_floor_01.name: War Room Floor Tiles
furni_vcWarRoom_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_vcWarRoom_floor_01.description:
The dark floor tiles in the war room have a smooth, neat finish.
Deployments, briefings, orders, they all come through... in a very orderly fashion. There is no faffing about in this room.
furni_vcWarRoom_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_goldBoat_ceilingDeco_S_01.name: Side Hall Curtain
furni_goldBoat_ceilingDeco_S_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_ceilingDeco_S_01.description:
The short curtain is made of several strips, boasting a gradient design.
Beyond the cabin lies the ocean, and the Terrans, trapped on 'land', may never know its vast mysteries.

furni_goldBoat_ceilingDeco_L_01.name: Main Hall Curtain
furni_goldBoat_ceilingDeco_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_ceilingDeco_L_01.description:
The long curtain is made of several strips, boasting a gradient design.
Beyond the cabin lies the ocean. Is the ship fated to return to port in Iberia? Or to sail deeper into the ocean?

furni_goldBoat_floorlamp_01.name: Decorative Candlestand
furni_goldBoat_floorlamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_floorlamp_01.description:
A charming ornament with a branched candlestand atop a drum base.
The candles burn as 'they' pray after a hunt. It's a remarkably 'human' ritual they still keep.
furni_goldBoat_floorlamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_goldBoat_stairs_01.name: Finely Carved Marble Staircase
furni_goldBoat_stairs_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_stairs_01.description:
A spiral staircase in the Leithanian architectural style, it is itself a work of art, carved from a single block of marble.
Go up to survive, down to perish, such is the law of evolution.

furni_goldBoat_carpet_S_01.name: Non-Slip Stair Rug
furni_goldBoat_carpet_S_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_carpet_S_01.description:
A rug placed in front of the marble spiral staircase. Both non-slip and resistant to dirt.
The nethersea brand once spread in the cabins; this ship never needed this fluorescence.

furni_goldBoat_ceilingLight_L_01.name: Cylindrical Ceiling Light Set
furni_goldBoat_ceilingLight_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_ceilingLight_L_01.description:
The main light source of the main hall. An gir-style handicraft; very bright.
What was it that guided this lone ship on the seas in the days since the lighthouses' radiance faded?

furni_goldBoat_ceilingLight_S_01.name: Cylindrical Chandelier
furni_goldBoat_ceilingLight_S_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_ceilingLight_S_01.description:
The secondary light source of the main hall. An gir-style handicraft; it is energy efficient and environmentally friendly.
In the sorrowful time of the Profound Silence, with no light and no sound, time itself seemed to stand still.

furni_goldBoat_chair_01.name: Shell-shaped Lounge Chair
furni_goldBoat_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_chair_01.description:
A lounge chair in the style of a seashell with a hollow base.
It was the captain's chair alone for sixty years, but he and his ship have long since become one. 'He is his own king.'

furni_goldBoat_stool_01.name: Movable Soft Chair
furni_goldBoat_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_stool_01.description:
A normal soft stool. The dark cover can be removed for easy cleaning.
Furniture made for humans has not been used for quite some time.

furni_goldBoat_table_01.name: Stultifera Navis Conference Table
furni_goldBoat_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_table_01.description:
A conference table, present since Stultifera Navis left port. Its granite has been polished to a shine.
The captain once sat at this table and shared the glorious future of Iberia with his guests... the Seaborn were apparently not invited.

furni_goldBoat_mirror_01.name: 'Self-Portrait of Evolution'
furni_goldBoat_mirror_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_mirror_01.description:
A Victorian-style floor mirror, with a magnificent brass surface and gilded frame.
For the past sixty years, could they truly look into the mirror and say it was 'themselves' that they saw?
furni_goldBoat_mirror_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_goldBoat_paintingArea_01.name: 'Art and Civilization'
furni_goldBoat_paintingArea_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_paintingArea_01.description:
An easel set, including a sanded base, enclosure fencing, and a full set of painting tools.
With song, ink, and brush, art can doubtless cross any racial boundaries.
furni_goldBoat_paintingArea_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_goldBoat_vase_01.name: Glass Vase
furni_goldBoat_vase_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_vase_01.description:
Common glass pieces used to hold flowers to bring some color to a long voyage.
The ship has not seen a spring on land for over sixty years.
furni_goldBoat_vase_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_goldBoat_carpet_L_01.name: Non-Slip Rug
furni_goldBoat_carpet_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_carpet_L_01.description:
The non-slip rug that accompanies the conference table is hand-woven, sporting a simple but bountiful pattern.
The place upon which you stand is known as Stultifera. Once upon a time, she brought Iberia glory whenever she sailed forth.

furni_goldBoat_wallpaper_01.name: Stultifera Navis Reception Room Wallpaper
furni_goldBoat_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_wallpaper_01.description:
The wallpaper in the reception room of Stultifera Navis, said to be hand-painted by the vessel's designer, sports countless simple, and yet bewildering patterns.
The ship is a product of both Originium power and gir technology. As such, every pattern in the room exists to be deciphered.

furni_goldBoat_floor_01.name: Stultifera Navis Reception Room Flooring
furni_goldBoat_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_goldBoat_floor_01.description:
Dark hardwood and bright tile flooring, the materials and colors are clear and direct, punctuating a defined design vision.
The captain runs a tight ship, keeping everything meticulously clean. Even with the daily hunts, the floor remains as new.

furni_concertHall_ceilingLight_01.name: 'Starry Sky'
furni_concertHall_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_ceilingLight_01.description:
Elegant hanging lamps that give off the sound of wind chimes when rung, reminiscent of the starry skies over the plains.
Do not ring when the power is on!

furni_concertHall_ceiling_01.name: 'Dark Clouds'
furni_concertHall_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_ceiling_01.description:
The semi-transparent black screens stand in contrast with the white light of the lamps, like faint dark clouds that barely manage to block even starlight.
Serene with a tinge of regret, like a minor seventh chord.

furni_concertHall_wallSticker_01.name: 'Evening Glow'
furni_concertHall_wallSticker_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_wallSticker_01.description:
Red square wall decor, with patterns similar to the wallpaper's wood pattern, but in a much brighter color.
The evening glow lingers in the sky, even after the sun has sunk completely beneath the horizon.

furni_concertHall_screen_01.name: 'Night Curtain'
furni_concertHall_screen_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_screen_01.description:
A blue curtain inspired by the landscapes of a noble Leithanian painter.
'The commoners out there freezing on the streets have the time to lament the sunset's passing, but not to appreciate the equally beautiful night.'

furni_concertHall_pianoKit_01.name: Secondhand Piano Set
furni_concertHall_pianoKit_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_pianoKit_01.description: The piano that Czerny grew up with. The flowers are from a young Operator who is learning to play. He still remembers the excitement of learning his first piece, and wants to share it with others.
furni_concertHall_pianoKit_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_concertHall_stool_01.name: Score Stand Set
furni_concertHall_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_stool_01.description:
A white stool and score stand.
Even the musically-inept gain a desire to learn an instrument when they sit on it long enough.
furni_concertHall_stool_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_concertHall_musicStand_01.name: Unfinished Composition
furni_concertHall_musicStand_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_musicStand_01.description:
A few pieces of score paper lie on the stand, the draft of an unfinished piece.
The sight of Czerny tearing his own hair out is proof that even the greatest composers can find themselves at a creative impasse.
furni_concertHall_musicStand_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_concertHall_stool2_01.name: Claimed Score Stand Set
furni_concertHall_stool2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_stool2_01.description:
A white stool and score stand, with an Operator's instrument case laid nearby.
Practice day after day, until your instrument sings what is on your mind.
furni_concertHall_stool2_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_concertHall_violinCase_01.name: Handmade Violin
furni_concertHall_violinCase_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_violinCase_01.description: A violin found in a Rhodes Island storeroom, here because Hibiscus thought it appropriate. Czerny was surprised to find it was the work of a master, but years of disrepair have relegated it to a mere decoration.
furni_concertHall_violinCase_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_concertHall_soundSystem_01.name: Antique Wooden Speaker
furni_concertHall_soundSystem_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_soundSystem_01.description:
A speaker in the old Leithanian style, with modern Columbian Originium circuitry inside.
The two paths lead to the same end, but Columbian products are friendlier to Operators not skilled in the Originium Arts.

furni_concertHall_clock_01.name: 'Afterglow'
furni_concertHall_clock_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_clock_01.description:
A wall clock with a design based on Afterglow Hall.
Andante tells us that the place is still off-limits to unauthorized personnel.

furni_concertHall_decoration_01.name: 'Ensemble'
furni_concertHall_decoration_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_decoration_01.description:
A plaster object, the theme of which is inscrutable to those not party to its making.
It consists of a chalk-colored main body, an elegant ebony frame, and piano key-shaped ornaments rising towards the clouds.

furni_concertHall_cabinet_01.name: Quaint Low Cabinet
furni_concertHall_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_cabinet_01.description:
A low shelf from Czerny's home, with a simple and practical design and plenty of storage space.
The flowers are artificial, the photos copies, and the flute an imitation that nobody has ever played, but the stinging memories remain forever vivid.

furni_concertHall_coffeeTable_01.name: Triangle Tea Table
furni_concertHall_coffeeTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_coffeeTable_01.description:
