A tea table with a metal surface and a quaint little design.
Certain parts of the table ring at a fixed pitch when hit with the right object, making it a potential glockenspiel replacement.

furni_concertHall_carpet_01.name: Caramel Coffee Rug
furni_concertHall_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_carpet_01.description:
A design once popular in Vyseheim, reminiscent of coffee foam with syrup poured on it.
Hibiscus was silent for a moment after Ebenholz told her what Leithanians call this pattern. They were both reminded of someone who had much to do with coffee.

furni_concertHall_celloCase_01.name: Classic Cello Case
furni_concertHall_celloCase_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_celloCase_01.description:
An expensive-looking cello case that came as a set with Ebenholz's cello.
Ebenholz never puts his instrument inside; he finds it too dark, too cramped.

furni_concertHall_clothesStand_01.name: Irregular Clothing Rack
furni_concertHall_clothesStand_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_clothesStand_01.description:
A clothing rack with a unique design. One of the garments hanging on it has never been worn, but remains spotless nonetheless.
The white jacket has turned yellow, but the one who cleans it every day does not notice.

furni_concertHall_floorlamp_01.name: Artistic Floor Lamp
furni_concertHall_floorlamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_floorlamp_01.description:
A floor lamp with a 16th-note motif.
The design was Hibiscus's idea. The other two said nothing, but both privately thought it would have a detrimental effect on the lifespan of the light tube.

furni_concertHall_wallpaper_01.name: Wood Pattern Wallpaper
furni_concertHall_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_wallpaper_01.description:
Thick wood-pattern wallpaper with tightly-packed holes to absorb sound.
The wallpaper alone is not enough to completely block out noise, not even the snoring of the Operator next door.

furni_concertHall_floor_01.name: Stage Floor
furni_concertHall_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_concertHall_floor_01.description:
Floor paneling in the style of a concert hall stage, said to have good acoustic qualities.
Young Operators often run around on it while Czerny is playing. The effect that it has on sound is negligible.

furni_rhineLab_incubator_01.name: 'The Dream Begins'
furni_rhineLab_incubator_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_incubator_01.description:
An experimental pod, a petri dish of new technologies. Made of special reinforced glass.
As her dream takes shape, it simply quietly exists, as all things did in the beginning.

furni_rhineLab_accessControl_01.name: Entrance Disinfectant Sprayer
furni_rhineLab_accessControl_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_accessControl_01.description:
A contact-free disinfectant sprayer equipped with facial recognition technology.
Passersby rarely slow their stride. Technology never stops, and neither do they.

furni_rhineLab_plant_01.name: 'Tree of Life'
furni_rhineLab_plant_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_plant_01.description:
A plant from the Pioneers, representing trust and friendship.
Dorothy takes care of it with a warm and gentle secret in her heart.

furni_rhineLab_trolley_01.name: Medical Trolley
furni_rhineLab_trolley_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_trolley_01.description:
A mobile medical platform customized to the user's needs.
Often carries coffee and energy drinks, allowing users to run tests late into the night.

furni_rhineLab_stool_01.name: Medical Stool
furni_rhineLab_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_stool_01.description:
Fully adjustable and seated with an ergonomic leather cushion.
Researchers often fall asleep on it, dreaming about next week's performance review and their unpaid loans.

furni_rhineLab_table_01.name: Experiment Operating Table
furni_rhineLab_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_table_01.description:
A customized experiment table with test equipment and a computer connected to the Rhine terminal.
The flowers on it are picked from the barrens. Dorothy moved the plants inside, shielding them from the dangers of the outdoors.

furni_rhineLab_folder_T_01.name: Rhine Folder (L)
furni_rhineLab_folder_T_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_folder_T_01.description:
A Rhine standard-issue file folder, designed for external presentations.
Technology is condensed into words, and laid out on paper.

furni_rhineLab_folder_O_01.name: Rhine Folder (R)
furni_rhineLab_folder_O_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_folder_O_01.description:
A Rhine standard-issue file folder, designed for external presentations.
Ambition is justified as progress, categorized and filed.

furni_rhineLab_ceiling_01.name: Ceiling Light Filter
furni_rhineLab_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_ceiling_01.description:
Supplemental lighting for the lab, with filters to protect the staff's vision.
Only new researchers remember to turn off the lights on time. They soon spend their entire day in the labs, from 8am till the wee hours, just like the lights.

furni_rhineLab_device_01.name: 'Promised Land'
furni_rhineLab_device_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_device_01.description:
Life is linked to Originium. Originium Arts creations are born with emotions here, and set out towards the promised land in their dreams.
Dorothy will give her life to protect them.

furni_rhineLab_ceilingLight_01.name: 'Contemplation'
furni_rhineLab_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_ceilingLight_01.description:
The swivel design lets the user adjust position at will.
The light is locked on to a corner of the desk, and does not move during the long working day.

furni_rhineLab_stand_01.name: Twin-Monitor Stand
furni_rhineLab_stand_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_stand_01.description:
The intuitive design allows the user to easily see the information they need, no matter where they are.
The front is progress, and the back is continuation. Technology is not restricted to one direction, and is always developing.

furni_rhineLab_curtain_L_01.name: Privacy Curtain (L)
furni_rhineLab_curtain_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_curtain_L_01.description:
A light-grey gauze curtain that obstructs vision in one direction. The patterns are streamlined and stylish.
A simple curtain separates laboratory and barrens. The researchers work hard indoors for their livelihood, while the Pioneers struggle for their lives in the wilderness.
furni_rhineLab_curtain_L_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_rhineLab_curtain_S_01.name: Privacy Curtain (R)
furni_rhineLab_curtain_S_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_curtain_S_01.description:
A light-grey gauze curtain that obstructs vision in one direction. The patterns are streamlined and stylish.
A simple curtain separates laboratory and barrens. Dreams propagate equality, while reality injects conspiracy. Technology rarely moves in the way people would like it to.
furni_rhineLab_curtain_S_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_rhineLab_wallpaper_01.name: Experimental Culture Pod Wallpaper
furni_rhineLab_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_wallpaper_01.description:
Simple, minimalist wallpaper for the culture pod.
Every researcher dreams of the day when their passion and commitment for science bears fruit.
furni_rhineLab_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_rhineLab_floor_01.name: Experimental Culture Pod Floor
furni_rhineLab_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_rhineLab_floor_01.description:
The spotless floor tiles of the culture pod have undergone anti-slip treatment.
Filing reports, logging meetings, updating data... researchers never stay here for too long, always pursuing the next step.
furni_rhineLab_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_idealCity_ceilingLamp_01.name: Windchime Light
furni_idealCity_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_ceilingLamp_01.description:
Lamp with a small hanging wind chime, providing some accompanying music.
The Durin use it to determine if someone is drunk or not. 'You sadda argh fhree o' 'em? Ya drunk! Da argh fibe, and I puddem ub dare maself!'

furni_idealCity_partition_01.name: Fence Set
furni_idealCity_partition_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_partition_01.description:
Passersby often try to jump up and grab the vines hanging from the fence.
Some Durin compare their heights with that of the mushrooms here. 'Hey, there's only a 1cm difference between us!'

furni_idealCity_lifeBuoyRack_01.name: Swim Tube Rack
furni_idealCity_lifeBuoyRack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_lifeBuoyRack_01.description:
A rack with swim tubes for your use.
Be sure to pay attention to the size. Swim tubes made for a Durin would only fit your shoulder.

furni_idealCity_flag_01.name: Flag Decorations
furni_idealCity_flag_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_flag_01.description:
Triangular flags colored with dyes made from berries and other plants, giving them a fresh, natural feel.
The Durin thought about coloring the flags in order, but gave up after the third flag. 'A natural, spontaneous beauty!'

furni_idealCity_ceiling_01.name: Ceiling Drapes
furni_idealCity_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_ceiling_01.description:
Pozmka is the only one who noticed that the shape of the wind can be observed in its streamlined design.
Before the last vote, these were all red flowers on a blue background. Minimalist said it made his eyes hurt for three months.

furni_idealCity_fan_01.name: 'Beautiful Voice' Fan
furni_idealCity_fan_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_fan_01.description:
Speak or sing towards the fan to get a funky effect.
Now taking a vote on whether to put a speaker on it. Please proceed to the forum within 10 minutes for the meeting!
furni_idealCity_fan_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_idealCity_sofa_S_01.name: Best Design Sofa (S)
furni_idealCity_sofa_S_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_sofa_S_01.description: A sofa that earned the highest honors for its design. Minimalist is not at all happy about this. He personally proposed several designs, which did not get any votes because of how minimalist they were. The Durin considered them just frames.
furni_idealCity_sofa_S_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_idealCity_bench_01.name: Low Bench
furni_idealCity_bench_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_bench_01.description:
How many people can it fit? The Durin say five, the Forte say two, and the buyer tried it himself and found it was three.
'The moral of the story is that you have to try everything yourself.' The old man closes the book. 'That's why you won't know how good this ale is till you drink it!'

furni_idealCity_pottedPlant_01.name: Plaster Planter
furni_idealCity_pottedPlant_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_pottedPlant_01.description:
The step design provides a place to put your drink while tending to the plant.
Drink on top, mushroom on the bottom. Don't put the wrong thing in your mouth.

furni_idealCity_sandCastle_01.name: Sand Castle
furni_idealCity_sandCastle_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_sandCastle_01.description:
A sandcastle left behind by the last person who came to play. He definitely enjoyed himself.
There's no rule that a sand castle must be built on sand. One could appear anywhere, often in unexpected places.

furni_idealCity_sofa_L_01.name: Best Design Sofa (L)
furni_idealCity_sofa_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_sofa_L_01.description: A sofa that earned the highest honors for its design. Minimalist is not at all happy about this. It can also be used as an inflatable boat. Bring the inflatable ball it comes with and play with your friends on the water!
furni_idealCity_sofa_L_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_idealCity_surfboard_01.name: Drunkard Surf Boards
furni_idealCity_surfboard_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_surfboard_01.description: Design inspired by the drunken Durin's wobble. The two tagged boards belong to the last surfing competition co-champions. One had fruit wine, the other ale, which caused a bit of chaos when they reached the finish line at the same time.
furni_idealCity_surfboard_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_idealCity_pottedPlant2_01.name: Transparent Planter
furni_idealCity_pottedPlant2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_pottedPlant2_01.description: The designer didn't specify how it should be used, so it could be used for anything. The Durin had a bunch of Leaping Gloompincers in it to see who could jump the highest. These were replaced with plants after failing to stop them from jumping out.
furni_idealCity_pottedPlant2_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_idealCity_downlight_01.name: White Ceiling Light
furni_idealCity_downlight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_downlight_01.description:
Casually picked up off the shelves by the Durin, as part of a buy-one, get-one-free set.
The only design that Minimalist has praised.

furni_idealCity_beach_01.name: Artificial Beach
furni_idealCity_beach_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_beach_01.description:
Small artificial beach that allows 3-5 people to play on it. The sand is soft and fine.
Bringing this much sand indoors took a lot of effort, but sensibility overwhelmed sense, and action took priority over thought.

furni_idealCity_wallpaper_01.name: Panoramic Display (Great Aquapit)
furni_idealCity_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_wallpaper_01.description:
The Durin have recreated the great slide and other entertainment facilities from before they were blown up.
Elysium always goes on about his skills in water sports and how handsome his reflection looks whenever he passes by.

furni_idealCity_floor_01.name: Experientorium Floor
furni_idealCity_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_idealCity_floor_01.description:
Slip-proof, water-absorbent floor to prevent accidents.
Will not help someone so drunk they cannot tell the ceiling from the floor, however.

furni_durin_ceilingLamp_01.name: Bronze Arc Lamp
furni_durin_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_ceilingLamp_01.description:
The design may look flamboyant, but it is very efficient on the inside.
As the soft light falls on the Nutcracker's face, the Sugar Pome Fairy recognizes it as her friend.

furni_durin_nutcracker_01.name: 'Toys and Old Friends'
furni_durin_nutcracker_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_nutcracker_01.description:
Custom-made nutcracker figure reused after a performance of The Nutcracker.
A tear falls from the Sugar Pome Fairy's eyes, while thick sawdust drops from the Nutcracker's. A lyrical sonata accompanies the climax of their reunion.

furni_durin_bed_01.name: Snack Sofa Bed
furni_durin_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_bed_01.description:
The fusion of dining and sleep, born in a dream, recreated in reality.
The Nutcracker stands guard by the Sugar Pome Fairy's bedside night after night, as he used to when he was a royal guard.

furni_durin_carpet_C_01.name: Modular Floor Mat
furni_durin_carpet_C_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_carpet_C_01.description:
Round rugs that can be connected to each other to form different shapes.
The guard stumbled over a rug that the Zalak Queen conjured before he could take four steps back, and was transformed into a nutcracker.

furni_durin_stool_01.name: Playing Card Stool
furni_durin_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_stool_01.description:
Square stool inspired by playing cards. The four sides correspond to the suits in a deck.
'Four suits to the cards, four sides to the stool. Feed the fruit to the Sugar Pome Fairy, then take four steps back to break the Zalak Queen's curse.'

furni_durin_floorlamp_01.name: Screw Thread Floor Lamp
furni_durin_floorlamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_floorlamp_01.description:
Floor lamp that goes with the bronze arc lamp. The hollow bronze frame looks dignified without breaking the bank.
The shell of the nut is incredibly hard. To reach the meat within, the guard used his sword, then his teeth... neither the lamp nor the guard slept that night.

furni_durin_carpet_R_01.name: Geometric-Patterned Rug
furni_durin_carpet_R_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_carpet_R_01.description:
The rug that comes with the dining table is simple in design, but the red, yellow and blue colors give off a fairy tale vibe.
Having lost her beauty, the Sugar Pome Fairy stumbles in shock and sleeps for fifteen years, until her guard brings back the legendary nut.

furni_durin_table_01.name: Sugar Pome Fairy's Dining Table
furni_durin_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_table_01.description:
The dining table has never been empty. Turn the key to enter a fantastic realm full of delicious food.
'Eat cookies and fruit, but not at the same time.' The Sugar Pome Fairy's beauty tip did not work on the Zalak Queen, who decided to take revenge.

furni_durin_ceilingLight_01.name: Vine Light Set
furni_durin_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_ceilingLight_01.description:
Lamps made in the theme of leaves growing amongst vines, giving off a soft and gentle light.
A group of Zalak chew at the Nutcracker's body in the darkness. The Sugar Pome Fairy turns on the light and throws her shoe. She saves his life this time.

furni_durin_ceiling_01.name: Hanging Bell
furni_durin_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_ceiling_01.description:
Eye-catching hanging bell that only rings at specific times.
The evil Zalak Queen casts her spell. Bells ring, and the brave guard rushes up to catch the Sugar Pome Fairy, who has fainted. Climax of Act I.

furni_durin_door_01.name: Banquet Hall Door
furni_durin_door_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_door_01.description:
Bronze door to the Sugar Pome Fairy's banquet hall. The keyhole is purely ornamental; it must be opened with a spell.
The minister introduces the Nutcracker as a gift from a far-away land. Overjoyed at awakening, the Sugar Pome Fairy does not notice anything strange.

furni_durin_sofa_01.name: Snack Loveseat
furni_durin_sofa_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_sofa_01.description:
Designed along the same philosophy as the snack sofa bed. The cushion's color is the red of tea and raspberry cake.
'Only the legendary nut can restore her beauty,' says the witch to the guard, sitting on her couch.

furni_durin_alarmClock_01.name: 'Rose & Needle'
furni_durin_alarmClock_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_alarmClock_01.description:
Alarm clock with roses for hands, blooming and wilting with the time.
The alarm rings, the roses bloom, the guests take their seats, and the Sugar Pome Fairy's banquet starts right on time.

furni_durin_chess_01.name: Chess Object
furni_durin_chess_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_chess_01.description:
In the original draft, the Zalak Queen was supposed to knock out the guard with this chess piece. Now, it exists on stage solely as an ornament.
The chess pieces have taken their places, and the curtains close. The actors do not want to wake from their dream, and the audience does not want to leave the story.

furni_durin_wallpaper_01.name: Banquet Hall Wallpaper
furni_durin_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_wallpaper_01.description:
The banquet hall is adorned with simple wood grain patterned wallpaper.
Help each other, protect each other. It is a simple story.

furni_durin_floor_01.name: Banquet Hall Floor
furni_durin_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_durin_floor_01.description:
Seamless and dark wood grain patterned floor, but relatively difficult to clean.
The girl wakes up to find the 'Nutcracker Set' on the floor. She recalls the dream, and finds that the Nutcracker is smiling at her.

furni_camp_curtain_01.name: Silk Drapes
furni_camp_curtain_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_curtain_01.description: Drapes that keep the wind and sand out of a tent, swaying in the Kazimierz breeze.
furni_camp_curtain_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_ceilingLight_01.name: Camping Lights
furni_camp_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_ceilingLight_01.description: A pair of lights illuminating the camp. The asymmetric design is the expression of an unbalanced soul. Will you find peace while under their light?
furni_camp_ceilingLight_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_toolTable_01.name: Camping Kitchen Table
furni_camp_toolTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_toolTable_01.description: Table used to prepare food while camping. Is it a sad thing that the blade is being used to cut meat at the table, rather than one's enemies in battle? Only time will tell.
furni_camp_toolTable_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_BBQGrill_01.name: Camping Barbecue Rack
furni_camp_BBQGrill_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_BBQGrill_01.description: Smokeless barbecue rack. A family's decline begins with the passing of the elders. The younger generation steps into their place; fate never gives one the luxury of choice.
furni_camp_BBQGrill_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_carpet_01.name: Leaf Rug
furni_camp_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_carpet_01.description: Leaf-shaped camping rug. Only dead leaves fall, buried beneath the feet.
furni_camp_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_brazier_01.name: Unlit Coal Pot
furni_camp_brazier_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_brazier_01.description: A coal pot that has not yet been lit. Schnitz, Yolanta. He calls those names, but there is no one to help him light the charcoal.
furni_camp_brazier_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_column_01.name: Camping Column
furni_camp_column_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_column_01.description: Stone column made with simple Originium Arts. The walls of the heart are not built of stone, but are harder than any stone, trapping the soul that longs to escape.
furni_camp_column_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_ceiling_01.name: Camping Ceiling Decorations
furni_camp_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_ceiling_01.description: Ceiling decoration with chains of light, providing another source of illumination. He longs for the days when the skies shone on their own, and loathes the nights when all he could see were the lights of buildings.
furni_camp_ceiling_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_ceilingLamp_01.name: Camping Designer's Light
furni_camp_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_ceilingLamp_01.description: Designer's light inspired by layers of leaves. Light leaves shadows, covering the earth in darkness.
furni_camp_ceilingLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_table_01.name: Camping Table
furni_camp_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_table_01.description: Camping table where people can gather around to eat. Makes the lone traveler feel even lonelier.
furni_camp_table_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_longBench_01.name: Camping Bench
furni_camp_longBench_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_longBench_01.description: Wooden bench for people to sit on by the table. Reminds him of the days when the benches were filled.
furni_camp_longBench_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_pager_01.name: Camping Radio
furni_camp_pager_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_pager_01.description: Portable radio for contacting others while camping. It does not reach the ones he is looking for, and he rejects all unnecessary contact with others.
furni_camp_pager_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_hangingChair_01.name: Camping Hammock Chair
furni_camp_hangingChair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_hangingChair_01.description: Comfy hammock chair, a rare treat that the self-exiled allowed himself.
furni_camp_hangingChair_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_stone_01.name: Mossy Rock
furni_camp_stone_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_stone_01.description: Leftover stone from building a camp, repurposed as decoration. Putting a desk lamp on the mossy rock turns it into a table. When the meaning of the inanimate can be overwritten like this, what of the living?
furni_camp_stone_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_fishingRodKit_01.name: Portable Fishing Set
furni_camp_fishingRodKit_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_fishingRodKit_01.description: A full set of gear for fishing by the river. Fishing is all about waiting and anticipation. Would one fish if they lacked anything to anticipate?
furni_camp_fishingRodKit_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_wallpaper_01.name: Panoramic Display (Campground)
furni_camp_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_wallpaper_01.description: Shows the sunset outside Dzwonek. Today's sun is about to fade away, but he only scorches the sky, and can do nothing about the inflammable land.
furni_camp_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_camp_floor_01.name: Camping Floor
furni_camp_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_camp_floor_01.description: Floor made from Dzwonek wood. Is home where one's family is, or where the familiar sights are? By either standard, Mynar has no home.
furni_camp_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_bayWindow_01.name: Window-Side Couch Bed
furni_classroom_bayWindow_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_bayWindow_01.description: Couch-bed made from cushions to allow teachers to take some rest between classes. Even when the curtains are drawn, there is still a light there to drive out the darkness.
furni_classroom_bayWindow_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_column_01.name: Sturdy Pillar
furni_classroom_column_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_column_01.description: Tall and solid pillar that supports the classroom ceiling. When the weight of the world is placed on its shoulders, it must either stand tall or fall apart.
furni_classroom_column_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_stationeryHolder_01.name: 'Pen Holder' on Books
furni_classroom_stationeryHolder_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_stationeryHolder_01.description: A lidless teapot lies on a tall pile of books, with several broken rulers within. That which is old and dusty may still be useful after a bit of cleaning.
furni_classroom_stationeryHolder_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_lowTable_01.name: Small Window-Side Table
furni_classroom_lowTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_lowTable_01.description: Books and papers are scattered on the desk. Even cleaning up seems impossible, but some people seem to be able to find what they need in the mess.
furni_classroom_lowTable_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_ladder_01.name: Wooden Bookcase Stepladder
furni_classroom_ladder_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_ladder_01.description: Old wooden steps placed before a bookcase, wobbling ever so slightly. One must be on solid footing in order to raise one's hands towards the frontiers of knowledge.
furni_classroom_ladder_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_bookshelf_01.name: Wooden Bookcase
furni_classroom_bookshelf_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_bookshelf_01.description: Simple bookcase with a carefully picked selection of books, volumes that are worth your time every read.
furni_classroom_bookshelf_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_map_01.name: Large Map
furni_classroom_map_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_map_01.description: A big, versatile map of the entire known world. Far does the gaze cast, to places that the feet cannot reach.
furni_classroom_map_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_clock_01.name: Antique Clock
furni_classroom_clock_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_clock_01.description: An old hanging clock that rings at the start and end of each lesson. The sound of the clock never changes, only the mood of the listener.
furni_classroom_clock_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_carpet_01.name: Checker Rug
furni_classroom_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_carpet_01.description: Soft and thick checkered rug, helping to prevent injuries from falling off the steps. In some eras, children are born diving towards the hard ground with nothing to buffer the impact.
furni_classroom_carpet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_lectern_01.name: 'Cramped Knowledge'
furni_classroom_lectern_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_lectern_01.description: Sculptures and paintings line the lectern, while formulae and language lessons fill the blackboard. The lights of the desks stay on until late at night, while the necks of those who study in front of them ache until the sun sets.
furni_classroom_lectern_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_tableChairGraffiti_01.name: Messy Desk Set
furni_classroom_tableChairGraffiti_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_tableChairGraffiti_01.description: A standard desk set used in any classroom, allowing two students to sit side-by-side. Students' scrawlings are hidden behind the books. After all, the urge for self-expression is an eternal part of human nature.
furni_classroom_tableChairGraffiti_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_tableChairPenRack_01.name: Desk Set
furni_classroom_tableChairPenRack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_tableChairPenRack_01.description: A standard desk set used in any classroom, allowing two students to sit side-by-side. Books are lined up tidily on the desk, used by students who embody the human nature of curiosity.
furni_classroom_tableChairPenRack_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_displayScreen_01.name: Projector Screen
furni_classroom_displayScreen_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_displayScreen_01.description: Cheap screen that needs to be manually wound-up when idle. Letters form words, pictures form information, and history recreates itself on this white screen.
furni_classroom_displayScreen_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_ceilingLamp_01.name: Classroom Light
furni_classroom_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_ceilingLamp_01.description: Green ceiling light that illuminates the classroom without hurting the eyes. Read quietly, or take a little nap under it.
furni_classroom_ceilingLamp_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_bookBox_01.name: Small Book Box
furni_classroom_bookBox_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_bookBox_01.description: Book box that is the same height as a desk. Can only hold a few books, just as how everyone's patience has a limit.
furni_classroom_bookBox_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_cabinet_01.name: Classroom Storage Cabinet
furni_classroom_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_cabinet_01.description: Wooden cabinet filled with classroom materials. Looks tidy on the outside, but messy on the inside. Appearances are hard to keep up.
furni_classroom_cabinet_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_blackboard_01.name: Notices
furni_classroom_blackboard_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_blackboard_01.description: Class schedules and school announcements are posted on a small blackboard at the back of the classroom. Time flies from row to row, from week to week.
furni_classroom_blackboard_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_wallpaper_01.name: Classroom Wallpaper
furni_classroom_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_wallpaper_01.description: Dignified green wallpaper that goes well with the wooden furnishings in the classroom. When the city is filled with the scent of blood and saltpeter, will there be a speck of green to ease those furrowed brows?
furni_classroom_wallpaper_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_classroom_floor_01.name: Classroom Floor
furni_classroom_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_classroom_floor_01.description: Subdued wooden floor that remains clean and shiny thanks to the work of the staff and students. But it sees less footprints by the year.
furni_classroom_floor_01.obtainApproach: Purchased from the Limited Furniture Store

furni_oct1st_deckChair_01.name: All-in-one Leisure Pod
furni_oct1st_deckChair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_oct1st_deckChair_01.description: The miraculous combination of chair and entertainment system, achieved at no small cost. It can switch between sleep mode and game mode. No one uses it to work.

furni_animation_projector_01.name: Dawn's Light Projector
furni_animation_projector_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_animation_projector_01.description: This projector was created to commemorate the release of the anime. The film is the summation of countless experiences, the images the product of blood, sweat, and tears. But while the production staff celebrates, they still worry about how the audience will receive their work.

furni_animation_trophy_01.name: Audience Choice Award
furni_animation_trophy_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_animation_trophy_01.description: This award was created to commemorate the anime's success. It is shaped like a bunny rabbit. A job well done gives the production staff a deep sense of pride.

furni_reception_screen_01.name: 'Wealth Beyond Measure'
furni_reception_screen_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_reception_screen_01.description: A set of Yanese screens that include a rack and a short dresser. Some might say the copper coin theming is tacky, and the items left behind by previous visitors may not dispel that impression.

furni_reception_sofa_01.name: Tearoom Sofa Seat
furni_reception_sofa_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_reception_sofa_01.description: A specially-designed Yanese hardwood sofa seat. In contrast to the hardwood construction, the upholstery on the seat and back are extra thick. It is remarkably comfortable.

furni_reception_longBench_01.name: 'Tree of Longevity'
furni_reception_longBench_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_reception_longBench_01.description: A bench in the traditional Yanese style with a pine tree bonsai adorning one of the armrests. The pine is a metaphor for boundless vitality.

furni_reception_coffeetable_01.name: 'Flowing Water'
furni_reception_coffeetable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_reception_coffeetable_01.description: A coffee table in the traditional Yanese style with a feature of flowing water decorating one end. The water is a metaphor for the flowing of good luck.

furni_reception_showcase_01.name: 'The Treasury'
furni_reception_showcase_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_reception_showcase_01.description: A painstakingly curated Yanese cabinet of curiosities. The elaborate ornaments are arranged in such a way as to inspire awe, and only a true connoisseur knows the value of the collection.

furni_reception_carpet_01.name: Tearoom Rug
furni_reception_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_reception_carpet_01.description: An inviting, brightly-colored rug. The brightness of the red contrasts with the floor, creating a sense of layered space. It does make some trouble for the cleaners, though.

furni_reception_vaseGroup_01.name: Tearoom Lighting
furni_reception_vaseGroup_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_reception_vaseGroup_01.description: Large plants in an antique vase accompanying a simple floor lamp. When the tearoom opened, a visitor claimed that placing certain plants in certain spots would bring good luck, and the owner half-heartedly went along with it.

furni_reception_wallpaper_01.name: Tearoom Wallpaper
furni_reception_wallpaper_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_reception_wallpaper_01.description: The tearoom's wallpaper is adorned with auspicious motifs. Steam rises slowly off the teacups, complimenting the patterns on the wall.

furni_reception_floor_01.name: Tearoom Flooring
furni_reception_floor_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_reception_floor_01.description: The tearoom's floor evokes a warm atmosphere. The wind outside the window is chilly, making the floor's color, reminiscent of fire, that much more inviting and warm.

furni_MA2020_rabbit_01.name: Auto Medicine Maker
furni_MA2020_rabbit_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_MA2020_rabbit_01.description: An automatic bunny pestle and mortar. When nobody is watching, this cute machine will quickly and silently mash up medicinal materials with the stone pestle.

furni_MA_teaTable_01.name: Tea Ceremony Table
furni_MA_teaTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_MA_teaTable_01.description: A traditional Yan-style tea table, specifically for tea ceremonies and serving refreshments. Visitors near and far, please come in and enjoy a cup of tea.

furni_MA_mooncake_S_01.name: 'Full Color' Gift Box
furni_MA_mooncake_S_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_MA_mooncake_S_01.description: A fine box of handmade moon cakes with puff crust, suitable for visiting friends.

furni_MA_mooncake_S_02.name: 'Full Moon' Gift Box
furni_MA_mooncake_S_02.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_MA_mooncake_S_02.description: A fine box of handmade moon cakes with puff crust, suitable for visiting friends.

furni_MA_mooncake_G_01.name: 'Smiley Face' Gift Box
furni_MA_mooncake_G_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_MA_mooncake_G_01.description: A fine box of handmade moon cakes with soft crust, suitable for enjoying with family.

furni_MA_mooncake_G_02.name: 'Osmanthus' Gift Box
furni_MA_mooncake_G_02.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_MA_mooncake_G_02.description: A fine box of handmade moon cakes with soft crust, suitable for enjoying with family.

furni_oct1st_seating_01.name: Relaxing Rocking Chair
furni_oct1st_seating_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_oct1st_seating_01.description: This oval-shaped, comfortable-looking chair is simply irresistible. Dominate your downtime with this lazy sofa and soundproof sleeping cabin.

furni_oct1st_ladder_01.name: Handmade Wooden Mobile Ladder
furni_oct1st_ladder_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_oct1st_ladder_01.description: A wooden ladder assembled by the children, placed there after its completion. See more, practice more. Try things yourself, and you'll always be able to learn something new.

furni_duanwu_lazysofa_01.name: Zongzi Beanie Bag
furni_duanwu_lazysofa_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_duanwu_lazysofa_01.description: A bean bag sofa in the shape of a traditional Yan delicacy. Is often frequented by a certain high-profile visitor from Yan who refuses to separate from it.

furni_duanwu_bed_L_01.name: Dragon Boat Bed (Head)
furni_duanwu_bed_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_duanwu_bed_L_01.description: A bed shaped like a dragon's head that's teeming with the festive atmosphere of a traditional Yan holiday. Can be joined with the other half. The head gazes upward, setting its sights on clouds and moons.

furni_duanwu_bed_R_01.name: Dragon Boat Bed (Tail)
furni_duanwu_bed_R_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_duanwu_bed_R_01.description: A bed shaped like a dragon's head that's teeming with the festive atmosphere of a traditional Yan holiday. Can be joined with the other half. The tail sweeps downward, keeping landscapes far and wide from doom.

furni_duanwu_wormwoodFloorLamp_01.name: Yanese Wooden Lamppost
furni_duanwu_wormwoodFloorLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_duanwu_wormwoodFloorLamp_01.description:
A Floor lamp full of the traditional festive atmosphere of the land of Yan.
The house is full of mugwort, and the room brightly lit to ward off evil and welcome peaceful joy.

furni_act12d0_throne_01.name: Warchief's Throne
furni_act12d0_throne_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act12d0_throne_01.description: All the strongest warriors are qualified to sit upon this throne. This so-called 'qualification' is to beat down any who aren't so convinced.

furni_act10d5_sideboard_01.name: Ursus Tableware Cabinet
furni_act10d5_sideboard_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act10d5_sideboard_01.description: Several sets of ceramic and glass tableware belonging to Rosa. Her tastes are just as hard to change as her status.

furni_act10d5_coatRack_01.name: Brand New Uniform
furni_act10d5_coatRack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act10d5_coatRack_01.description: An Ursus uniform that has never been worn. Once, Absinthe dreamed of donning it. Now, she doesn't even have the courage to look at it.

furni_act10d5_plushBear_01.name: Oversized Ursus Doll
furni_act10d5_plushBear_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act10d5_plushBear_01.description: This Ursus doll belonging to Istina is even bigger than Gummy. She heard once that having something huge and cute can provide an unparalleled sense of security.

furni_act10d5_walldecoKit_01.name: Miscellaneous Wall Decorations
furni_act10d5_walldecoKit_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act10d5_walldecoKit_01.description: A miscellaneous assortment of things hanging on the wall, ranging from clocks to portraits to porcelain plates. Can stagnation, conflagration, shattering, and destruction become the best of memories?

furni_act10d5_banner_01.name: Club Poster
furni_act10d5_banner_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act10d5_banner_01.description: An Ursus student club signboard hand-made by Gummy. One can envision happiness, but they can also envision reality.

furni_act10d5_honeyDrink_01.name: Ursus-style Honey Drink
furni_act10d5_honeyDrink_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act10d5_honeyDrink_01.description: A sweet and refreshing honey drink that keeps Leto in a good mood. Drink deeply and seek solace in sweet chaos.

furni_act9d0_carpet_01.name: Commemorative Carpet
furni_act9d0_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act9d0_carpet_01.description: A special carpet printed with a familiar rabbit motif. It was gifted to the Doctor by the residents of Rhodes Island.

furni_act9d0_bed_01.name: Commemorative Bed
furni_act9d0_bed_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act9d0_bed_01.description: A luxurious bed that the non-combat Operators of Rhodes Island prepared for the Doctor.

furni_act9d0_walllamp_01.name: Commemorative Wall Lamp
furni_act9d0_walllamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act9d0_walllamp_01.description: This peculiarly-installed wall lamp was a way for the Rhodes Island combat operators to express their thanks towards the Doctor.

furni_act18d0_cabinet_01.name: Commemorative Anniversary Tea Cart
furni_act18d0_cabinet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act18d0_cabinet_01.description: A customized tea cart made to commemorate the 2nd Anniversary of Arknights. It was deliberately crafted as a double decker to accentuate both form and functionality.

furni_act18d0_cakeTower_01.name: Commemorative Anniversary Cake
furni_act18d0_cakeTower_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act18d0_cakeTower_01.description: An ornate cake baked to commemorate the 2nd Anniversary of Arknights. It was the joint effort of the inhabitants of Rhodes Island. Being able to witness the coming-together of that is, in itself, most certainly priceless.

furni_act7d5_bookshelf.name: Modular Bookshelf
furni_act7d5_bookshelf.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act7d5_bookshelf.description: The shelves in the dormitory of Reserve Op Team A6 are filled with books that the members liked to read. Each person is assigned a different part of the shelf depending on their height, but they would often read each other's books.

furni_act7d5_atomicClock.name: Rhine Lab Atomic Clock
furni_act7d5_atomicClock.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act7d5_atomicClock.description: An absolutely accurate clock found in Ptilopsis's room. She has already calculated what needs to be done for each second of the day.

furni_act7d5_weaponRack.name: Ceobe's Weapon Rack
furni_act7d5_weaponRack.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act7d5_weaponRack.description: The weapon rack Ceobe uses when she's resting. She spent many years convincing herself that her weapons must never leave her hands, but learnt within days that weapons could also be placed within a rack.

furni_act7d5_wallSticker.name: Motivational Poster
furni_act7d5_wallSticker.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act7d5_wallSticker.description: Motivational posters in the training room. Give it to friends who are still on the fence about joining Rhodes Island, come on!

furni_act7d5_petHouse.name: Kuro's New Home
furni_act7d5_petHouse.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act7d5_petHouse.description: A small pet house that Vanilla prepared for the Originium slug, Kuro. After going through a lot of bureaucratic red tape, Vanilla finally got permission to raise the slug, so now Kuro can have a home!

furni_act7d5_apron.name: Home-Use Apron
furni_act7d5_apron.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act7d5_apron.description: An ordinary apron purchased from the supermarket, suitable for doing various chores around the ship. Operators with horns might have some trouble putting it on.

furni_act14d0_arcadegame_01.name: Fan Appreciation Slot Machine
furni_act14d0_arcadegame_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act14d0_arcadegame_01.description: Closure's favorite brand new gaming machine. No coins needed. Just hit start and enjoy the game.

furni_act15d0_carpet_01.name: Velvet Snow Rug
furni_act15d0_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act15d0_carpet_01.description: A velvet rug imported from Yan. Soft and warm to the touch even during winters.

furni_act15d0_stool_01.name: Ice Cream Bunny Sofa
furni_act15d0_stool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act15d0_stool_01.description: A winter limited edition sofa produced by a certain Victorian furniture company. Comfortable and cozy even during winters.

furni_act15d0_snowman_01.name: 'Blocky Bro'
furni_act15d0_snowman_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act15d0_snowman_01.description: A snowman treated with Originium Arts. Won't melt even after an extended period of time. Happy and heart-warming even during winters.

furni_act16d0_floorLamp_01.name: 'Twisted Treelamp'
furni_act16d0_floorLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act16d0_floorLamp_01.description: Artificial tree trucks and lanterns produce art that promises both durability and ornamental value. The holidays are here, and this makes the room as bright as it is seasonally appropriate.

furni_act16d0_drum_01.name: Bunny Drum Toy
furni_act16d0_drum_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act16d0_drum_01.description: Your classic manual wooden toy. A traditional Yan plaything, just switch out the little man for a familiar, adorable bunny.

furni_act16d0_walldeco_01.name: Auspiciously Patterned Fan
furni_act16d0_walldeco_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act16d0_walldeco_01.description: An ornamental fan. Some fans never close, using more surface area to convey the mood.

furni_act17d0_box_01.name: Contested Objective
furni_act17d0_box_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act17d0_box_01.description: An objective used in Team Rainbow training. Get the enemy off it and you win.

furni_act17d0_acog_01.name: Scope
furni_act17d0_acog_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act17d0_acog_01.description: It's a telescope that looks like a gun scope, fresh out of its gift box. It looks funny when some operators holding it with hands.

furni_act19d0_showcase_01.name: Antique Display Cabinet
furni_act19d0_showcase_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act19d0_showcase_01.description: An old-fashioned cabinet with items already placed inside. The cabinet is actually fairly expensive, but the collection is what's priceless.

furni_act21d0_fan_01.name: Holiday Stand Fan
furni_act21d0_fan_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act21d0_fan_01.description: A stand fan exuding the breath of the sea. Dossoles exports a great number of these popular fans. The fine sand immersed in liquid sways endlessly as the fan spins, bringing to mind the rolling waves of the sea.

furni_act21d0_foodCart_01.name: Sea Breeze Fruity Shaved-Ice Cart
furni_act21d0_foodCart_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act21d0_foodCart_01.description: A shaved-ice cart commonly seen around Dossoles. The hotter the weather, the better the business. It's easy to turn a profit even while giving out discounts.

furni_act21d0_barrel_01.name: Dossoles Ice Bucket
furni_act21d0_barrel_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act21d0_barrel_01.description: An ice-filled beverage cooler containing all kinds of special Dossoles drinks. Don't let the heat ruin the fun. How about a drink?

furni_act21d0_motorcycle_01.name: Dossoles Limited Edition Motorcycle
furni_act21d0_motorcycle_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act21d0_motorcycle_01.description: This year's Dossoles Warrior Champion co-branded limited edition motorcycle. With it, all the roads along the entire 'coast' are yours to speed through. Drive safe and have fun.

furni_act22d0_chair_01.name: Regal Hanging Chair
furni_act22d0_chair_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act22d0_chair_01.description: A large hanging chair inspired by Victorian court fashion. The fabrics have been treated with flame-retardants. When it comes to luxury, Victoria is not satisfied falling behind Leithanien.

furni_act22d4_letterBox_01.name: Ashlock's Mailbox
furni_act22d4_letterBox_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act22d4_letterBox_01.description: Ashlock's mailbox, stuffed to the brim with fanmail. Most popular competition knights have at least a few of these.

furni_act22d4_ceiling_01.name: Fartooth's Windchimes
furni_act22d4_ceiling_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act22d4_ceiling_01.description: Windchimes made by Fartooth. When the wind blows, a crisp sound emerges. As long as this sound can be heard, Fartooth will always recall the little things from her hometown.

furni_act23d0_decoration_01.name: 'The Old Days'
furni_act23d0_decoration_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act23d0_decoration_01.description: A decorative plaque that doesn't seem to come from the real past. People often like to fantasize about a single point in the past changing, as if in that non-existent history, everything that develops from that point would be like a perfect dream.

furni_act23d0_ceilingLamp_01.name: Winged Kuranta Chandelier
furni_act23d0_ceilingLamp_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act23d0_ceilingLamp_01.description: A chandelier made with the Kuranta of Kazimierz as its primary motif. The age of knights has long passed.

furni_act24d0_dunhuang_01.name: 'Amidst Misty Clouds'
furni_act24d0_dunhuang_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act24d0_dunhuang_01.description:
An ink-touched, wind-brushed sculpture left by a charitable person. 
Go forth and returneth not, rising clouds into safe barrows settle. How seeketh one the immortals' abode? Nary a trace, a futile chase.

furni_act24d0_clock_01.name: 'Last Word'
furni_act24d0_clock_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act24d0_clock_01.description:
A replica of a grandfather clock designed in the style of an old castle. 
The curtains fall, the bells ring, and a new performance is about to begin - yet the end of the promise remains far away.

furni_act24d0_house_01.name: Kuro's Festive New Home
furni_act24d0_house_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act24d0_house_01.description:
A nest built with decorations left over from the holidays. 
Kuro looked at the unfamiliar new house, somewhat overwhelmed.

furni_act24d0_table_01.name: Yan-Style Dressing Table
furni_act24d0_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act24d0_table_01.description:
A dressing table in the traditional Yan style, with incense wafting from the censer. 
Trinkets and baubles abound, within the mirror do shadows bound.

furni_act25d0_table_01.name: 'A Game Among Mountains'
furni_act25d0_table_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act25d0_table_01.description:
A weiqi table made of marble, engraving the landscape of mountain and river into its grid. On the sides, the shadows of clouds run along the grains of the stone itself. 
Conversation and laughter accompany the wind beyond the mountain, the sound of pieces being set in-between.

furni_act25d0_decoration_01.name: 'Snow Atop the Pavilion'
furni_act25d0_decoration_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act25d0_decoration_01.description:
The structure is based on an ancient pavilion located atop the peak, while the base draws inspiration from the poem: 'Spring snow melts with ink, pine branches snap and roll.' 
The years are fleeting, the line between sky and earth muddy. Only the snow atop the pavilion absolves me.

furni_act27d0_prizeWheel_01.name: Anniversary Wheel of Fortune
furni_act27d0_prizeWheel_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act27d0_prizeWheel_01.description: The wheel commemorates the third anniversary of the release of Arknights. The pointer falls, and fortune shall follow, so you must know where it will land.

furni_act30d0_fan_01.name: Glass Cabinet Fan
furni_act30d0_fan_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_act30d0_fan_01.description:
A refreshing color palette. You might even swear it makes the breeze it blows more soothing.
The miniature landscape inside draws on the trio of leisure you'll see all around the Durin Great Aquapita parasol, a swim ring, and the most comfortable deck chair ever.

furni_foolsDay_penguin_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_foolsDay_penguin_01.description: Everyone knows who the figure depicted on this pure-gold trophy is. The microphone guides the song, and the record's quality goes up a tier, friend.
