furni_contract_s1_01.description: The banner of a legendary mercenary team, wiped out during a Contingency Contract mission. The banner was restored by Catastrophe Messengers to commemorate them.

furni_contract_s2_01.name: Blade Pennant
furni_contract_s2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_contract_s2_01.description: A pennant with the mark of a long-lost weapon. Though the weapon itself has long been sundered, its likeness was restored by adherents to commemorate it.

furni_contract_s3_01.name: Cinder Pennant
furni_contract_s3_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_contract_s3_01.description: A pennant with the personal seal of a certain Catastrophe Messenger. Though the messenger lost her life during a Catastrophe long ago, the seal she left behind has been restored by the locals to commemorate her.

furni_contract_s4_01.name: Lead Seal Pennant
furni_contract_s4_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_contract_s4_01.description: A pennant depicting the mark of a certain lead seal. Hidden deep inside the core of an abandoned, Catastrophe-stricken independent city, it should never have been uncovered by man.

furni_contract_s5_01.name: Spectrum Pennant
furni_contract_s5_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_contract_s5_01.description: A pennant bearing the coat of arms of a certain knight family. The crest comes from a knight who never managed to win glory, but due to its extensive influence, was restored by fans to commemorate it.

furni_contract_s6_01.name: Wild Scales Pennant
furni_contract_s6_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_contract_s6_01.description: A banner illustrating a certain rare wild beast's scales. All the man in the world knows the beast is extremely low in numbers and highly valued, and those who are unable to obtain it may only gaze upon its magnificence through an emblem based on its patterns.

furni_contract_s7_01.name: Pine Soot Pennant
furni_contract_s7_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_contract_s7_01.description: A flag depicting the likeness of a certain seal. The artist used the seal as a stamp of authenticity, but the people of this world will commemorate it by restoring it as a symbol of wealth.

furni_contract_s8_01.name: Dawnseeker Pennant
furni_contract_s8_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_contract_s8_01.description: 'A banner that depicts a lit torch. The torch continues to burn brightly in the wilderness, a symbol etched by those who seek light within the wilderness.

furni_contract_s9_01.name: Deepness Pennant
furni_contract_s9_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_contract_s9_01.description: A pennant that indicates a certain unusual tidal flood. Tides are the pulse of the ocean, from which one seeks to glean the secrets of the deep, recording their shapes to memory.

furni_contract_s10_01.name: Ashring Pennant
furni_contract_s10_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_contract_s10_01.description: A flag depicting a ruined building. Shelling has left marks on the cityscape, and on the hearts of the people who live within.

furni_annihilation_s2_01.name: Echoes of Ursus (Abandoned Mine)
furni_annihilation_s2_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_annihilation_s2_01.description: A souvenir awarded for completing the Ursus Abandoned Mine Annihilation mission and submitting the mission report. The echoes of the abandoned mine yet reverberates in your ears.

furni_annihilation_s4_01.name: Siesta Echoes (Seashore)
furni_annihilation_s4_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_annihilation_s4_01.description: A souvenir awarded for completing the Siesta Flooded Seashore Annihilation mission and submitting the mission report. The echoes of the seashore yet reverberate in your ears.

furni_annihilation_s5_01.name: Iberian Echoes (Tidal Cave)
furni_annihilation_s5_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_annihilation_s5_01.description: A souvenir awarded for completing the Iberian Watery Tidehollow Annihilation mission and submitting the mission report. The echoes of the caverns yet reverberate in your ears.

furni_annihilation_s6_01.name: Sargonian Echoes (Long Spring)
furni_annihilation_s6_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_annihilation_s6_01.description: A souvenir awarded for completing the Sargonian Long Spring Wastes Annihilation mission and submitting the mission report. The echoes of the springs' wastes yet reverberate in your ears.

furni_annihilation_s7_01.name: Echoes of Bolvar (Water Gate)
furni_annihilation_s7_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_annihilation_s7_01.description: A souvenir awarded for completing the Dossoles Water Gate Annihilation mission and submitting the mission report. The echoes of the water gate yet reverberate in your ears.

furni_annihilation_s8_01.name: Echoes of Columbia (Prison)
furni_annihilation_s8_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_annihilation_s8_01.description: A souvenir awarded for completing the Columbia South Prison Annihilation mission and submitting the mission report. The sounds of the prison yet reverberate in your ears.

furni_annihilation_s9_01.name: Echoes of Victoria (County Hillock)
furni_annihilation_s9_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_annihilation_s9_01.description: A souvenir awarded for completing the Victoria Hillock Countryside Annihilation mission and submitting the mission report. The echoes of the county yet reverberate in your ears.

furni_annihilation_s10_01.name: Echoes of Kazimierz (Arena)
furni_annihilation_s10_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_annihilation_s10_01.description: A souvenir awarded for completing the Kazimierz Night Champion Show Annihilation mission and submitting the mission report. The echoes of the arena yet reverberate in your ears.

furni_annihilation_s11_01.name: Echoes of Yan (Shu's Paths)
furni_annihilation_s11_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_annihilation_s11_01.description: A souvenir awarded for completing the Yan Lingering Shangshu Trails Annihilation mission and submitting the mission report. The echoes of Shu's Paths yet reverberate in your ears.

furni_annihilation_s12_01.name: Laterano Echoes (Chocolate Street)
furni_annihilation_s12_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_annihilation_s12_01.description: A souvenir awarded for completing the Laterano Chocolate Street Annihilation mission and submitting the mission report. The echoes of Chocolate Street yet reverberate in your ears.

furni_annihilation_s13_01.name: Iberian Echoes (Shipyard)
furni_annihilation_s13_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_annihilation_s13_01.description: A souvenir awarded for completing the Iberian Penumbra Shipyards Annihilation mission and submitting the mission report. The echoes of the shipyards yet reverberate in your ears.

furni_taptap_arcadegame_01.name: Taptap Arcade
furni_taptap_arcadegame_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_taptap_arcadegame_01.description: An arcade machine given by a company to Rhodes Island. It may be able to store a countless number of games.

furni_bilibili_carpet_01.name: Bilibili Carpet
furni_bilibili_carpet_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_bilibili_carpet_01.description: A carpet woven with a cute mascot. It feels soft and delicate, which makes people want to roll on it. But in fact, the manufacturer has no interest in the carpet industry.

furni_event_lazyPillow_01.name: Rabbit-like Bean Bag Sofa
furni_event_lazyPillow_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_event_lazyPillow_01.description: It looks like a big cute rabbit, and feels like one too.

furni_MSR001_room_01.name: 'Rap'
furni_MSR001_room_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_MSR001_room_01.description: Gnarly lyrics intertwine back and forth with the melody. The powerful lines have rattled my brain and drained my energy, but I want to sing a few more words. Just a few more!
furni_MSR001_room_01.obtainApproach: Monster Siren Records redemption code reward

furni_team001_blackSteel_target_01.name: Liskarm's Training Target
furni_team001_blackSteel_target_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team001_blackSteel_target_01.description: A target Liskarm often uses during training. The one in that photo often makes fun of her.

furni_team001_followers_ceilingLight_01.name: Ceiling Light Made By Sarkaz
furni_team001_followers_ceilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team001_followers_ceilingLight_01.description: A ceiling light designed by Shining. The diffuse light has nothing to do with its design.

furni_team001_ursus_baseballStand_01.name: Self-goverment Group Bat Rack
furni_team001_ursus_baseballStand_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team001_ursus_baseballStand_01.description: A bat rack of the Ursus Student Self-Governing Group. Occasionally they will get together to play baseball.
furni_team001_ursus_baseballStand_01.obtainApproach: Ursus Student Self-Governing Group Trust collection

furni_team001_opdaA1_coatRack_01.name: Dorm Tree-shaped Coat Rack
furni_team001_opdaA1_coatRack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team001_opdaA1_coatRack_01.description: A rack for Operators of Reserve Op Team A1 to hang clothes. It makes them feel relaxed and at home after missions.
furni_team001_opdaA1_coatRack_01.obtainApproach: Reserve Op Team A1 Trust collection

furni_team001_opdaA4_coatRack_01.name: Dorm Coat Rack with Ring Top
furni_team001_opdaA4_coatRack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team001_opdaA4_coatRack_01.description: A rack for Operators of Reserve Op Team A4 to hang clothes. The indoor temperature is still relatively high.
furni_team001_opdaA4_coatRack_01.obtainApproach: Reserve Op Team A4 Trust collection

furni_team001_kjerag_fireplaceTool_01.name: Fireplace Tool Set of Karlan
furni_team001_kjerag_fireplaceTool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team001_kjerag_fireplaceTool_01.description: A fireplace tool set commonly used by Kjerag people. It will be a warm winter.

furni_team001_penguin_frame_01.name: Emperor's Picture Frame
furni_team001_penguin_frame_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team001_penguin_frame_01.description: A portrait of the Emperor. How's it goin', brutha?

furni_team001_rhine_cultivationPool_01.name: Lab Tank
furni_team001_rhine_cultivationPool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team001_rhine_cultivationPool_01.description: An eco-tank with unknown creatures in it. They do look a bit similar to things we're more familiar with though.

furni_team001_lungmen_diningCar_01.name: Lungmen Breakfast Cart
furni_team001_lungmen_diningCar_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team001_lungmen_diningCar_01.description: A breakfast cart commonly seen in Lungmen. The Lungmen specialties on it are popular among the L.G.D.

furni_team001_victoria_graffiti_01.name: Glasgow Graffiti
furni_team001_victoria_graffiti_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team001_victoria_graffiti_01.description: Londinium used to be covered with this distinctive Glasgow-style graffiti.

furni_team001_odaA4_boardGameTable_01.name: Dorm Board Game Table
furni_team001_odaA4_boardGameTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team001_odaA4_boardGameTable_01.description: Reserve Op Team A4 used to play tabletop games here. A new character card will be filled out tonight.

furni_team002_opdaA6_gacha_01.name: Strange Gashapon Machine in the Aisle
furni_team002_opdaA6_gacha_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team002_opdaA6_gacha_01.description: A gashapon machine in the charge of Orchid. The toys in it are handmade by Spot, and they are Catapult and Popukar's favorite. Midnight ends up paying the bill.
furni_team002_opdaA6_gacha_01.obtainApproach: Reserve Op Team A6 Trust collection

furni_team002_abyssal_trident_01.name: gir's Mysterious Pedestal
furni_team002_abyssal_trident_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team002_abyssal_trident_01.description: The stone pedestal of a weapon. The original weapon was long lost, but someone replaced it with a movie prop.

furni_team002_sweep_weaponRack_01.name: 'Twilight'
furni_team002_sweep_weaponRack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_team002_sweep_weaponRack_01.description: A big floor clock constructed using a special technique. The hands keep turning, but its low rumble signifies the passing of life.

furni_single001_conicalCeilingLight_01.name: Half-closed Ceiling Light
furni_single001_conicalCeilingLight_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_single001_conicalCeilingLight_01.description: A uniquely shaped ceiling light. The shape does not affect its lighting function.

furni_single001_shelf_01.name: Assembled Stackable Shelf
furni_single001_shelf_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_single001_shelf_01.description: An assembled stackable shelf which has a rather complex structure.

furni_single001_mahjongTable_01.name: Black Mahjong Table
furni_single001_mahjongTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_single001_mahjongTable_01.description: A black mahjong table. It's said that the early mahjong was made from strange plants.

furni_single001_mahjongChair_L_01.name: Brown Mahjong Chair (Left)
furni_single001_mahjongChair_L_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_single001_mahjongChair_L_01.description: A mahjong chair with brown cushion. Gang.

furni_single001_mahjongChair_R_01.name: Brown Mahjong Chair (Right)
furni_single001_mahjongChair_R_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_single001_mahjongChair_R_01.description: A mahjong chair with brown cushion. Peng.

furni_single001_boardGameTable_01.name: White Board Game Table
furni_single001_boardGameTable_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_single001_boardGameTable_01.description: A table used by Operators to play various games. Pick up the entire stack!

furni_single001_catClimbingFrame_01.name: Small Recreational Structure
furni_single001_catClimbingFrame_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_single001_catClimbingFrame_01.description: Even Operators can have fun here! It's become quite popular.

furni_single001_layerStack_01.name: Jenga
furni_single001_layerStack_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_single001_layerStack_01.description: A source of entertainment for many Operators, particularly in the moment when everything falls apart spectacularly. This game is said to have helped reveal parts of many an Operator's past.

furni_single001_newspaperStool_01.name: Handmade Newspaper Stool
furni_single001_newspaperStool_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_single001_newspaperStool_01.description: A derivative work of a famous architect who builds houses with paper. People can't believe they can actually sit on a paper stool.

furni_single001_printer_01.name: Simple Printer
furni_single001_printer_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_single001_printer_01.description: A simple printer that can print documents.

furni_single001_vendingMachine_01.name: Refrigerated Vending Machine
furni_single001_vendingMachine_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_single001_vendingMachine_01.description: A vending machine that sells a variety of refrigerated foods. The temperature is the same all year round.

furni_single001_letterLight_0_01.name: O-shaped Light
furni_single001_letterLight_0_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_single001_letterLight_0_01.description: A wall light designed in the shape of the symbol of genesis.

furni_single001_letterLight_1_01.name: I-shaped Light
furni_single001_letterLight_1_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_single001_letterLight_1_01.description: A wall light designed in the shape of the symbol of growth.

furni_dropN001_box_01.name: Black Material Box
furni_dropN001_box_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_box_01.description: A black material box. The goods in it are intact.

furni_dropN001_box_02.name: White Material Box
furni_dropN001_box_02.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_box_02.description: A white material box. The goods are protected by the solid box.

furni_dropN001_box_03.name: Olive-green Material Box
furni_dropN001_box_03.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_box_03.description: An olive-green materials box. It compels people to open it.

furni_dropN001_generator_01.name: Green Dynamo
furni_dropN001_generator_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_generator_01.description: A green dynamo that uses Originium to generate electrical power.

furni_dropN001_generator_02.name: Orange Dynamo
furni_dropN001_generator_02.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_generator_02.description: An orange dynamo, a small power-generation equipment.

furni_dropN001_generator_03.name: White Dynamo
furni_dropN001_generator_03.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_generator_03.description: A white dynamo useful in times of power failure.

furni_dropN001_sculptureColumn_01.name: Bonding Column
furni_dropN001_sculptureColumn_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_sculptureColumn_01.description: A column with a strange look. Its shape still seems to be changing slowly.

furni_dropN001_vineColumn_01.name: Vine Column
furni_dropN001_vineColumn_01.usage: Used in the dorm to improve the ambience.
furni_dropN001_vineColumn_01.description: A column tangled with vines that grew without control.

furni_set_warehouse.name: Warehouse
furni_set_warehouse.desc: The basic layout of the warehouses of logistics companies.

furni_set_s1_01.name: Side Line/ Simple Black-and-white Furniture
furni_set_s1_01.desc: A classic themed design sold at a well-known furniture company in Sami. The design concept focuses on solid colors.

furni_set_s1_02.name: Side Line/ Simple Orange Furniture
furni_set_s1_02.desc: A classic theme of products sold at a well-known furniture company in Sami. Orange is added.

furni_set_specimen.name: Fantastic Bio-documentary
furni_set_specimen.desc: A concept rest area built under the instruction of Kal'tsit. It has the same structure as museum's with surreal elements added.

furni_set_cabin.name: No.12 Life Cycle Cabin
furni_set_cabin.desc: A concept cabin built under the instruction of Kal'tsit. It has the necessary equipment for all kinds of work.

furni_set_s2_01.name: L.G.D. Lounge
furni_set_s2_01.desc: The L.G.D. Lounge, modern and solemn.

furni_set_s2_02.name: Faux Lungmen Lounge
furni_set_s2_02.desc: A lounge imitating the decoration style of Lungmen.

furni_set_wooden.name: Sami Countryside Villa
furni_set_wooden.desc: A room that imitates the style of a traditional Sami log cabin using materials that had been sitting around for a while in the warehouse.

furni_set_artdeco.name: Modern Columbian Hotel
furni_set_artdeco.desc: A room that imitates the style of a modern Columbian hotel. One cannot help but to recall the flashy hustle and bustle of Columbia before it entered present times.

furni_set_chen.name: Ch'en's Office
furni_set_chen.desc: A room imitating the office of Inspector Ch'en. It's used by Ch'en and plays an amazing role at Rhodes Island.

furni_set_beach.name: Siesta Beach Hut
furni_set_beach.desc: A conceptual room that recreates the scene of coastal city Siesta in a festival. Hasn't the party started yet?

furni_set_guitar.name: Modern Music Rehearsal Room
furni_set_guitar.desc: One of the music rehearsal rooms at Rhodes Islands. Open for free to Operators who love playing guitar.

furni_set_safetyZone.name: Airtight Anti-Chemical Safety Cabin
furni_set_safetyZone.desc: A sterile chamber with antibacterial and anti-chemical protection facilities. Only for use for emergencies and tasks that pose an imminent risk to health.

furni_set_rococo.name: Reimselar Ballroom
furni_set_rococo.desc: A recreation of a ballroom from the small, faroff country of Reimselar. A glimmer of light within the vast mountain range.

furni_set_spirit.name: Secret Occult Society
furni_set_spirit.desc: These decorations will make your cabin look spooky and special. Aesthetics approved by the Occult Club.

furni_set_penguin.name: Penguin Logistics Safehouse
furni_set_penguin.desc: A safehouse designed in collaboration with Penguin Logistics. The design and construction drafts have already been submitted to Rhodes Island.

furni_set_elite.name: Rhodes Island Workstation
furni_set_elite.desc: The Rhodes Island Workstation is primarily for use by elite Operators for designing, development, and maintenance work demanded by their missions.

furni_set_restaurant.name: Lungmen Eatery
furni_set_restaurant.desc: This design was inspired by the warmth and hospitality of a traditional Lungmen eatery. Welcome the holidays and regale your guests!

furni_set_lightFood.name: Healthy Diner
furni_set_lightFood.desc: A groundbreaking fast food experience, now hiring staff. Great food and great taste should always go hand-in-hand.

furni_set_beerhouse.name: Seven Cities-style Restaurant
furni_set_beerhouse.desc: A room that reproduces the atmosphere of a Seven Cities restaurant. Is the food to your liking?

furni_set_dormW.name: Sarkaz Mercenary Lounge
furni_set_dormW.desc: A lounge built in the style of Sarkaz. Here, danger and comfort coexist.

furni_set_community.name: Ursus Student Clubroom
furni_set_community.desc: A clubroom set up by five students from Ursus using their own paychecks. A handshake is only the beginning of a friendship.

furni_set_nightView.name: Leithanian Nights
furni_set_nightView.desc: A room that reproduces the nightlife of Leithanien. After the curtain of night falls, music rises to accompany it.

furni_set_office.name: Rhodes Island HR Office
furni_set_office.desc: One of the offices used by the Rhodes Island's HR Department, responsible for screening potential suitable Operators every day.

furni_set_bolivar.name: Tribal-Style Inn
furni_set_bolivar.desc: A conceptual reproduction of a tribal-style inn. A world where the fist speaks the loudest.

furni_set_midAutumn.name: Yan Reception Hall
furni_set_midAutumn.desc: A room that imitates the atmosphere of traditional Yan holidays. The moon rises; let the festivities begin.

furni_set_fNearl.name: Nearls' Living Room Replica
furni_set_fNearl.desc: A living room reproduction financed by Zofia and constructed by Maria. It's quite different compared to the one before.

furni_set_activity.name: Golden Game Room
furni_set_activity.desc: A room just for the kids to play in. Hope they have a good time.

furni_set_kitchen.name: White Wilderness
furni_set_kitchen.desc: A concept room based on an award-winning design. When asked for comments, the winner had nothing to say at all. The design speaks for itself.

furni_set_prison.name: Mansfield Prison Cell
furni_set_prison.desc: Your run-of-the-mill prison cell. Normally, you wouldn't find a cell like this in Rhodes Island, but perhaps someone really wanted to spend a night in one to satiate their inner desires.

furni_set_village.name: The Zen Garden
furni_set_village.desc: A lounge design inspired by the four seasons, blending Eastern characteristics and Western design philosophies. The concept is replicated here at Rhodes Island with Ms. Fumizuki's permission.

furni_set_inkArt.name: Tan-Ch'ing Court
furni_set_inkArt.desc: One of the many layouts Dusk's art studio has taken. Recorded and replicated here in a stroke of luck.

furni_set_R6.name: Special Equipment Exhibition Room
furni_set_R6.desc: An equipment exhibition room constructed based on the Team Rainbow operators' memories. Most of the equipment found inside are merely replicas.

furni_set_bauhaus.name: Walter Interior Sensations
furni_set_bauhaus.desc: An avant-garde interior design style originating from Leithanien. Colorful in character and critically acclaimed.

furni_set_icu.name: Critical Response Team Office
furni_set_icu.desc: The office of Rhodes Island's critical response medic team. Kal'tsit is the officer-in-charge.

furni_set_abyssal.name: Iberian Resort Town
furni_set_abyssal.desc: This room is a reconstruction of a seaside Iberian resort town. The refreshing sea breeze invites you to enjoy your vacation... That's what we imagined.

furni_set_perfumer.name: Lena's Rest
furni_set_perfumer.desc: A room designed to replicate Lena the Perfumer's new dorm in the Convalescent Garden. The flowery fragrance flows year round.

furni_set_photoStudio.name: The Photography Hobbyist's Studio
furni_set_photoStudio.desc: A photography studio Rhodes Island set up for its hobbyists. Fully equipped and professional, ready for the finest pictures to be taken.

furni_set_westCoast.name: Dossoles Private Spa
furni_set_westCoast.desc: A concept room recreating the spa experience at a Dossoles high-end leisure club. Try not to put a price on quality when enjoying yourself here.

furni_set_college.name: Victorian Royal Guard Academy Dormitory
furni_set_college.desc: A reproduction of the dorm that Ch'en and Bagpipe shared during their time at the Victorian Royal Guard Academy. Every piece of furniture was carefully selected by the Academy and exudes both elegance and youthfulness.

furni_set_knights.name: Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub Break Room
furni_set_knights.desc: Most of the pieces of furniture in the Pinus Sylvestris Knightclub's quarters at Rhodes Island have been modified or upgraded by the knightclub members.

furni_set_kazimierz.name: Kazimierz Broadcast Center
furni_set_kazimierz.desc: A Kazimierz Major broadcast center, bringing you the latest on the knight competitions.

furni_set_arcadeHall.name: Avant-Garde Arcade Hall
furni_set_arcadeHall.desc: A conceptual reproduction of a Columbian arcade hall. Entertainment in moderation is good for the body and mind.

furni_set_stage.name: Kjerag-Style Inn
furni_set_stage.desc: Rhodes Island's reproduction of a room at an inn near the Silverash territory's railway station.

furni_set_teaHouse.name: Shan-Ch'eng Teahouse
furni_set_teaHouse.desc: A reproduction of a Shangshu teahouse. Kroos and Mr. Nothing strongly recommend enjoying tea before the majesty of nature as one of the premier charms of Shangshu.

furni_set_lightArt.name: Caladon Light Store
furni_set_lightArt.desc: A reproduction of a certain arboretum and lighting shop based on Quercus's descriptions. Goldenglow was most overjoyed to see it.

furni_set_castle.name: 'Castlesque'
furni_set_castle.desc: A room in the style of an old castle, reconstructed using data collected by the Operators. An ominous aura permeates the room.

furni_set_NHL.name: Laterano Notarial Hall Lounge
furni_set_NHL.desc: A recreation of the lounge at the Laterano Notarial Hall, based on descriptions provided by Operator Enforcer. Fiammetta is not overly enthused by it.

furni_set_mis.name: Instrument Repair Workshop
furni_set_mis.desc: A room created to fill the needs of Rhodes Island's music lovers. Retail services also available.

furni_set_vcWarRoom.name: Tempest Platoon War Room
furni_set_vcWarRoom.desc: The Victorian Tempest Platoon's war room, recreated based on descriptions by Horn. Large-scale planning on a small scale.

furni_set_goldBoat.name: Stultifera Navis Reception Room
furni_set_goldBoat.desc: A replica of a Stultifera Navis guest room, recreated based on a description by Irene. Its glittering gold represents the glory of 'old Iberia.'

furni_set_concertHall.name: Afterglow-Styled Music Room
furni_set_concertHall.desc: A music room centered on Czerny's instrument collection. Ebenholz and Hibiscus also contributed significantly to the layout. Czerny has no shortage of young operators coming to learn the musical arts. They've dubbed it 'Czerny's Music Room.'

furni_set_rhineLab.name: Rhine Experimental Culture Pod
furni_set_rhineLab.desc: A Rhine laboratory recreated from descriptions by Operator Dorothy, among others. The pod nurtures dreams that nurture humanity, but things can occasionally backfire.

furni_set_idealCity.name: Great Aquapit Funtastic Experientorium
furni_set_idealCity.desc: A recreation of a Great Aquapit tourist lodge based on reluctant descriptions by Minimalist. Following the instatement of Gavial's oversight, Minimalist's efficiency more than doubled.

furni_set_durin.name: Sugar Pome Fairy's Banquet Hall
furni_set_durin.desc: The banquet hall of the Sugar Pome Fairy, modeled after the set of Rhodes Island home-ballet production The Nutcracker. At once a dreamland, and rich with significance too.

furni_set_camp.name: Dzwonek Campsite
furni_set_camp.desc: A campsite built according to a picture in a brochure distributed by the city of Dzwonek. Mynar may have spent time in a camp like this.

furni_set_classroom.name: Saint-Marsol Classroom
furni_set_classroom.desc: Room recreated in the image of Golding's classes, but missing the sound of children laughing and reading.

furni_set_reception.name: Lungmen Tearoom
furni_set_reception.desc: A private booth of a popular tearoom in Lungmen. It is said to be frequented by big shots. With traditional and warm colored furnishings, it looks warm on the cold night in the city.
